aa_2022_increased_pika_corsola: More Pikachu wearing Okinawan kariyushi shirts and Corsola are appearing in the wild!
aa_2022_okinawa_balloon_pika: Flying Pikachu are appearing in the wild
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_0_0: Hello again, %PLAYERNAME%! Isn’t this place lovely?
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_0_1: I can’t stop thinking about taking a vacation. I know we’re always outdoors researching, but taking a break and going somewhere new and just relaxing sounds so nice, doesn’t it?
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_0_2: Vacations are even better when you’ve got a Pokémon pal at your side!
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_0_3: In that spirit, why don’t you spend some time exploring the area with your Buddy Pokémon? Let’s see what there is to see!
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_1_0: You know, one of my favorite parts of traveling is trying out local foods. I think my Meltan would agree!
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_1_1: Once, it attempted to absorb a local camper’s mess kit—since, as you know, Meltan dissolves and eats metal. Luckily, I was able to avert that crisis before if got too, er...messy.
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_1_2: Who needs a lid for their curry pot, anyway? Haha...
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_1_3: All this talk of food and the like has my stomach rumbling. I’m sure the local Pokémon would be thankful for some snacks, too. How about you share some Berries with them?
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_2_0: You know, I wonder if my mind’s been so fixated on flying somewhere far away because of all the Flying-type Pokémon in the area today. What do you think, %PLAYERNAME%?
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_2_1: It sure would be nice to glide somewhere on a whim...
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_2_2: With such boundless freedom, why do you think all these Flying-type Pokémon chose to gather here? I know we’re supposed to be on vacation, but would you mind catching some Pokémon to help me understand this phenomenon, %PLAYERNAME%?
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_3_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! Thanks for catching those Pokémon for me. I really appreciate it!
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_3_1: You should go enjoy the sights and make some memories in the area. Maybe even send a postcard or two!
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_3_2: I’d go with you, but I think Meltan’s been nibbling on my research equipment again... We’ve talked about this, Meltan! Scrap metal only, please!
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_4_0: Good to see you! I hope you had a refreshing stroll.
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_4_1: In addition to all the Flying-type Pokémon, there seem to be a lot of unique Pikachu appearing in the area. I saw a few wearing rather stylish shirts and even some flying in the air with balloons!
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_4_2: I can’t say I’ve ever seen Pikachu like this before, but they certainly appear to be enjoying themselves. Let’s spend some time with them before we wrap up!
aa_2022_okinawa_dialogue_4_3: Thanks again for another great adventure, %PLAYERNAME%. I hope you had as much fun as I did. Now, until next time—let’s GO!

arlo_challenge#1: Why do you insist on wasting my time?
arlo_challenge#10: You lack the gravitas to be in the presence of Team GO Rocket. I’ll finish this quickly.
arlo_challenge#2: Well, if you insist on battling, as a Trainer, I must accept. However, you will pay for inconveniencing me.
arlo_challenge#3: You have such an air of arrogance about you. Allow me to dispel it for you.
arlo_challenge#4: Your insolence disgusts me. I’ll make sure your confidence is utterly shattered following this battle.
arlo_challenge#5: Your sense of self-importance sickens me. Are you prepared to be wholly humiliated?
arlo_challenge#6: Your arrogance will be your downfall, and I shall be the one to set that in motion.
arlo_challenge#7: Loss is not a concept I’m acquainted with. I don’t expect that will change after this battle.
arlo_challenge#8: A person of your stature shouldn’t be this confident. Fret not—I’ll do you the honor of teaching you this lesson.
arlo_challenge#9: Usually I wouldn’t consider debasing myself by battling a commoner...but I’ll make an exception to humiliate you.
arlo_defeat#1: How...how can this be? I...I never lose!
arlo_defeat#2: How dare you...humiliate me like this?
arlo_defeat#3: I haven’t felt this much humiliation since I lost my battle with Candela... You’ll pay for this.
arlo_defeat#4: The last person to humiliate me like this was Candela. You’ll all pay for this...
arlo_defeat#5: I...I don’t understand... I never lose...
arlo_greeting#1: Oh? Are you here to challenge me? Don’t test me.
arlo_greeting#10: Pokémon are my tools, and winning is my birthright. Get in my way, and you’ll be crushed, vermin.
arlo_greeting#2: Are you the best that Candela and her little friends could find?
arlo_greeting#3: Tch... How dare riffraff such as yourself speak to me?
arlo_greeting#4: Only a fool would challenge me.
arlo_greeting#5: Team GO Rocket’s domination is inevitable. Submit and you may be spared.
arlo_greeting#6: Pokémon are our tools. We are entitled to power them up as we so choose. Commoners such as yourself would never understand.
arlo_greeting#7: My sole purpose in life is to win. I’ll vanquish whoever dares to get in my way.
arlo_greeting#8: Oh, do YOU think you can beat me? Someone of your standing? Hah!
arlo_greeting#9: What a fool you are to even think of battling me.
arlo_victory#1: Don’t be too disappointed. It was always going to end like this.
arlo_victory#2: I never lose. Now get out of my sight.
arlo_victory#3: If this is the best Candela and her little friends can offer, Team GO Rocket has nothing to worry about.
arlo_victory#4: If the rest of the Trainers of this world are like you, then Team GO Rocket’s success is assured.
arlo_victory#5: It was foolish of you to think you could beat me. It’s because of my brilliance that we have Shadow Pokémon!

bck_event_npc00_combat_quote__female_spe: Let me see if you are good enough!
bck_event_npc00_combat_quote__male_speak: Let me see if you are good enough!
bck_event_npc00_defeat__female_speaker_b: Don’t get cocky just because you beat me!
bck_event_npc00_defeat__male_speaker_bac: Don’t get cocky just because you beat me!
bck_event_npc01_combat_quote__female_spe: Bug Pokémon evolve young, so they get stronger that much faster.
bck_event_npc01_combat_quote__male_speak: Bug Pokémon evolve young. So they get stronger that much faster.
bck_event_npc01_defeat__female_speaker_b: My bug Pokémon lost! Oh, what a shame.
bck_event_npc01_defeat__male_speaker_bac: My bug Pokémon lost! Oh, what a shame.
bck_event_npc01_victory__female_speaker_: My grown-up Pokémon are pretty tough, too!
bck_event_npc01_victory__male_speaker_ba: My grown-up Pokémon are pretty tough, too!
bck_event_npc02_combat_quote__female_spe: Oh, you are a cute little Trainer! I like you, but I won’t hold back!
bck_event_npc02_combat_quote__male_speak: Oh, you are a cute, little Trainer! I like you, but I won’t hold back!
bck_event_npc02_defeat__female_speaker_b: Gosh... I thought you were weak...
bck_event_npc02_defeat__male_speaker_bac: Gosh... I thought you were weak...
bck_event_npc02_victory__female_speaker_: You must get better to beat me! Keep trying.
bck_event_npc02_victory__male_speaker_ba: You must get better to beat me! Keep trying.
bck_event_npc03_combat_quote__female_spe: I spent the spring with my Pokémon. Then summer, autumn, and winter... Then spring came again. We have lived together for a long time.
bck_event_npc03_combat_quote__male_speak: I spent the spring with my Pokémon. Then summer, autumn, and winter... Then spring came again. We have lived together for a long time.
bck_event_npc03_victory__female_speaker_: The one who wants to win the most will!
bck_event_npc03_victory__male_speaker_ba: The one who wants to win the most will!
bck_event_npc04_combat_quote__female_spe: My Pokémon and I are bound together by friendship. Our bond will never be broken!
bck_event_npc04_combat_quote__male_speak: My Pokémon and I are bound together by friendship. Our bond will never be broken!
bck_event_npc05_combat_quote__female_spe: I travel the world to train my Pokémon. Now, I wish to battle with you.
bck_event_npc05_combat_quote__male_speak: I travel the world to train my Pokémon. Now, I wish to battle with you.
bck_event_npc05_victory__female_speaker_: You are both kind and strong...
bck_event_npc05_victory__male_speaker_ba: You are both kind and strong...
bck_event_npc06_combat_quote__female_spe: I meditate under an icy waterfall each day to strengthen my mind and body.
bck_event_npc06_combat_quote__male_speak: I meditate under an icy waterfall each day to strengthen my mind and body.
bck_event_npc06_defeat__female_speaker_b: I wouldn’t lose to you in skiing...
bck_event_npc06_defeat__male_speaker_bac: I wouldn’t lose to you in skiing...
bck_event_npc06_victory__female_speaker_: Do you see how serious we are?
bck_event_npc06_victory__male_speaker_ba: Do you see how serious we are?
bck_event_npc07_combat_quote__female_spe: My chance of losing? Not even one percent!
bck_event_npc07_combat_quote__male_speak: My chance of losing? Not even one percent!
bck_event_npc07_defeat__female_speaker_b: I know my shortcomings now. Thanks for showing me!
bck_event_npc07_defeat__male_speaker_bac: I know my shortcomings now. Thanks for showing me!
bck_event_npc08_combat_quote__female_spe: Purple is such a noble and elegant color, don’t you agree? Quite befitting of a Champion.
bck_event_npc08_combat_quote__male_speak: Purple is such a noble and elegant color, don’t you agree? Quite befitting of a Champion.
bck_event_npc08_defeat__female_speaker_b: A well-earned victory. Truly, you are worthy of being called Champion!
bck_event_npc08_defeat__male_speaker_bac: A well-earned victory. Truly, you are worthy of being called Champion!
bck_event_npc09_defeat__female_speaker_b: A loss. The end. And in loss, we learn.
bck_event_npc09_defeat__male_speaker_bac: A loss. The end. And in loss, we learn.
bck_event_npc09_victory__female_speaker_: Spool of fate, unfurl. Respite in a swirling storm. Victory is ours.
bck_event_npc09_victory__male_speaker_ba: Spool of fate, unfurl. Respite in a swirling storm. Victory is ours.

blanche_incident_combat_quote__female_sp: The results of this battle will be insightful, no matter the outcome. I expect us both to deliver our best. Let us begin.

blanche_map_empty_warning|1: There are currently no active hideouts in the vicinity. Let’s search a different area.
blanche_map_empty_warning|2: There are no hideouts here, but my reports do confirm that there are more out there. Let’s head to other locations.
blanche_map_time_warning|1: No signals... I see. Perhaps their activities have ceased for the day. Let’s try again tomorrow.
blanche_map_time_warning|2: Let’s wait until morning. I doubt they’ll show themselves again for a while.

box_community_day: Community Day Box available in the shop
branch_bidoof_1a_description: By choosing this Bidoof, you’ll begin to encounter more Bidoof than normal. You’ll also receive research tasks that involve catching Bidoof. So many Bidoof!
branch_bidoof_1b_description: By choosing this Bidoof, you’ll encounter the Plump Mouse Pokémon, Bidoof, more often in the wild. There’ll probably be other Bidoof around, too. Yay!
branch_bidoof_2a_description: By choosing this Bidoof, you’ll encounter countless Bidoof and all the fun that comes with them.
branch_bidoof_2a_title: Choose a Pokémon with nerves of steel!
branch_bidoof_2b_description: By choosing this Bidoof, you’ll basically become a Bidoof magnet.
branch_bidoof_2b_title: Choose a Pokémon that nests alongside water!
branch_egg_bonus_description_key: Choosing this wish will grant you  1/2 Egg Hatch Distance for Eggs placed in an Incubator during Winter Holiday Part 2. You’ll be challenged with tasks such as catching Pokémon and hatching Eggs, and you may encounter Pokémon such as Galarian Mr. Mime!
branch_electric_rd_mar24_blitzle_descrip: Choose this option to encounter Blitzle after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_electric_rd_mar24_chinchou_descri: Choose this option to encounter Chinchou after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_electric_rd_mar24_electrike_descr: Choose this option to encounter Electrike after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_electric_rd_mar24_helioptile_desc: Choose this option to encounter Helioptile after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_electric_rd_mar24_joltik_descript: Choose this option to encounter Joltik after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_flock_together_rd_may24_doduo_des: Choose this option to encounter Doduo after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_flock_together_rd_may24_hoothoot_: Choose this option to encounter Hoothoot after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_flock_together_rd_may24_rufflet_d: Choose this option to encounter Rufflet after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_flock_together_rd_may24_spearow_d: Choose this option to encounter Spearow after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_flock_together_rd_may24_tailow_de: Choose this option to encounter Taillow after completing tasks during this Timed Research.
branch_flygon_description: Evolve your duo into a trio with Flygon! You’ll encounter a special costumed Flygon.
branch_gardevoir_description: Evolve your duo into a trio with Gardevoir! You’ll encounter a special costumed Gardevoir.
branch_lny_dai_bonus_description_key: Choosing this wish will grant you an additional 15 minutes of Daily Adventure Incense use during the Lunar New Year event, for a total of 30 minutes. You’ll be challenged with tasks such as catching Pokémon and using Daily Adventure Incense, and you may encounter Pokémon such as Galarian Darumaka!
branch_lny_egg_bonus_description_key: Choosing this wish will grant you 1/2 Egg Hatch Distance when Eggs are placed in an Incubator during the Lunar New Year event. You’ll be challenged with tasks such as catching Pokémon and hatching Eggs, and you may encounter Pokémon such as Galarian Darumaka!
branch_lny_stardust_bonus_description_ke: Choosing this wish will grant you 2× Stardust for catching Pokémon for the duration of the Lunar New Year event. You’ll be challenged with tasks such as catching Pokémon and earning Stardust, and you may encounter Pokémon such as Galarian Darumaka!
branch_may22_alola_1a_description: By choosing this path, you’ll be challenged with tasks related to friendship and earn rewards such as a Pom-Pom Style Oricorio Hat avatar item and an encounter with Alolan Raichu.
branch_may22_alola_1b_description: By choosing this path, you’ll be challenged with tasks related to exploring and earn rewards such as a Pa’u Style Oricorio Hat avatar item and an encounter with Alolan Marowak.
branch_may22_alola_1c_description: By choosing this path, you’ll be challenged with tasks related to catching Pokémon and earn rewards such as a Baile Style Oricorio Hat avatar item and an encounter with Alolan Vulpix.
branch_may22_alola_1d_description: By choosing this path, you’ll be challenged with tasks related to battling and earn rewards such as a Sensu Style Oricorio Hat avatar item and an encounter with Alolan Exeggutor.
branch_megav3_1a_description: By choosing Venusaur, you’ll be able to earn Venusaur Mega Energy and encounter Venusaur later!
branch_megav3_1b_description: By choosing Charizard, you’ll be able to earn Charizard Mega Energy and encounter Charizard later!
branch_megav3_1c_description: By choosing Blastoise, you’ll be able to earn Blastoise Mega Energy and encounter Blastoise later!
branch_ponyta_description: Add Galarian Ponyta to your band! You’ll encounter a special costumed Galarian Ponyta.
branch_pop_star_description: Pikachu will dress up as a pop star for your show. You’ll encounter Pikachu Pop Star and hear special pop-inspired music during Pokémon GO Fest 2021.
branch_rock_star_description: Pikachu will dress up as a rock star for your show. You’ll encounter Pikachu Rock Star and hear special rock-inspired music during Pokémon GO Fest 2021.
branch_searching_gold_june23_barboach_de: Choose this option to encounter Barboach as a reward when you complete tasks in this Timed Research.
branch_searching_gold_june23_caterpie_de: Choose this option to encounter Caterpie as a reward when you complete tasks in this Timed Research.
branch_searching_gold_june23_magikarp_de: Choose this option to encounter Magikarp as a reward when you complete tasks in this Timed Research.
branch_searching_gold_june23_nosepass_de: Choose this option to encounter Nosepass as a reward when you complete tasks in this Timed Research.
branch_searching_gold_june23_sableye_des: Choose this option to encounter Sableye as a reward when you complete tasks in this Timed Research.
branch_stardust_bonus_description_key: Choosing this wish will grant you 2× Stardust for catching Pokémon for the duration of Winter Holiday Part 2. You’ll be challenged with tasks such as catching Pokémon and earning Stardust, and you may encounter Pokémon such as Galarian Mr. Mime!
branch_valentines2023_candy_bonus_descri: Choosing this wish will grant you 2× Candy for catching Pokémon during the Valentine’s Day event. You’ll be challenged with tasks such as catching Pokémon and using Pinap Berries, and you may encounter Frillish!
branch_valentines2023_dai_bonus_descript: Choosing this wish will grant you an additional 15 minutes of Daily Adventure Incense use during the Valentine’s Day event, for a total of 30 minutes each day. You’ll be challenged with tasks such as catching Pokémon and using Daily Adventure Incense, and you may encounter Frillish!
branch_valentines2023_xp_bonus_descripti: Choosing this wish will grant you 2× XP for catching Pokémon during the Valentine’s Day event. You’ll be challenged with tasks such as catching Pokémon and earning XP, and you may encounter Frillish!
branch_xp_bonus_description_key: Choosing this wish will grant you 2× XP for catching Pokémon for the duration of Winter Holiday Part 2. You’ll be challenged with tasks such as catching Pokémon and earning XP, and you may encounter Pokémon such as Galarian Mr. Mime!
branch_zigzagoon_description: Add Galarian Zigzagoon to your band! You’ll encounter a special costumed Galarian Zigzagoon.
branching_quest_choice_gui_description: Choose wisely! You can select only one path below, and you’ll remain on that path until the end of the research.
branching_quests_tut_description: Some research presents choices that can lead to different challenges and rewards. Your experience might change based on choices you make!

bread_battle_tutorial_description_0: Defeat powerful Dynamax and Gigantamax Pokémon for a chance to catch them.
bread_battle_tutorial_description_1: Defeat the Power Spot Boss before it defeats all your team’s Pokémon.
bread_battle_tutorial_description_2: Attack the boss to fill up the meter at the top of the screen. When the meter is full, your Pokémon will Dynamax or Gigantamax!
bread_battle_tutorial_description_3: Swipe to collect energy to fill the meter faster.
bread_battle_tutorial_description_4: When Dynamaxed or Gigantamaxed, your Pokémon can use special moves.

bread_station_defeat_success: You defeated this Power Spot Boss!
bread_station_defeat_success_description: Pick a Pokémon to place at this Power Spot to earn Candy and assist in battles. You can recall your Pokémon at any time.
bread_station_failure_description: This Power Spot has reached its limit for placed Pokémon.
bread_station_failure_description_duplic: You have already placed a Pokémon at this Power Spot.
bread_station_header_leaderboard_descrip: These Pokémon will assist in battle against the Power Spot Boss.
bread_station_mp_ftue_conversation_0: Wow, you found some Max Particles! I’ve heard these are related to the Dynamax phenomenon.
bread_station_mp_ftue_conversation_1: Could you track down some more Max Particles while I investigate further?
bread_station_nearby_tab_incomplete_ftue:
Your Nearby menu has been upgraded!

Visit Power Spots and explore to collect Max Particles.
bread_station_tutorial_message_0: Find powerful Max Pokémon at Power Spots.
bread_station_tutorial_message_1: Collect Max Particles from Power Spots. You can use them to take on Max Battles at Power Spots or unlock and level up Max Moves.
bread_station_tutorial_message_2: Defeat a Power Spot Boss for a chance to catch it! Max Particles are only used if you win the Max Battles.
bread_station_tutorial_message_4: After you defeat a Power Spot Boss, you can place a Pokémon that was in your battle party at that Power Spot to help other Trainers and earn Candy. You can place up to 20 Pokémon at different Power Spots.
bread_station_tutorial_message_5: You may encounter a Pokémon after visiting a Power Spot. Dynamax Pokémon might even appear if there are Gigantamax Pokémon placed at the Power Spot!
bread_stationing_error: There was an issue placing your Pokémon. Please try again.
bread_stationing_skip_modal_description: Pokémon placed at a Power Spot will earn Candy. You can recall your Pokémon at any time.
bread_stationing_skip_modal_title: Do you want to skip placing a Pokémon at this Power Spot?
bread_stationing_tutorial_description_1: Pokémon placed at Power Spots earn Candy based on how many battles they assist in and how long they remain. You can place up to 20 Pokémon at different Power Spots.
bread_stationing_tutorial_description_2: Your Pokémon will help others defeat the Power Spot Boss.
bread_stationing_tutorial_description_3: You may encounter a Pokémon after visiting a Power Spot. Dynamax Pokémon might even appear if there are Gigantamax Pokémon placed at the Power Spot!

buddy_multiplayer_deploy_invalid_positio: Try to find a larger flat area.
buddy_multiplayer_deploy_tutorial_descri: When you see yellow footprints, tap on them to bring your buddy into the scene. (If gray footprints appear, it means another Trainer’s buddy is too close, and you won’t be able to place your buddy.)
buddy_multiplayer_force_quit: An error occurred with the AR session.
buddy_multiplayer_freeplay_tutorial_0_de: Swipe your Pokémon to get it to face to you.
buddy_multiplayer_freeplay_tutorial_1_de: Your buddy will be happy to play with you!
buddy_multiplayer_freeplay_tutorial_2_de: Tap on your buddy to get its attention. Your buddy will interact with you in a variety of ways based on your tap count. (Interaction may be limited if your Buddy Level is low.)
buddy_multiplayer_group_photo_buddy_foll: Your buddy is following the photo leader right now.
buddy_multiplayer_group_photo_disable_in: Your buddy is focusing on taking a group photo right now.
buddy_multiplayer_group_photo_mode_on: Group Photo mode is turned on!
buddy_multiplayer_group_photo_tutorial_d: In Group Photo mode, the Trainer who enables this mode becomes the photo leader. Pokémon will focus on the photo leader, making it easier to capture creative photos. Trainers in the group who are not the photo leader can still capture photos, but functions will be limited until the photo leader exits this mode.
buddy_multiplayer_guidance_deploy_pokemo: Tap to place your buddy when yellow footprints appear.
buddy_multiplayer_guidance_phone_movemen: Focus on an object and slowly move left or right.
buddy_multiplayer_guidance_surfaces: Slowly look around a flat, open area with your camera.
buddy_multiplayer_lets_play: Play with your friends and their buddies!
buddy_multiplayer_lobby_body_host:
You’re the group leader, so only you can see the swirls hinting at the hiding spots.
Give instructions to the other Trainers, and look at the same swirl together!
buddy_multiplayer_lobby_body_peer: Get instructions from the group leader to find the hiding spots!
buddy_multiplayer_lobby_full: This group is full. Try another group.
buddy_multiplayer_mapping_timeout: The current Buddy Group closed due to inactivity. To continue, please retry by scanning a Group QR Code.
buddy_multiplayer_peer_cannot_exit_group: {0} is the photo leader right now. Ask {0} to turn off Group Photo mode.
Someone else is the photo leader right now. Ask them to turn off Group Photo mode.
buddy_multiplayer_peer_taking_group_phot: {0} is trying to take a group photo.
Someone is trying to take a group photo.
buddy_multiplayer_qr_display_body: If everyone is gathered, tap the GO button.
buddy_multiplayer_quit: Do you want to quit the session?
buddy_multiplayer_quit_description: If you tap Yes, you will leave the group.
buddy_multiplayer_safety_warning: While using AR mode, make sure you’re in a safe location and any children are supervised at all times.
buddy_multiplayer_timeout_dialog_descrip: The current Buddy Group closed due to inactivity. To continue, please retry by scanning a Group QR Code.
buddy_multiplayer_tutorial_0_text: This feature needs sufficient lighting. Direct sunlight or a bright area is recommended for best results.
buddy_multiplayer_tutorial_1_text: Hold your device in an upright position. Make sure the screen is not facing the ground.
buddy_multiplayer_tutorial_2_text: Have all group members stand in a single row while holding devices upright.
buddy_multiplayer_tutorial_3_text: Find a single object for everyone to focus on while standing in a single row. The object should display in the center of your device’s screen.
buddy_multiplayer_tutorial_4_text: Focus on a single object and slowly move left or right together continuously. You’ll see a checkmark if you’re successful.
buddy_multiplayer_tutorial_4_title: Slowly move left or right together
buddy_phone_not_ar_capable_desc: Buddy AR is currently unavailable on this device.
buddy_quickfeed_deactivated: You can only use Quick Treat when your buddy is not on the map.
buddy_souvenir_beach_glass_description: Many Trainers like to carry a piece of beach glass like this as a lucky charm. Knowing this, some Pokémon like to collect pieces as gifts for their favorite Trainers.
buddy_souvenir_cactus_flower_description: A cactus fruit that bears some resemblance to fruit commonly found in the Desert Resort in the Unova region. A fun gift from a loving Pokémon.
buddy_souvenir_cactus_fruit_description: A cactus fruit that bears some resemblance to fruit commonly found in the Desert Resort in the Unova region. A fun gift from a loving Pokémon.
buddy_souvenir_chalky_stone_description: A small, whitish stone picked up at the edge of the road. Your buddy thought you’d like it!
buddy_souvenir_confetti_pieces_descripti: A colorful memento often found at special events. This confetti celebrates Team Mystic, Team Instinct, and Team Valor by using their identifying colors.
buddy_souvenir_flower_fruits_description: These fruits can’t be eaten, but some Pokémon enjoy collecting them regardless.
buddy_souvenir_increase: Buddy will bring you Souvenirs more often
buddy_souvenir_lone_earring_description: A lone earring. Its sparkle probably inspired your Buddy Pokémon to gift it to you!
buddy_souvenir_marble_description: A marble with colored glass inside. Your buddy was probably drawn to its intricate pattern.
buddy_souvenir_mushroom_description: Mushrooms similar to these tend to grow on Mushroom Pokémon, such as Paras. Some Pokémon enjoy collecting these as gifts for their Trainers. (Don’t eat them, though.)
buddy_souvenir_paper_airplane_descriptio: A small paper airplane made from a sheet of yellow binder paper. Your buddy hopes it will remind you of your time spent adventuring together.
buddy_souvenir_pikachu_visor_description: A stylish accessory worn by Trainers at special events to show their love of Pokémon. Pika pika!
buddy_souvenir_pinecone_description: A hefty pinecone that amuses some Pokémon. A surprisingly thoughtful gift from a friendly Pokémon.
buddy_souvenir_pretty_leaf_description: Many Pokémon like to collect these pretty leaves and gift them to their favorite Trainers.
buddy_souvenir_receive: Your buddy gave you a Souvenir: {0}!
buddy_souvenir_skipping_stone_descriptio: A smooth stone that is the perfect shape for skipping on water. It appears to be a sentimental keepsake from your buddy!
buddy_souvenir_small_bouquet_description: A small bouquet that was made with heart and soul for a single Trainer. It made your buddy think of you!
buddy_souvenir_stretchy_spring_descripti: A thin, small spring that’s totally stretched out.
buddy_souvenir_tiny_compass_description: Your buddy left you this compass so you can always find your way back to it.
buddy_souvenir_torn_ticket_description: A ticket, torn from use and with faded text. Your buddy probably just thought it was neat!
buddy_souvenir_tropical_flower_descripti: This tropical flower looks similar to those found in the Alola region. Some Pokémon love to collect flowers!
buddy_souvenir_tropical_shell_descriptio: A beautiful white shell that may have drifted from a sea in a warm region. Your buddy was probably drawn to its beauty!
buddy_swap1: Are you sure you want to swap your buddy?
buddy_swap2: Any current progress will be lost.
buddy_swap_limit_reached: You can’t swap buddies again today.
buddy_swap_question_best: Are you sure you want to swap a Best Buddy?
buddy_swap_question_normal: Are you sure you want to swap your buddy?
buddy_swap_warning_normal: You can swap buddies only once per day.
buddy_swap_warning_plural: You can swap your buddy {0} more times today.
buddy_swap_warning_singular: You can swap your buddy 1 more time today.
buddy_tutorial_basic_content_p0: Press {0} and give treats to your buddy so it can join you on your adventures. The more you and your buddy adventure together, the stronger your bond will grow, as indicated by the heart meter. Building a bond with your buddy will earn you Perks—your buddy might be able to find Souvenirs, show you interesting places, get a CP boost, and more.
buddy_tutorial_basic_content_p1: You’ll earn a heart for each {0} km you walk with your buddy up to {1} times per day. Walking distance is counted only while your buddy is walking with you on the map.
buddy_tutorial_basic_content_p2: When your buddy is hungry, give it a treat. You can earn a heart once your buddy is full.
buddy_tutorial_basic_content_p3: Playing with your buddy in AR mode will increase its happiness and can earn you a heart.
buddy_tutorial_basic_content_p4: Battling in Gyms, in raids, against other Trainers, or against Team GO Rocket with your buddy in your battle party will strengthen your bond and can earn you a heart.
buddy_tutorial_basic_content_p5: Capturing memories with your buddy by taking snapshots will strengthen your bond and can earn you a heart. Be sure to take your snapshot via the buddy screen!
buddy_tutorial_basic_content_p6: While your buddy is following you, spin a PokéStop or Gym you haven’t visited before, and you can earn a heart.
buddy_tutorial_basic_content_p7: Your buddy will give you presents and Souvenirs and discover various things during your adventure together. As a result, your bond will grow, and you can earn hearts as a bonus.
buddy_tutorial_candy_content: As you walk, you can earn Candy for the Pokémon you’ve chosen to be your buddy. If your buddy is excited, the distance needed to earn Candy will be reduced! Poffins will get your buddy excited faster than other treats!
buddy_tutorial_cpboost_content: This Pokémon has CP Boost, which is only applied when your current buddy is at Best Buddy level.
buddy_tutorial_feed_fill: Give your buddy treats until the meter is filled.
buddy_tutorial_feed_join: Your buddy has joined your adventure!
buddy_tutorial_map_p0: Your buddy has joined your adventure!
buddy_tutorial_map_p1: When your buddy is hungry, it will stop following you.  Track your buddy’s hunger with this meter.
buddy_tutorial_map_p2: Tap here to give your buddy treats so you can continue your adventure together!
buddy_tutorial_map_p3: Go on an adventure with your buddy!
buddy_tutorial_petting_content_p0: Swipe your Pokémon to get it to face you.
buddy_tutorial_petting_content_p1: Your buddy will be happy to play with you!
buddy_tutorial_petting_content_p2: Tap on your buddy to get its attention. Your buddy will interact with you in a variety of ways based on your tap count. (Interaction may be limited if your Buddy Level is low.)
buddy_tutorial_summon_conent: Find a flat surface. Tap the colored footprints to have your Pokémon appear at the selected position!
buddy_tutorial_welcome_content: Press {0} to give your buddy a treat. After a few treats, your buddy can join your adventures.
buddy_walk_xl_candy_increase: Increased Candy XL when walking with your buddy
buddy_widget_description: Use Adventure Sync to track your Buddy Pokémon’s heart meter when Pokémon GO is open in the background.
buddy_yatta_increase: Easier to get your buddy excited

candela_incident_combat_quote__female_sp: Your battle skills have improved so much since we first met. Let’s see which one of us comes out on top, shall we?

candela_map_empty_warning|1: Looks like we’ve scared ’em all off! Wanna try looking in a different area?

city_spotlight_2020_dialogue_1_0: It’s time to explore your city with your Buddy Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m excited to do the same with my trusty buddy, too.
city_spotlight_2020_dialogue_1_1: The places where we spend most of our time can become mundane. But with the right attitude and a friend by your side, anything can be an adventure!
city_spotlight_2020_dialogue_1_2: And even the familiar can hide exciting, new things to discover! Let’s GO and explore together, Trainer.

cliff_challenge#10: You? Defeat me? Not gonna happen.
cliff_challenge#2: You’re nothing more than a weak distraction.
cliff_challenge#3: I won’t let the boss down.
cliff_challenge#4: This’ll be a lesson you won’t soon forget.
cliff_challenge#5: This hero thing you’re trying? It’s about to come crashing down on you.
cliff_challenge#6: You’re a pest, and I’m gonna give you the boot.
cliff_challenge#7: Anyone who gets in my way gets destroyed.
cliff_challenge#8: This is for Team GO Rocket.
cliff_challenge#9: My loyalty gives me strength. I won’t lose!
cliff_defeat#3: Us Team GO Rocket Leaders will get you next time!
cliff_defeat#4: What? But I can’t lose! Boss, I’m so sorry!
cliff_defeat#5: This defeat only fuels my anger!
cliff_greeting#1: Cliff’s my name. Battling’s my game.
cliff_greeting#10: The boss has ordered that we crush all of you, and the boss’s order is above all!
cliff_greeting#4: A loser like you can’t beat Team GO Rocket.
cliff_greeting#5: You got a lot of nerve for a loser!
cliff_greeting#7: Do you think you can beat me?
cliff_greeting#8: Why stop the inevitable? Team GO Rocket will always win!
cliff_greeting#9: Why do you fight us? Team GO Rocket gave so many of us a community—a purpose. What’s wrong with that?
cliff_victory#1: Hahaha! What’d I tell ya? Of course I’d win!
cliff_victory#2: Yes! I hope you’re proud of me, Boss.
cliff_victory#3: Heh heh... That’s right. I beat you!
cliff_victory#4: I’d never let the boss down!
cliff_victory#5: That’s right! Team GO Rocket never loses!

combat_giovanni_quote#1: I will not tolerate your interference.
combat_giovanni_quote#2: You cannot stop me...but I’m amused by your attempt.
combat_giovanni_quote#3: Your professor has not prepared you for what is to come.
combat_giovanni_quote#4: You’ve made it this far. Let me see just how strong you are.
combat_giovanni_quote#5: You will never defeat Team GO Rocket.

combat_grunt_balloon_quote#1__female_spe: Don’t hate us ’cause you ain’t us.
combat_grunt_balloon_quote#1__male_speak: Don’t hate us ’cause you ain’t us.
combat_grunt_balloon_quote#2__female_spe: I’m actually really scared of heights.
combat_grunt_balloon_quote#2__male_speak: I’m actually really scared of heights.
combat_grunt_balloon_quote#3__female_spe: To be honest, I miss standing next to a PokéStop.
combat_grunt_balloon_quote#3__male_speak: To be honest, I miss standing next to a PokéStop.
combat_grunt_balloon_quote#4__female_spe: Flying a hot-air balloon is harder than it looks.
combat_grunt_balloon_quote#4__male_speak: Flying a hot-air balloon is harder than it looks.
combat_grunt_balloon_quote#5__female_spe: Have you seen any weirdos around lately? One with blue hair and one with magenta hair?
combat_grunt_balloon_quote#5__male_speak: Have you seen any weirdos around lately? One with blue hair and one with magenta hair?
combat_grunt_decoy_quote#10: What, did you think finding the boss was going to be that easy?
combat_grunt_decoy_quote#2: I can’t believe you fell for it!
combat_grunt_decoy_quote#3: In the name of the boss, I’ll destroy you!
combat_grunt_decoy_quote#5: It feels good to see you disappointed.
combat_grunt_decoy_quote#6: Wanna get to the boss, do ya? You’ll have to defeat me!
combat_grunt_decoy_quote#7: I’ll do anything to protect the boss!
combat_grunt_decoy_quote#9: Get lost! You’ll never find him.

combat_grunt_quote_dark__male_speaker: Wherever there is light, there is also shadow.

combat_grunt_quote_fighting__male_speake: This buff physique isn’t just for show!

companion_device_tips4_b: If you see multicolored lights, you successfully retrieved items from the PokéStop.

event_fashion_week_sept21_npc00_crafted_: Hm? You want to battle me?
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc01_combat_q: Which Pokémon do YOU think is most adorable?
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc01_crafted_: When I see a floofy Pokémon I just wanna hug it so tight! Eee!
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc01_defeat_q: Losing’s no fun, but at least I get to battle with these cuties!
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc04_combat_q: I’m just here to get stronger.
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc04_crafted_: People keep complimenting my training uniform for some reason.
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc04_defeat_q: I guess 20 miles a day isn’t gonna cut it.
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc04_victory_: When you train as hard as we do, winning comes naturally.
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc06_combat_q: And believe me—mine do more than just look pretty.
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc06_crafted_: Pokémon are like fashionable clothes—they bring a spark to your life!
event_fashion_week_sept21_npc06_defeat_q: But... But my Pokémon are so stylish!

event_gotour_2021_npc00_combat_quote__ma: What do you think of my outfit?

event_gotour_2021_npc03_victory__female_: Don’t let this discourage you—just keep trying!

event_gotour_2021_npc04_defeat__female_s: Look what you did to my poor, adorable Pokémon!

event_gotour_2021_npc04_victory__female_: Keep battling, and victory will come eventually!
event_gotour_2021_npc04_victory__male_sp: Keep battling, and victory will come eventually!

event_gotour_2021_npc06_victory__female_: A Pokémon Trainer never gives up. Just keep doing your best!
event_gotour_2021_npc06_victory__male_sp: A Pokémon Trainer never gives up. Just keep doing your best!

event_npc02_defeat__male_speaker: I learned a lot from that battle. Thanks!

A Raid Pass can be used to join a Raid Battle. You can get a pass at no cost once per day at Gyms if you don’t already have one.

If you want to participate in more than one raid per day, you may buy Premium Battle Passes from the shop.

Research rewards include: - Hot Cocoa Pose for your avatar - One Incubator, one Incense, and three Silver Pinap Berries - Encounters with Galarian Mr. Mime, Delibird, Cubchoo, and Pikachu and Psyduck wearing holiday attire ...and more! Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before December 31, 2023, at 8:00 p.m. local time. general1.ticket.2_holidaytr2023_descript: A ticket to access the two-part Winter Holiday Timed Research. Trainers can complete the Timed Research tasks and claim their rewards at any point until December 31, 2023, at 8:00 p.m. local time. Research rewards for Winter Holiday Part 1 include: - Event-themed Pokémon encounters, such as Spheal wearing a holiday scarf, Cryogonal, and the first peek at a new costumed Pokémon—Psyduck wearing holiday attire! - Two Premium Battle Passes. Research rewards for Winter Holiday Part 2 include: - Event-themed Pokémon encounters, such as Psyduck wearing holiday attire and Cubchoo wearing a holiday ribbon! - Two Premium Battle Passes. Purchasing this ticket will grant you Timed Research for both parts of the Winter Holiday event. Trainers who purchase this ticket during the Winter Holiday Part 2 event will receive the Timed Research for the first part of the event as well. Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before December 31, 2023, at 8:00 p.m. local time. Details can be found in the in-game News.

gifting_error_description:
We’re sorry.
Your gift was not delivered because the intended recipient obtained the same event ticket before your purchase could be completed. You can choose a different friend to send this to.
If you would like a refund instead, you can request one through the app store.
giovanni_challenge#1: Prepare yourself for a world of pain.
giovanni_challenge#10: I’d say to prepare for battle, but you have already lost.
giovanni_challenge#2: Humble yourself. You are facing the world’s greatest Trainer.
giovanni_challenge#3: If you insist on disrupting my plans, I will insist on making you regret it.
giovanni_challenge#4: You have no idea who you are challenging, child.
giovanni_challenge#5: You underestimate Team GO Rocket. Prepare for battle.
giovanni_challenge#6: There is no stopping my plans.
giovanni_challenge#7: Two things are inevitable: my success and your failure.
giovanni_challenge#8: You have proven yourself by reaching me, so I shall spare you a moment of my time.
giovanni_challenge#9: You may have made it here, but this is as far as you’ll go.
giovanni_defeat#2: Your love of Pokémon gave you the advantage...this time.
giovanni_defeat#4: This defeat is meaningless. Team GO Rocket will never fall!
giovanni_defeat#5: This isn’t over. We will meet on the battlefield again.
giovanni_greeting#1: I must say—I am impressed you got here.
giovanni_greeting#10: What’s this now? I hope you are a worthy opponent.
giovanni_greeting#2: I am the leader of this enterprise...Giovanni!
giovanni_greeting#4: How dare you?! You will pay for your insolence!
giovanni_greeting#5: Your Pokémon exist for Team GO Rocket’s use.
giovanni_greeting#6: I commend you for standing up to me, Trainer. I trust you’ll make this worth my time.
giovanni_greeting#7: You are foolish to confront me, but I’m impressed by your confidence. Let’s battle.
giovanni_greeting#8: My goal is beyond your comprehension.
giovanni_greeting#9: If you insist on confronting me, you will pay the price!
giovanni_map_collected: You found a Super Rocket Radar!
giovanni_map_collected_description: The Super Rocket Radar is a stronger radar that can find headquarters where the Team GO Rocket Boss might be!
giovanni_victory#2: As expected, Team GO Rocket cannot be stopped.
giovanni_victory#3: You cannot stop my master plan.
giovanni_victory#4: Do not try to interfere again.
giovanni_victory#5: You failed as soon as you challenged me, Trainer.
global_challenges_appearing: Global Challenges will appear during this event
global_day_1_ticket_0_0: %PLAYERNAME%! As great as it is to see you, I have troubling news to share.
global_day_1_ticket_0_1: I’ve been receiving reports of light and shadow behaving oddly in major cities around the globe, and now it looks like it’s happening everywhere!
global_day_1_ticket_0_2: It’s a strange phenomenon, and I’m worried about the safety of our world and all the Pokémon in it.
global_day_1_ticket_0_3: And as one of the most skilled and dedicated Trainers I know, I’ll need your help to shine some light on this mystery.
global_day_1_ticket_0_4: This is a crucial mission, %PLAYERNAME%. Can I count on you?
global_day_1_ticket_1_0: Ah, %PLAYERNAME%! Given all the bizarre occurrences taking place worldwide, we need to prioritize ensuring the safety and well-being of the Pokémon in our area!
global_day_1_ticket_1_1: And the best way for us to do that is for you to catch and befriend as many of them as you can!
global_day_1_ticket_1_2: That way you can monitor their behavior firsthand and report any unusual findings.
global_day_1_ticket_1_3: How about it? Ready to get out there and catch some Pokémon?
global_day_1_ticket_2_0: Thanks for tending to all those Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%. I’m still getting reports of shadows throughout the world behaving unusually, so it looks like our work has just begun.
global_day_1_ticket_2_1: I’d like you to survey the area and pay particular attention to any shadows you come across.
global_day_1_ticket_2_2: And while you’re out there, why not take the opportunity to hatch some Eggs?
global_day_1_ticket_2_3: Exploring is a great way to incubate Eggs and discover new Pokémon that could potentially aid our cause.
global_day_1_ticket_3_0: %PLAYERNAME%! Our investigation has yielded exciting results!
global_day_1_ticket_3_1: Given all our observations, the only logical conclusion is that we have Marshadow on our hands!
global_day_1_ticket_3_2: Marshadow is a unique Pokémon with the ability to conceal itself within any shadow.
global_day_1_ticket_3_3: It’s likely feeling very cautious right now. We need to consider our next steps carefully and approach from a place of understanding.
global_day_1_ticket_3_4: But I’m confident that with your patience and skills as a Trainer, you’ll be able to coax it out of the shadows!
global_day_1_ticket_4_1: Your efforts to create a comfortable environment for Marshadow are paying off.
global_day_1_ticket_4_2: Keep it up and I have a feeling we’ll see it out in the open before long. Wouldn’t that be an incredible sight?
global_day_1_ticket_4_3: Let’s continue to foster a welcoming atmosphere. With any luck, we’ll make a breakthrough!
global_day_1_ticket_5_1: We’ve successfully unraveled the mystery of the shadows, and it’s all thanks to your tireless efforts.
global_day_1_ticket_5_2: On top of that, we’ve made a brand-new friend! I’m sure that together, we’ll make even more incredible discoveries that continue strengthening the bond between humans and Pokémon.
global_day_1_ticket_5_3: I can hardly wait to see what exciting challenges await us next!
global_day_2_0_1: Necrozma is emerging from the Ultra Wormhole that marks the sky, and its hunger for light threatens to upset the delicate balance of your world.
global_day_2_0_2: I find myself in need of your skills and courage.
global_day_2_0_3: We must confront this disturbance to ensure that we are able to protect both humans and Pokémon alike.
global_day_2_2_0: %PLAYERNAME%, Necrozma has entered your world. Remain vigilant as we navigate these perilous circumstances.
global_day_2_2_1: As you engage with this formidable Pokémon, anticipate its actions and adapt your tactics accordingly.
global_day_2_2_2: Rely on the strength of your bond with your Pokémon. Trust in their abilities and the power of your shared resolve.
global_day_2_2_3: Your skill and determination as a Trainer will be greatly challenged, but I am confident in your success. Until we next meet.
global_day_2_branching_text: I have narrowed my focus, %PLAYERNAME%. I suspect we may learn much from certain Pokémon my radar has detected in the area. Which do you prefer to investigate?
global_day_2_crabrawler_branch_1_0: A wise decision. Studying Crabrawler will help ensure our readiness for the impending confrontation with Necrozma.
global_day_2_crabrawler_branch_1_1: Crabrawler is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for having pincers suited to both offense and defense.
global_day_2_crabrawler_branch_1_2: Observing these pincers may prove valuable in our forthcoming encounter with Necrozma.
global_day_2_crabrawler_branch_1_3: By studying Crabrawler’s techniques, we can gain insight into how to approach our own strategy.
global_day_2_ducklett_branch_1_0: A wise decision, %PLAYERNAME%. Studying Ducklett will help ensure our readiness for the impending confrontation with Necrozma.
global_day_2_ducklett_branch_1_1: Ducklett is a Water- and Flying-type Pokémon that splashes water with its feathers to allow it to escape from harm’s way.
global_day_2_ducklett_branch_1_2: By studying Ducklett’s tactics, we can gain insight into how to approach our own strategy.
global_day_2_ducklett_branch_1_3: Your findings will undoubtedly contribute to our understanding of how to best confront the challenges that lie ahead.
global_day_2_emolga_branch_1_0: A wise decision. Studying Emolga will help ensure our readiness for the impending confrontation with Necrozma.
global_day_2_emolga_branch_1_1: Emolga is an Electric- and Flying-type Pokémon known for scattering electricity as it soars through the air.
global_day_2_emolga_branch_1_2: This distinctive behavior causes other Pokémon to maintain a cautious distance.
global_day_2_emolga_branch_1_3: By studying Emolga’s tactics, we can gain insight into how to approach our own strategy.
global_day_2_ticket_0_0: Your presence brings me great relief, %PLAYERNAME%.
global_day_2_ticket_0_1: The threat that Necrozma’s hunger for light poses cannot be overstated.
global_day_2_ticket_0_2: Observe the cracks in the sky. Similar phenomena have been reported around the globe.
global_day_2_ticket_0_3: Necrozma emerges even now. Your world looks to us for a solution.
global_day_2_ticket_0_4: I believe that you, %PLAYERNAME%, are the only one with the skills and compassion necessary to confront Necrozma and catch it.
global_day_2_ticket_0_5: Let us combine our efforts to face this challenge. Together, I am certain we will triumph over even the darkest of threats.
global_day_2_ticket_4_0: Your return brings me joy, %PLAYERNAME%. I wish to illuminate what I know about Necrozma’s ability to fuse.
global_day_2_ticket_4_1: By fusing with Solgaleo or Lunala, it is able to change form and become either Dusk Mane Necrozma or Dawn Wings Necrozma.
global_day_2_ticket_4_2: We still have much to learn about this ability. I am eager to witness its results.
global_day_2_ticket_4_3: Your journey with Necrozma is far from over. You have my thanks for rising to the challenges of better understanding this fascinating Pokémon.
global_day_2_ticket_branching_text: I commend your remarkable feat. With Necrozma under your guidance, I encourage you to explore the mysterious phenomenon known as fusion. I see two paths forward—one of light, and one of shadows.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_1_0: I repeat my earlier sentiment of admiration—I knew my faith in you was well placed. By securing Necrozma, you have protected both the humans and Pokémon of your world.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_1_1: As you are aware, Ultra Wormholes are gateways through which Ultra Beasts can enter your world.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_1_2: I have also detected the presence of an immense power—the Legendary Pokémon Lunala.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_1_3: This Pokémon is known for its ability to convert light into energy. If fused with Necrozma, it could make for a most curious combination.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_1_4: I entreat you, %PLAYERNAME%, to seek out Lunala and forge a bond with this Legendary Pokémon.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_2_0: %PLAYERNAME%. Remain vigilant as we engage with these formidable Pokémon.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_2_1: Seek Lunala. Form a bond powered by your shared resolve to counter Necrozma’s darkness.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_2_2: Your skill and determination as a Trainer—and Lunala’s enigmatic powers—will be tested.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_2_3: You have demonstrated your capacity to rise to all challenges, and I have faith in this outcome.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_3_0: In capturing Lunala, you again demonstrate your unparalleled skill. A remarkable accomplishment, %PLAYERNAME%.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_3_1: With Necrozma also under your guidance, I encourage you to prepare for the phenomenon known as fusion.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_3_2: Such a transformation could be key to unraveling the mysteries surrounding Necrozma.
global_day_2_ticket_lunala_branch_3_3: We may yet learn how to aid Necrozma in achieving a greater sense of harmony and purpose.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_1_0: I repeat my earlier sentiment of admiration—I knew my faith in you was well placed. By securing Necrozma, you have protected both the humans and Pokémon of your world.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_1_1: As you are aware, Ultra Wormholes are gateways through which Ultra Beasts can enter your world.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_1_2: I have also detected the presence of an immense power—the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_1_3: This Pokémon is known for its incredible light, which illuminates even the darkest of nights. If fused with Necrozma, it could make for a most curious combination.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_1_4: I entreat you, %PLAYERNAME%, to seek out Solgaleo and forge a bond with this Legendary Pokémon.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_2_0: %PLAYERNAME%. Remain vigilant as we engage with these formidable Pokémon.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_2_1: Seek Solgaleo. Trust in its radiant light and the power of your shared resolve to counter Necrozma’s darkness.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_2_2: Your skill and determination as a Trainer—and Solgaleo’s power—will be tested.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_2_3: You have demonstrated your capacity to rise to all challenges, and I have faith in this outcome.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_3_0: In capturing Solgaleo, you again demonstrate your unparalleled skill. A remarkable accomplishment, %PLAYERNAME%.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_3_1: With Necrozma also under your guidance, I encourage you to prepare for the phenomenon known as fusion.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_3_2: Such a transformation could be key to unraveling the mysteries surrounding Necrozma.
global_day_2_ticket_solgaleo_branch_3_3: We may yet learn how to aid Necrozma in achieving a greater sense of harmony and purpose.
global_victini_dialogue_1_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%. As you know, I do a lot of research. There are just so many Pokémon to learn about and document!
global_victini_dialogue_1_1: Recently, I’ve been investigating Ralts, the Feeling Pokémon, to learn more about how this Pokémon senses people’s emotions by using the horns on its head.
global_victini_dialogue_1_2: It’s an amazing ability, don’t you think?
global_victini_dialogue_1_3: I thought studying this Pokémon’s unique sensing powers could help me identify the strange feeling that’s been stirring inside me these past few weeks.
global_victini_dialogue_1_4: I’ve realized, though, that this isn’t any ordinary emotion—it’s a type of energy!
global_victini_dialogue_1_5: This mysterious energy is filling me with hope and determination. I feel like I could take on any challenge and be victorious!
global_victini_dialogue_1_6: I would appreciate your assistance in collecting more information on this strange and fascinating phenomenon.
global_victini_dialogue_2_0: Thanks for completing the research we needed to get started, %PLAYERNAME%.
global_victini_dialogue_2_1: While you were catching Pokémon and visiting PokéStops, I started digging through my research and found references to a phenomenon that seems to have a lot in common with what I’ve been experiencing.
global_victini_dialogue_2_2: The reports refer to a Mythical Pokémon that shares the infinite energy it creates with others to guarantee victory.
global_victini_dialogue_2_3: The reports also state that this Pokémon is Psychic- and Fire-type. What an amazing combination!
global_victini_dialogue_2_4: To get closer to confirming the source of the energy, let’s focus our efforts on catching Pokémon that share those same types.
global_victini_dialogue_3_1: Thanks to your efforts researching Psychic- and Fire-type Pokémon, we’re well on our way to confirming the source of this mysterious energy.
global_victini_dialogue_3_2: There’s many a mystery surrounding our path forward, so I’ll keep poring over our research notes. In the meantime, I’d like you to work on becoming better friends with your Pokémon.
global_victini_dialogue_3_3: As a Trainer, strengthening the bond between you and your Pokémon is an important task that requires a specific set of skills.
global_victini_dialogue_3_4: To further develop those skills, why don’t you try spending time with your buddy?
global_victini_dialogue_3_5: Successful partnerships take work and dedication, and talented Trainers build lifelong friendships with their Pokémon.
global_victini_dialogue_3_6: That being said, be sure to spend time with your buddy every day!
global_victini_dialogue_4_0: You have a wonderful bond with your buddy, Trainer! It’s been a treat watching that friendship bloom. Now, though, it’s time to focus our efforts on the matter at hand!
global_victini_dialogue_4_1: After further examination of the research you completed, I’m convinced that the Pokémon we’re looking for is Victini, the Victory Pokémon.
global_victini_dialogue_4_2: Not only would this be consistent with the references to a Psychic- and Fire-type Pokémon, but it would also explain the mysterious surge of energy I’ve been experiencing.
global_victini_dialogue_4_3: It’s time for you to befriend Victini. Since this Pokémon represents victory, I think winning a few battles might inspire it to come forward!
global_victini_dialogue_4_4: I’ve been hearing reports that Team GO Rocket is causing trouble. Battling these troublemakers just might show this Pokémon you’re worthy of attention!
global_victini_dialogue_4_5: Let’s see whether some victory will attract the Victory Pokémon!
global_victini_dialogue_5_0: Absolutely astounding, %PLAYERNAME%! I knew you’d be able to display your powerful bonds and battle prowess to impress the Mythical Pokémon Victini.
global_victini_dialogue_5_1: It shares the infinite energy it creates when its body overflows with power, so I’m absolutely certain now that the energy I was feeling was coming directly from Victini!
global_victini_dialogue_5_2: Be sure to use this power wisely, %PLAYERNAME%, as you and Victini take on new challenges. But for now, your hard work calls for a celebration!
global_victini_dialogue_5_3: Why don’t you take a few snapshots with Victini and share your success with fellow Trainers by sending them some Gifts?
global_victini_dialogue_6_0: Once again, you have helped me uncover a huge discovery. I cannot thank you enough for your time and dedication.
global_victini_dialogue_6_1: The world of Pokémon is filled with endless discoveries, and it isn’t every day we come across a Mythical Pokémon!
global_victini_dialogue_6_2: I hope that you will take the lessons we learned together through this investigation and apply them to your training.
global_victini_dialogue_6_3: I’m proud of you, %PLAYERNAME%, and hope you continue to strive to be your very best. Until next time, let’s GO!
