gofest2022_sapporo_city_team_leader_desc: Specifically, an individual with long white hair.
It was mentioned that applied research could shed some light on your professor’s whereabouts.
As for how, I cannot say... But I trust that person’s expertise on the matter.
gofest2022_sapporo_city_ub_1: My data indicates that the Ultra Beast most likely to appear is UB-03 Lighting.
gofest2022_sapporo_city_ub_2: Some humans call it Xurkitree. They stand unmoving with their limbs stuck into the ground.
gofest2022_sapporo_city_ub_3: It must not be allowed to wreak havoc.
gofest2022_sapporo_city_ub_4: Be warned that this Ultra Beast is not easily subdued.
gofest2022_sapporo_city_ub_5: That is why I have prepared some Beast Balls for you.
gofest2022_sapporo_city_wrap_up_1: The ease with which you handled Xurkitree is enviable. It is a technique unfamiliar to me, and yet it comes to you naturally.
gofest2022_sapporo_city_wrap_up_2: I detected an odd signal when Xurkitree emerged from the Ultra Wormhole.
gofest2022_sapporo_park_pokemon: I have seen—let me consult my notes—Galarian Ponyta, Lapras, Makuhita, and Litwick...
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_1: Good night, Pokémon Trainer. No—is it good morning now?
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_10: Others have also expressed distress over his absence.
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_11: Specifically, a man with spiked hair and an apparent affection for the color yellow.
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_12: He has been conducting reconnaissance and seeking clues to your professor’s whereabouts by speaking to Pokémon Trainers assembled at raids.
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_13: Perhaps we can also venture to Gyms as we attempt to locate the Ultra Wormhole. Those gathered may help direct our search.
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_2: Temporal expressions aside, I am struck by our surroundings.
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_3: This is quite a bustling place.
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_4: Which makes my recent readings all the more distressing. I have detected signals that indicate the inevitable appearance of an Ultra Wormhole.
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_5: We must locate it and prepare for the emergence of another Ultra Beast.
gofest2022_seattle_city_1_7: I have also not forgotten about your missing professor.
gofest2022_seattle_city_2_1: How brightly glass glistens when touched by the sun...
gofest2022_seattle_city_2_2: Apologies. Even the mundane becomes novel in this abundant light.
gofest2022_seattle_city_2_3: But I digress. Have you seen any additional anomalies on your patrol?
gofest2022_seattle_city_2_4: In an area this large, I cannot pinpoint the exact location from which an Ultra Wormhole will originate.
gofest2022_seattle_city_2_5: We can only rely on our own visual surveillance.
gofest2022_seattle_city_2_6: I wonder if the items provided by your PokéStops might help us prepare for the Ultra Wormhole’s impending arrival.
gofest2022_seattle_city_2_7: It would befit us to gather as much aid as possible.
gofest2022_seattle_city_3_1: Pokémon Trainer. Indulge me in a moment of introspection.
gofest2022_seattle_city_3_2: To me, the humans here are exceedingly fortunate.
gofest2022_seattle_city_3_3: Even with all our technology, my home is not at all like this.
gofest2022_seattle_city_3_5: Yet here, light spills from the smallest things—such as your Incubators and their Eggs.
gofest2022_seattle_city_3_6: If you can forgive another imposition, will you show me the effect of an Incubator once again?
gofest2022_seattle_city_3_7: I wish to see its light.
gofest2022_seattle_city_4_1: Pokémon Trainer. I have located the Ultra Wormhole.
gofest2022_seattle_city_4_2: The appearance of an Ultra Beast is imminent.
gofest2022_seattle_city_4_3: Fortunately, you and I have a history of contending with such situations.
gofest2022_seattle_city_4_4: My data indicates that the Ultra Beast most likely to appear is UB-02 Absorption.
gofest2022_seattle_city_4_5: Some humans call it Buzzwole. It seems to enjoy displaying its robust musculature.
gofest2022_seattle_city_4_6: It must not be allowed to wreak havoc.
gofest2022_seattle_city_4_7: Be warned that this Ultra Beast is not easily subdued.
gofest2022_seattle_city_4_8: That is why I have prepared some Beast Balls for you.
gofest2022_seattle_city_4_9: They are a type of ball specifically designed to capture Ultra Beasts.
gofest2022_seattle_city_5_1: You impress me yet again, Pokémon Trainer.
gofest2022_seattle_city_5_10: Until that time, I release you to your festivities. The light of your celebration beckons.
gofest2022_seattle_city_5_2: The ease with which you handled Buzzwole is enviable. It is a technique unfamiliar to me, and yet it comes to you naturally.
gofest2022_seattle_city_5_3: Now, I have an update to share.
gofest2022_seattle_city_5_4: I detected an odd signal when Buzzwole emerged from the Ultra Wormhole.
gofest2022_seattle_city_5_6: Using it, I can better investigate where within Ultra Space your Professor Willow may be.
gofest2022_seattle_city_5_7: I will continue to do what I can to expedite his recovery.
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_1: Pokémon Trainer. Good...morning? Or is it the evening?
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_10: Perhaps we should both patrol the area to familiarize ourselves with its geography and identify any emerging irregularities.
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_11: Come, Pokémon Trainer. Let us begin.
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_2: I am still growing accustomed to the cycles of this world.
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_3: But enough about time—let us focus on space. Prior to your arrival, I was surveying the area for Ultra Wormholes.
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_4: Though I find myself getting lost in the atmosphere around us.
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_5: Trainers are gathering here en masse...
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_6: Ah. So it’s a festival to celebrate the Pokémon Trainers of this world.
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_7: And since you are present, I assume you mean to participate.
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_8: Do enjoy, then. But I would caution you to stay alert.
gofest2022_seattle_park_1_9: If an Ultra Beast were to appear amid such a gathering, chaos would ensue.
gofest2022_seattle_park_2_1: It is beautiful here. Dazzlingly so...
gofest2022_seattle_park_2_2: Ah. You have once again caught me in a moment of reverie, Pokémon Trainer.
gofest2022_seattle_park_2_3: I am continually struck by the radiance of this world.
gofest2022_seattle_park_2_5: You and your fellows are fortunate.
gofest2022_seattle_park_2_7: We should continue our patrol. After you, Pokémon Trainer.
gofest2022_seattle_park_3_1: This place has drawn a remarkable number of Pokémon—an astounding example of regional biodiversity.
gofest2022_seattle_park_3_2: One even attempted to approach me. Your world’s Pokémon offer friendship so effortlessly. If only the Ultra Beasts were as amiable.
gofest2022_seattle_park_3_3: I have seen—let me consult my notes—Lapras, Skorupi, Litwick, Rufflet...
gofest2022_seattle_park_3_4: Even my idle time has been illuminating. I discovered that Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon.
gofest2022_seattle_park_3_5: I noted this phenomenon from a distance.
gofest2022_seattle_park_3_6: Another benefit of your photographic observations. What else can be safely documented through them?
gofest2022_seattle_park_3_7: Taking snapshots of the unique locations in this area might answer this. It is “worth a shoot,” at any rate.
gofest2022_seattle_park_4_1: Pokémon Trainer, you mentioned that you and Willow were pursuing the Pokémon Shaymin before his disappearance, correct?
gofest2022_seattle_park_4_2: I recently overheard another Pokémon Trainer say that “upon taking in the scent of a particular rare flower, Shaymin is enveloped in light, and its tiny body transforms.”
gofest2022_seattle_park_4_4: I wonder if this transformation is akin to Evolution or if it is something else entirely.
gofest2022_seattle_park_4_5: There is so much I do not know about Pokémon, and yet you gift your knowledge to me freely.
gofest2022_seattle_park_4_6: Our time together has taught me much, and for that, I—
gofest2022_seattle_park_4_7: Wait. An anomaly is approaching. It almost resembles the description you gave of the Pokémon Shaymin, and yet with marked differences...
gofest2022_seattle_park_5_1: So, I have seen Shaymin and its transformative light.
gofest2022_seattle_park_5_2: And from within this light emerges another form.
gofest2022_seattle_park_5_6: You said Shaymin is drawn to gratitude. Do you believe it was my own such feelings that brought it here?
gofest2022_seattle_park_5_7: I am pleased that it recognizes my appreciation.
gofest2022_seattle_park_5_8: And I hope that appreciation is apparent to you as well.
gofest2022_seattle_park_5_9: With no proximate threat, you should return to your festival. I will keep watch.
gofest2022_sr_branch_battle_description: Complete tasks that focus on battling Team GO Rocket, participating in raids, and competing in the GO Battle League.
gofest2022_sr_branch_catch_description: Complete tasks that focus on catching Pokémon, using items, and nailing your throws.
gofest2022_sr_branch_easy_description: Take a more relaxed approach to the day, with a lighter selection of tasks. Rewards are the same for all three options.
gofest2022_sr_branch_explore_description: Complete tasks that focus on hatching Eggs, spinning PokéStops, and exploring your surroundings.
gofest2022_sr_branch_hard_description: Take a challenging approach to the day, with tasks designed to seriously test your skills. Rewards are the same for all three options.
gofest2022_sr_branch_medium_description: Take a standard approach to the day, with a full set of tasks to guide you through your adventures. Rewards are the same for all three options.
gofest2022_ticket_description:
A ticket to access the Pokémon GO Fest finale event on August 27, 2022, from 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. local time, wherever you are. Details coming soon.

YOU MUST PLAY DURING THE SPECIFIED TIME TO RECEIVE ALL THE SPECIAL EVENT BONUSES.
gofest2022_tundra_description: Catch these Pokémon during the Tundra habitat hour!
gofest2023_aquamarine_shores_description: Catch these Pokémon in the Aquamarine Shores habitat!
gofest2023_city_0_2: I’ve received reports of strange meteorites falling around the city. And where there’s unusual activity, unusual Pokémon usually aren’t far behind!
gofest2023_city_0_3: In this case, that Pokémon is Mega Rayquaza. You’ve probably seen glimpses of it already today!
gofest2023_city_0_4: You know, I’ve recently heard theories from other researchers that that upon seeing particular meteorites, Rayquaza will remember how to use Dragon Ascent.
gofest2023_city_0_5: But there’s something even more impressive about Dragon Ascent: it allows Rayquaza to Mega Evolve!
gofest2023_city_0_6: Isn’t that fascinating? It makes you wonder what makes some meteorites so unique—which is precisely why I’ve asked the team leaders to help me collect samples from around here!
gofest2023_city_0_7: Now that you’re here too, why don’t you join their search? You might even learn something about Mega Rayquaza along the way!
gofest2023_city_0_8: Preparation is key to any adventure, so I recommend you and your Buddy Pokémon grab a snack before setting out. You’ve got quite a day ahead of you, %PLAYERNAME%!
gofest2023_city_1_2: There’re so many Trainers here. All the hustle and bustle’s really firing me up!
gofest2023_city_1_3: But you know what’s firing me up the most? Two words: Mega. Rayquaza! Pokémon battles are my thing, and Mega Rayquaza’s got red-hot strength in spades!
gofest2023_city_1_4: In fact, Mega Rayquaza’s so powerful that some folks from the Hoenn region say it’s strong enough to repel both Primal Groudon and Primal Kyogre.
gofest2023_city_1_5: I’m burning  to see a Pokémon like that in action. Aren’t you?
gofest2023_city_1_6: Yeah? Then now’s our chance! It looks like Mega Rayquaza’s landed at that Gym over there!
gofest2023_city_1_7: My team’s raring to go. How about yours? Think they’re ready to test their mettle against a Mega-Evolved Legendary Pokémon?
gofest2023_city_1_8: One tip before you go: using a supereffective Charged Attack will help you turn up the heat in battle!
gofest2023_city_2_2: Are you helping Professor Willow find meteorites?
gofest2023_city_2_3: Same! And just between you and me, I’m taking a tour of the best food joints in town along the way.
gofest2023_city_2_4: I passed by what looked like a FIRE boba tea spot a minute ago. We’ll have to grab a sip once we’re done here!
gofest2023_city_2_5: But first, meteorites. I saw a couple fall around the streets here earlier. I’ll scoop up the ones back there, so how about you keep searching up ahead?
gofest2023_city_2_6: And don’t forget to pop an Egg in an Incubator before you go! No reason not to hatch while you, uh...catch? Meteorites, I mean. Just...pretend that made sense.
gofest2023_city_2_7: Now, I gotta run—boba’s on me later, bestie!
gofest2023_city_3_10: I have every confidence in you, %PLAYERNAME%.
gofest2023_city_3_2: I’ve arrived here by calculating where the next meteorite is most likely to land, taking into account radar data...
gofest2023_city_3_3: ...the planet’s trajectory, present atmospheric conditions, current Pidgey migration patterns, and so forth.
gofest2023_city_3_4: I assume you employed the same methodology?
gofest2023_city_3_5: No? You “just felt like coming here”?
gofest2023_city_3_6: Ah. I...suppose that works as well.
gofest2023_city_3_7: However you found your way, it’s fortuitous you’re here.
gofest2023_city_3_8: Mega Rayquaza has been seen dipping through the clouds nearby.
gofest2023_city_3_9: Since I have my hands full collecting meteorites around here, I recommend you spend your time observing Mega Rayquaza—perhaps even challenge it to battle, if you feel up to the task.
gofest2023_city_4_2: I see you’ve collected a couple meteorites. Stellar work! Haha.
gofest2023_city_4_3: Did you happen to encounter Mega Rayquaza while you were exploring?
gofest2023_city_4_4: Wonderful! As you might know, Mega Evolution isn’t just about channeling strength—it’s also about your bond with Pokémon.
gofest2023_city_4_5: You’ve worked hard learning more about Rayquaza and collecting those peculiar meteorites.
gofest2023_city_4_6: I’m sure Rayquaza is as impressed with your perseverance as I am! In fact, if you had the opportunity, I’m sure you’d have no trouble Mega Evolving Rayquaza yourself.
gofest2023_city_4_7: Now, that’s enough from me. Thanks for all your help with my research! Enjoy the rest of the day!
gofest2023_content_hashtag: Post photos with #PokemonGOFest2023, and we’ll share our favorites!
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_0_1: Welcome to another exciting day of Pokémon GO Fest, %PLAYERNAME%!
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_0_2: As if today weren’t already thrilling, I have an exciting bit of intel for you. Mega Rayquaza sightings are skyrocketing all over the world!
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_0_3: Can you believe it? Rayquaza usually inhabits the stratosphere, so seeing it is a real treat.
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_0_4: I wonder if it has anything to do with the meteor shower I saw earlier. Have you seen any of the meteorites that landed nearby?
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_0_5: I recently learned that if Rayquaza sees one of these meteorites, something mysterious happens. Oho—I’ll bet that piqued your interest!
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_0_6: I’ll tell you more after you’ve had a chance to see Mega Rayquaza—or one of those meteorites—yourself!
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_1_2: Did you encounter Mega Rayquaza? Or come across one of the unusual meteorites? I do believe I promised you a juicy tidbit about those strange space rocks!
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_1_3: As you may know, Mega Evolution is a transformation strengthened by your relationship with a Pokémon. But Mega Rayquaza is special—to Mega Evolve, it also needs to know the move Dragon Ascent.
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_1_4: And—get this—Rayquaza can only remember how to use Dragon Ascent after it sees certain meteorites. Amazing, right?
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_1_5: Now, there’s already plenty to do today, but if you find one of those inspiring meteorites and you’re confident in your bond with Rayquaza...
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_1_6: you may even be able to see this Mega Evolution for yourself!
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_1_7: Well, I’ve kept you long enough. Go ahead and jump into today’s festivities.
gofest2023_free_rayquaza_1_8: I hope your day is as incredible as you are, %PLAYERNAME%! Now let’s GO!
gofest2023_global_diancie_0_1: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%, and welcome to Pokémon GO Fest 2023!
gofest2023_global_diancie_0_2: You’ll never guess what I’ve found—another treasure map! This one looks like it leads to...
gofest2023_global_diancie_0_4: Whoops. Wrong map. Here—this one! It says it leads to “a treasure so beautiful, it surpasses all others.”
gofest2023_global_diancie_0_5: What do you think it could be, %PLAYERNAME%? A Pokémon? A sparkling gem? A giant lake full of ice-cold Pinap Juice?
gofest2023_global_diancie_0_6: There’s only one way to find out: by following this map!
gofest2023_global_diancie_0_7: The first step leads us to the PokéStops over there. Let’s GO!
gofest2023_global_diancie_1_1: Phew! Nothing like a brisk walk to get the blood flowing, eh, %PLAYERNAME%?
gofest2023_global_diancie_1_2: I saw you even caught a few Pokémon on the way here. I hope you let me have a look at them later!
gofest2023_global_diancie_1_3: Now, the map isn’t too clear on where to go next. Instead, there are drawings depicting some of the Pokémon found in the area.
gofest2023_global_diancie_1_4: If we follow one of them, maybe that’ll point us in the right direction!
gofest2023_global_diancie_1_5: And look—there’s a whole bunch of Pokémon just ahead. Let’s see if we can make a few new friends, shall we?
gofest2023_global_diancie_2_1: That’s quite the group of Pokémon you’ve caught, %PLAYERNAME%! So lively.
gofest2023_global_diancie_2_2:
They’re really putting the “fest” in Pokémon GO Fest!
...And the “Pokémon,” now that I think about it. Haha.
gofest2023_global_diancie_2_3: Seeing where they’ve led us, I’ve got a feeling we’re getting close to that treasure! Now, for the next leg...
gofest2023_global_diancie_2_4: Hm. I might’ve spoken too soon. This next stop looks pretty far away.
gofest2023_global_diancie_2_5: But isn’t that wonderful? We’ll be able to hatch some Eggs on the way there!
gofest2023_global_diancie_2_6: Your Buddy Pokémon might enjoy the chance to “stretch its legs,” so to speak. I know Meltan will. Er, even though it doesn’t technically have legs.
gofest2023_global_diancie_3_1: *huff* *huff* That was some distance we covered, huh, %PLAYERNAME%?
gofest2023_global_diancie_3_2: Need a little break? To be honest, I do—which is why I’m relieved our next step doesn’t appear to require movement at all!
gofest2023_global_diancie_3_3: Look here. The map has a drawing of an Eevee surrounded by its Evolutions.
gofest2023_global_diancie_3_4: I don't see any Eevee around, but one of its most unique traits is its ability to evolve into more than one Pokémon!
gofest2023_global_diancie_3_5: Maybe it means we should evolve some Pokémon of our own. It can’t hurt to try, right?
gofest2023_global_diancie_4_2: Look at all those pretty pink jewels! It’s enough to make my eyes gleam. That can only be the Mythical Pokémon Diancie!
gofest2023_global_diancie_4_3: I’ve heard other researchers say it’s the loveliest sight in the world—and now seeing Diancie for myself, I concur with their evaluation!
gofest2023_global_diancie_4_4: Some have even said that Diancie can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.
gofest2023_global_diancie_4_5: Picture it: Diancie sparkling in a shower of glittering diamonds! What a spectacle that would be.
gofest2023_global_diancie_4_6: All our work’s paid off. This Pokémon really is the most beautiful treasure of all!
gofest2023_global_diancie_4_7: But guess what? We haven’t even reached the end of the trail! There’s one step left.
gofest2023_global_diancie_4_8:
Hmm... Here’s what it says.
“If you would polish your gem to its most brilliant sheen, take a whetstone to whimsy and build boulders to bulwarks.”
gofest2023_global_diancie_4_9: Sounds a bit like it’s describing Diancie’s types, doesn’t it? I know—let’s power up some Rock- and Fairy-type Pokémon!
gofest2023_global_diancie_5_1: Is that another jewel, %PLAYERNAME%? No...it looks to be Mega Energy for Diancie!
gofest2023_global_diancie_5_2: Amazing! I can’t wait to see how Diancie changes when it Mega Evolves. I can only imagine it’ll grow even more beautiful!
gofest2023_global_diancie_5_3: Now, I’ve already spent a dazzling day with you, so I won’t ask you to continue our research right this second.
gofest2023_global_diancie_5_4: Instead, feel free to spend some time getting to know your new Pokémon friend—and if it does Mega Evolve, be sure to let me know what you learn!
gofest2023_global_diancie_5_5: Sound good? Good! You’re as much of a gem as Diancie, %PLAYERNAME%.

gofest2023_newyork: Pokémon GO Fest 2023: New York City
gofest2023_park_0_1: Great to see you, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m thrilled you can join me for Pokémon GO Fest!
gofest2023_park_0_2: We have quite the exciting day ahead of us! I’ve found something special...
gofest2023_park_0_3: a mysterious map of the park! It’s marked with a path of cryptic clues that look like they lead to something hidden—and sparkly!
gofest2023_park_0_4: Let’s follow it and see what Pokémon and treasures we find along the way.
gofest2023_park_0_5: Here’s the first clue: “Call companions out from under every rock and stone with citrine’s aroma.”
gofest2023_park_0_6: Hmm...citrine gems are orange. The same shade of orange as Incense, in fact!
gofest2023_park_0_7: How about we use an Incense as we explore the park? The Pokémon we find might just lead us somewhere special!
gofest2023_park_1_1: So this is where those Pokémon were leading us!
gofest2023_park_1_2: But the only treasure I see is the joy on the shining  faces of all these Trainers. Including yours, %PLAYERNAME%!
gofest2023_park_1_3: Maybe the next clue will give us more to go on.
gofest2023_park_1_4: This one reads: “Crystallize memories more glittering than gold, more valuable than diamonds.”
gofest2023_park_1_6: I scouted the park before you arrived, and I remember those spots had some stunning geology. The Pokémon inhabiting them looked happy as can be!
gofest2023_park_1_7: Even without this map, I was going to recommend that you see them for yourself! And as for crystallization, what better way to preserve a memory than with a snapshot?
gofest2023_park_1_8: Why don’t we follow the map and take pictures with our Pokémon?
gofest2023_park_2_1: Those snapshots you took are some real gems, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m planning to put this one I took of Meltan on my fridge.
gofest2023_park_2_2: But alas—no treasure yet! Onto the next clue. I’ve got a good feeling about this one.
gofest2023_park_2_3: “When searching for a glimmering jewel, keep your eyes sharp and your aim true.”
gofest2023_park_2_4: Now, I know you’d never let a Pokémon escape your notice...
gofest2023_park_2_5: But keeping steady aim when catching Pokémon can be a challenge, even for the most experienced Trainers.
gofest2023_park_2_6: Maybe this hint is testing our Poké Ball pitching prowess. Something tells me we’re close to discovering that “glimmering jewel”!
gofest2023_park_3_1: Wow! Is that the Pokémon I think it is, %PLAYERNAME%—the Mythical Pokémon Diancie?!
gofest2023_park_3_2: Amazing! Brilliant! Just look at those pink crystals shimmer!
gofest2023_park_3_3: Some say that Diancie’s glimmering form is the loveliest sight in the whole world, and I’m inclined to agree!
gofest2023_park_3_4: And the sparkles just keep coming! Diancie can instantly create diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.
gofest2023_park_3_5: Exceptional work, %PLAYERNAME%. But we’re not through yet!
gofest2023_park_3_6: Here’s our next, and last, hint:
gofest2023_park_3_7: “A trail of shimmering stardust leads to beauty beyond measure.”
gofest2023_park_3_8: Sounds to me like we’d better hurry and start collecting Stardust!
gofest2023_park_4_2: I’ve never seen this particular Mega Energy before, but I’ll bet it can be used to Mega Evolve Diancie!
gofest2023_park_4_3: Diancie is breathtaking as it is, so I can’t wait to see what happens when it Mega Evolves. I can only imagine it’ll grow even more beautiful.
gofest2023_park_4_4: If you do Mega Evolve Diancie, I’d better be first to know!
gofest2023_park_4_5: But we’ve had a long adventure already, and I don’t want to tucker you out before you get to explore the area yourself.
gofest2023_park_4_6: Thank you for spending the day with me, %PLAYERNAME%. I treasure  all the time we spend together.
gofest2023_park_4_7: I hope the rest of your day is as lovely as Mega Diancie! Let’s GO!
gofest2023_pyrite_sands_description: Catch these Pokémon in the Pyrite Sands habitat!
gofest2023_quartz_terrarium_description: Catch these Pokémon in the Quartz Terrarium habitat!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_0_1: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I was hoping I’d see you again today!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_0_2: Wow—just look at all these Pokémon. Do you think they’re here to celebrate Pokémon GO Fest too?
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_0_3: You’re right, they probably don’t know about our human parties. But Spark has been teaching me about vibes, and I suspect these Pokémon can tell the vibes are good!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_0_4: At any rate, there’s no sense in staying still when there are so many Pokémon we could be learning about!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_0_5: So what are we waiting for? Let’s get catching!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_1_2: While you were away, I noticed an unusual number of both Flying-type and Dragon-type Pokémon roaming about!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_1_3: This is just conjecture, but I wonder if they’ve somehow sensed that Mega Rayquaza is in the area. As you might know, Rayquaza is a dual Dragon- and Flying-type Pokémon.
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_1_4: You might also know that researchers from Hoenn have said that Mega Rayquaza can manifest sufficient power to repel both Primal Kyogre and Primal Groudon.
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_1_5: In myths, Kyogre and Groudon are said to represent the land and seas, so keeping the peace between them is no small task!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_1_6: Let’s power up some Flying- and Dragon-type Pokémon of our own.
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_2_2: After powering up those Pokémon, how do you feel? Dare I say...powerful? Why don’t you direct that energy toward challenging some Pokémon—maybe even Mega Rayquaza itself!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_2_3: A word of advice: Mega Rayquaza is weak to Ice-, Rock-, Dragon-, and Fairy-type moves. Keep that in mind as you plan your party!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_2_4: I’ve got a feeling Mega Rayquaza might appreciate the thought you put into showing it a good and honest challenge.
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_2_5: After all, we can always learn something from a friendly battle—just ask Candela!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_2_6: Although what I usually learn after battling Candela is that I shouldn’t try to battle Candela anymore...
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_2_7: Well, I hope she’s learning something from the experience, at least.
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_2_8: Now, get out there and show Mega Rayquaza everything you’ve got!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_3_1: Now that’s a job well done, %PLAYERNAME%!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_3_2: Battling is a great way to learn more about both your own Pokémon and the ones you challenge.
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_3_3: Maybe Mega Rayquaza’s learned a little something about you from that spar, eh?
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_3_4: In fact, given all the time you’ve spent with Mega Rayquaza today, I have no doubt that you’d be able to Mega Evolve Rayquaza if the opportunity arises!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_3_5: But first, as fun as battling can be, I’m sure your team’s a little tuckered out.
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_3_6: Let’s catch some Pokémon while your team catches their breath!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_4_1: Amazing, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m nearly tripping over all the Pokémon you’ve caught!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_4_2: And how are your Pokémon feeling? Ready to tackle the rest of the day?
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_4_3: Great! That’s what I like to hear.
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_4_4: So, what will you do next? Search for Mega Rayquaza? Track down an elusive Pokémon? Spend some time with your buddy?
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_4_5: All great options! Whatever you choose, thanks again for joining me for this year’s Pokémon GO Fest!
gofest2023_ticketed_rayquaza_4_6: I hope we can celebrate together again next year, wherever our travels take us.

gofest_2022_finale_2_2_1: A brilliant display, Pokémon Trainer. Before we continue, I have something for you.
gofest_2022_finale_2_2_2: Here—a small supply of Beast Balls.
gofest_2022_finale_2_2_3: Excuse me if I am repeating myself, but allow me a brief explanation.
gofest_2022_finale_2_2_4: Beast Balls were developed specifically to capture Ultra Beasts. Your assistance enabled me to fabricate them—I wish to help you as you have helped me.
gofest_2022_finale_2_2_5: I trust you will know the right time to use them. Now, let us continue our work.
gofest_2022_finale_3_1_1: Pokémon Trainer—I feel we are being watched. Could it be Team GO Rocket?
gofest_2022_finale_3_1_2: If they have been observing us, then do you believe they have plans that involve the Ultra Beasts?
gofest_2022_finale_3_1_3: This is a possibility we cannot ignore.
gofest_2022_finale_3_1_4: If only I could battle like you do... Until then, I must ask again for your aid.
gofest_2022_finale_3_2_1: Thank you for dispersing Team GO Rocket, Pokémon Trainer.
gofest_2022_finale_3_2_2: I am relieved to know that they have been removed from the equation.
gofest_2022_finale_3_2_3: Your strength is further appreciated given this world’s most recent arrival—UB-03 Lighting. Xurkitree.
gofest_2022_finale_3_2_4: It has been known to raid power plants, presumably to energize itself with electricity.
gofest_2022_finale_3_2_5: It would be disastrous if Xurkitree depleted the power in this area.
gofest_2022_finale_3_2_6: Let us do what we can to prevent this catastrophe.
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_1:
*yawn*
Oh, %PLAYERNAME%. Sorry I dozed off on you there—I hardly slept while I was away. Did anything interesting happen while I was gone?
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_10:
You and your Pokémon should go check it out. I’ll be here. Just give me a...minute...
*snore*
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_2:
... ... ...
Ultra Wormholes?
Ultra Beasts?
BEAST BALLS?!
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_3: Incredible! I can always count on you to unearth amazing things. You even helped bring me home!
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_4: In that space, there were times when my memories would blur together—but I swear I could feel the light of our world, and everything would rush back.
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_5: No, it was more than a feeling. It was like I was surrounded by a protective presence—warm like the sun and calm like the moon.
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_6: Even so, I don’t know how I would have returned if you and your new friend hadn’t intervened.
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_7: I’m always thankful for you, but this time, you really saved me.
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_8: Why, I could just hug you, %PLAYERNAME%!
gofest_2022_finale_4_1_9: Wait. Is there something in the sky? I’d investigate myself, but... *yawn* I suddenly feel like I lost a staring contest with a Hypno.
gofest_2022_finale_4_2_1: Pokémon Trainer, I saw you were able to speak with the professor. Is he in good health?
gofest_2022_finale_4_2_2: He felt something akin to light of the sun and moon, did he?
gofest_2022_finale_4_2_4: The important thing is that you and your Willow have been reunited. Endless musing is my proclivity, not yours.
gofest_2022_finale_4_2_5: Before we redirect our attention to the Ultra Beasts, I wish to take this opportunity to express what an excellent...erm...
gofest_2022_finale_4_2_6: I had intended to call you my “research partner,” but that feels insufficient. You are more than an assistant—you are my confidant.
gofest_2022_finale_4_2_7: Such a sterile title hardly suits a person as dazzling as you.
gofest_2022_finale_4_2_8:
So thank you, %PLAYERNAME%.
My partner...and my friend.
gofest_2022_finale_4_2_9: I look forward to whatever adventures await us next.
gofest_arlo_challenge#1: We’ve taken over your celebration, and you still insist on challenging me? Get ready to face the harsh reality.
gofest_arlo_challenge#2: Your festival is in the hands of Team GO Rocket now. You cannot defeat us.
gofest_arlo_challenge#3: I’ll defeat you quickly so I can return to the take-over festivities.
gofest_arlo_defeat#1: I was supposed to win! Everything went perfectly for our take-over!
gofest_arlo_defeat#2: This take-over was supposed to be my biggest event of the year. How dare you humiliate me like this!
gofest_arlo_defeat#3: This confetti now just reminds me of my failure. This won’t be the last you see of me...
gofest_arlo_greeting#1: Today, this event. Tomorrow, the world!
gofest_arlo_greeting#2: Now that we’ve taken over your little celebration, I bet Candela is worried. Good.
gofest_arlo_greeting#3: Seeing this confetti rain down and all my hard work pay off... It reignites my passion to defeat you!
gofest_arlo_victory#1: Look at me—I want to take a picture of this moment so I can revel in your disappointment later.
gofest_arlo_victory#2: If only Candela could see me now. We’ve taken over your celebration, and now I’ve defeated you!
gofest_cliff_challenge#1: I bet the boss is so proud of us for taking over this event! Don’t take this from us—I need this.
gofest_cliff_challenge#2: We’ve already taken over this event—now it’s time for the muscle to take you down!
gofest_cliff_challenge#3: Let’s finish this quick so I can join the other leaders and celebrate the take-over!
gofest_cliff_defeat#1: NO! We can’t lose our Team GO Rocket festival—we’ve come so far!
gofest_cliff_defeat#2: What just happened? Are we going to lose the event?
gofest_cliff_defeat#3: I can’t believe I failed the team.
gofest_cliff_greeting#1: Enjoying your little festival? Well, it’s a Team GO Rocket festival now!
gofest_cliff_greeting#2: Hahaha! I’m in a good mood today. This event is ours!
gofest_cliff_greeting#3: Team GO Rocket has come so far. We’ve finally taken over your big celebration!
gofest_cliff_victory#1: Hahaha, what a great battle! Happy Team GO Rocket festival! Time to celebrate with my Grunts!
gofest_cliff_victory#2: First we take over this big event, and now I win a battle? Best day ever!
gofest_cliff_victory#3: Winning a battle is a great feeling. It’s even better after a take-over!
gofest_giovanni_challenge#1: I do not think you are prepared for the level of failure you are about to experience!
gofest_giovanni_challenge#2: You should be afraid to battle me, especially since you are already too late to stop my take-over!
gofest_giovanni_challenge#3: You will regret trying to put a dent in my perfectly executed take-over. Your Pokémon will be mine!
gofest_giovanni_defeat#1: This is not the end. I will have my revenge.
gofest_giovanni_defeat#2: This festival will be mine one day. You will see—this is not over.
gofest_giovanni_defeat#3: You have only delayed the inevitable. I will win.
gofest_giovanni_greeting#1: I’m surprised you’ve been this successful, considering the foolish guidance your pathetic professor has given you.
gofest_giovanni_greeting#2: I’m impressed that you got by my leaders, Trainer, but nothing will prepare you for my Shadow Pokémon!
gofest_giovanni_greeting#3: At first, I was impressed by your dedication, but now you’ve become a nuisance. This festival is mine.
gofest_giovanni_victory#1: I hope you now understand how foolish challenging me was. You will never stop Team GO Rocket.
gofest_giovanni_victory#2: My incredible plan is going swimmingly. Move aside—this event is mine.
gofest_giovanni_victory#3: As expected. Run back to your professor—you still have much training to do.
gofest_grunt_challenge#1: Sure glad I got over that fear of heights... Oh, wait... What?
gofest_grunt_challenge#2: I’ve always wanted to see this event from the air! What a view!
gofest_grunt_challenge#3: Where do you think the boss got all these balloons?
gofest_grunt_combat#1: Talk about getting the high ground! Eh? Eh?
gofest_grunt_combat#2: I know I talked about moving up in the organization...but I didn’t think that would mean flying in a balloon...
gofest_grunt_combat#3: Do you think there are any of those Pikachu visors left? I’d like to get one as a souvenir of the take-over.
gofest_grunt_defeat#2: Get in a balloon, they said. It’ll be fun, they said. This is the worst event ever...
gofest_grunt_defeat#3: This confetti just makes me sad now. Worst event ever.
gofest_grunt_greeting#1: Caw, CAW! We’ve already taken the skies, and now we’ve taken your precious event, too!
gofest_grunt_greeting#2: Team GO Rocket’s balloon squad, reporting for duty! We’ve taken over this festival!
gofest_grunt_greeting#3: Wow! The confetti looks great from up here!
gofest_grunt_victory#1: Today, this celebration. Tomorrow, the world!
gofest_grunt_victory#2: I know you hate to see us take over your festival but love to watch us fly away.
gofest_grunt_victory#3: Can’t wait to fly around in my handy-dandy hot-air balloon and defeat other event attendees!
gofest_sierra_challenge#1: I didn’t even need to be here for this take-over. Just to make it worth my time, let’s battle.
gofest_sierra_challenge#2: I know I’ll be disappointed in your battling, so let’s just get this over with.
gofest_sierra_challenge#3: Might as well pass the time with a battle, considering your little event is ruined.
gofest_sierra_defeat#1: This must be a mistake. Failure isn’t an option.
gofest_sierra_defeat#2: You must have some kind of special power on your side that made you win. That’s the only explanation...
gofest_sierra_defeat#3: I can’t believe I lost to such an unworthy opponent! You’ll pay for disrupting our plans!
gofest_sierra_greeting#1: It’s almost silly that I’m here, considering we already took over this event.
gofest_sierra_greeting#2: Aww, you think the confetti is for you... Sorry, darling, it’s for our flawless victory.
gofest_sierra_greeting#3: You’ve already had your fun. This year, your little festival is ours!
gofest_sierra_victory#1: Oh surprise, surprise—I won. I wouldn’t expect anything less.
gofest_sierra_victory#2: See? Wasn’t that a silly waste of time? This celebration is ours!
gofest_sierra_victory#3: I’m sorry, darling—you lost. I’m afraid I can’t relate. I don’t know what losing feels like.

gotour2022_battle_description_keep_battl: All GO Gym Trainers will reappear at PokéStops, allowing you to battle them again. You can keep battling them for rewards throughout the day.
gotour2022_battle_description_stop_battl: The GO Gym Trainers will no longer appear at PokéStops today, allowing you to focus solely on collecting Pokémon.
gotour2022_battle_dialogue_0_0: It’s over, %PLAYERNAME%. Your strength is undeniable.
gotour2022_battle_dialogue_0_1: You are now the Johto Battle Challenge Champion!
gotour2022_battle_dialogue_0_2: Your dedication to, trust in, and love for your Pokémon made this possible. You won because your Pokémon believed in you, just as you believed in them.
gotour2022_battle_dialogue_0_4: What’re you going to do to celebrate this momentous accomplishment?
gotour2022_battle_dialogue_1_0: Quite the overachiever, %PLAYERNAME%! Your Pokémon look excited to keep battling as well. Together, you really are the perfect team. Get out there and make your team proud!
gotour2022_battle_dialogue_2_0: It’s important to know your limits, %PLAYERNAME%. Being kind to yourself isn’t a weakness.
gotour2022_battle_dialogue_2_1: And your Pokémon look like they could use a rest as well, so why not relax awhile. When you’re ready, there’s plenty of Pokémon to catch and new friends to make.
gotour2022_battle_leader_guidance: Tip: Earn Stardust to battle the Johto Battle Challenge Leader!
gotour2022_beast_guidance: Raikou, Entei, and Suicune will flee from you when encountered in the wild. Take a snapshot before they do!
gotour2022_challenger_bug_azalea_loss: My bug Pokémon lost! Oh, what a shame.
gotour2022_challenger_bug_azalea_prebatt: Bug Pokémon are cool and tough! I’ll prove it to you!
gotour2022_challenger_bug_azalea_quest: Defeat the GO Gym Trainer: Bug
gotour2022_challenger_bug_azalea_quote: Bug Pokémon evolve young, so they get stronger that much faster.
gotour2022_challenger_bug_azalea_victory: My grown-up Pokémon are pretty tough, too!
gotour2022_challenger_dragon_blackthorn_: I know my shortcomings now. Thanks for showing me!
My chance of losing? Not even one percent!
Defeat the GO Gym Trainer: Dragon
Dragons are sacred Pokémon. They are full of life energy. If you’re not serious, you won’t be able to beat them.
gotour2022_challenger_fighting_cianwood_: Words are useless. Let your fists do the talking!
Defeat the GO Gym Trainer: Fighting
My Pokémon and I are bound together by friendship. Our bond will never be broken!
gotour2022_challenger_flying_violet_loss: Don’t get cocky just because you beat me!
gotour2022_challenger_flying_violet_preb: The keyword is guts! Come on!
gotour2022_challenger_flying_violet_ques: Defeat the GO Gym Trainer: Flying
gotour2022_challenger_flying_violet_quot: Let me see if you are good enough!
gotour2022_challenger_ghost_ecruteak_que: Defeat the GO Gym Trainer: Ghost
gotour2022_challenger_ghost_ecruteak_quo: I spent the spring with my Pokémon. Then summer, autumn, and winter... Then spring came again. We have lived together for a long time.
gotour2022_challenger_ghost_ecruteak_vic: The one who wants to win the most will!
gotour2022_challenger_ice_mahogany_loss: I wouldn’t lose to you in skiing...
gotour2022_challenger_ice_mahogany_preba: I’ll freeze your Pokémon so you can’t do a thing!
gotour2022_challenger_ice_mahogany_quest: Defeat the GO Gym Trainer: Ice
gotour2022_challenger_ice_mahogany_quote: I meditate under an icy waterfall each day to strengthen my mind and body.
gotour2022_challenger_ice_mahogany_victo: Do you see how serious we are?
gotour2022_challenger_normal_goldenrod_l: Gosh... I thought you were weak...
gotour2022_challenger_normal_goldenrod_p: I like cute Pokémon better than strong Pokémon. But I have strong and cute Pokémon!
gotour2022_challenger_normal_goldenrod_q: Defeat the GO Gym Trainer: Normal
Aw, look at you! Such a cute little Trainer. I like you, but I won’t hold back!
gotour2022_challenger_normal_goldenrod_v: You must get better to beat me! Keep trying.
gotour2022_challenger_steel_olivine_preb: Nobody better get in my way!
gotour2022_challenger_steel_olivine_ques: Defeat the GO Gym Trainer: Steel
gotour2022_challenger_steel_olivine_quot: I travel the world to train my Pokémon. Now, I wish to battle with you.
gotour2022_challenger_steel_olivine_vict: You are both kind and strong...

gotour_2023_arlo_combat_quote: Remember: I’m only here because Giovanni asked.
gotour_2023_arlo_defeat_quote: That win didn’t count. Now get going already!
gotour_2023_arlo_pre_combat_quote: Don’t you have something better to do? Ugh.
gotour_2023_cliff_battle_quote: Now show me what you’re made of!
gotour_2023_cliff_combat_quote: Too bad you’ll be losing this battle!
gotour_2023_cliff_defeat_quote: At least your strength is being used for the boss’s benefit.
gotour_2023_giovanni_combat_quote: I’ll remind you and your Pokémon of your place.
gotour_2023_giovanni_defeat_quote: Don’t just stand there. Get back to work.
gotour_2023_giovanni_victory_quote: This little alliance means nothing in the long run.
gotour_2023_grunt_1_combat_quote__male_s: I’m just helping you get stronger! Heh heh!
gotour_2023_grunt_1_defeat_quote: We’re on the same side today, so it’s not like I really lost, right?
gotour_2023_grunt_1_pre_combat_quote__ma: Just because we’re teaming up doesn’t mean we can’t have a little friendly competition!
gotour_2023_grunt_2_defeat_quote: Uh... Congratulations, you passed my test!
gotour_2023_grunt_2_pre_combat_quote__fe: They say we’re working together today. Let me test your skills!
gotour_2023_grunt_2_victory_quote: That’s a zero for you, newbie!
gotour_2023_grunt_3_defeat_quote: It was just a joke! Quit taking everything so seriously!
gotour_2023_grunt_3_pre_combat_quote: I’d never dream of battling you! We’re on the same side now.
gotour_2023_grunt_3_victory_quote: I love the element of surprise!
gotour_2023_sierra_battle_quote: Don’t look so surprised, dear. Ours is only a temporary truce.
gotour_2023_sierra_defeat_quote: This won’t happen again. Now shoo!
gotour_2023_sierra_pre_combat_quote: You look like you’ve got some fight in your eyes.
gotour_2023_sierra_victory_quote: Did you think I’d go easy on you today?
gotour_2024_arlo_defeat: As I thought. You have nothing to offer.
gotour_2024_arlo_greeting: Do you have the skill to justify your foolish pride?
gotour_2024_arlo_victory: Tch... At least now I can study the source of your strength.
gotour_2024_cliff_defeat: I was wrong to expect anything from a weakling like you.
gotour_2024_cliff_greeting: Don’t forget, this is all for Team GO Rocket!
gotour_2024_cliff_victory: You better use that strength to help the boss!
gotour_2024_giovanni_defeat: You see? This power is rightfully mine to command.
gotour_2024_giovanni_greeting: I knew you would bring us back. All has gone according to plan. Now give me that Legendary Pokémon.
gotour_2024_giovanni_victory: I have traveled across time and space to pursue strength, but still you prove stronger...
gotour_2024_sierra_defeat: How disappointing. Train harder, and one day you might be of use to us.
gotour_2024_sierra_victory: A pity this alliance is temporary... You’d reach such heights if you joined Team GO Rocket.

gotour_kanto_sr_title_1: GO Tour Kanto: A Trainer’s Journey (1/8)
gotour_kanto_sr_title_2: GO Tour Kanto: A Trainer’s Journey (2/8)

gotour_kanto_sr_title_8: GO Tour Kanto: A Trainer's Journey (8/8)
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_1_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! Check this out—I’ve been practicing.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_1_1: Hello there! Welcome to the world of Pokémon GO! My name is Willow. People call me the Pokémon Prof!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_1_2: This world is inhabited by creatures called Pokémon! Some people keep Pokémon as companions. Others have them do battle. Myself? I study Pokémon as a profession.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_1_3: Did that remind you of anyone? For many years, Trainers from Kanto have heard similar remarks before embarking on their journeys through the region.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_1_4: I have the honor of making them today because you’re about to head out on your own Kanto-inspired journey.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_1_5: But we can’t have you leaving unprepared! I’ve put together some supplies I think you’ll find useful.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_2_0: Berries, Potions, and Poké Balls. Looks like you’re all set!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_2_1: As you begin today’s adventure, try to imagine you’re stepping straight into the tall grass of Kanto.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_2_2: I have a feeling you’ll meet a Pokémon that will make a wonderful partner on your journey. Be sure to take some snapshots of the Pokémon you encounter along the way!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_2_3: On adventures, I find it’s helpful to document not only your findings but also your memories. And I’m sure you’ll make plenty of both!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_2_4: Now, in the words of a wise professor: Your very own Pokémon legend is about to unfold! A world of dreams and adventures with Pokémon awaits! Let's GO!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_3_0: How’s your journey going, %PLAYERNAME%? Oh! Found a partner Pokémon to join you, eh? Wonderful work.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_3_1: In the Kanto region, Trainers are often presented with three options when it comes to their first partner Pokémon.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_3_2: The first is Bulbasaur, the Seed Pokémon, #001 in the Pokédex. This Grass-type Pokémon has a plant seed on its back right from the day it’s born.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_3_3: Another option is Charmander, the Lizard Pokémon. It’s a Fire-type Pokémon, and it has a flame on its tail that shows the strength of its life force.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_3_4: Last—but certainly not least—is Squirtle, the Tiny Turtle Pokémon. After birth, this Water-type Pokémon's back swells and hardens into a shell.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_3_5: Each of these Pokémon have their strengths and weaknesses, so be sure to study up! For now, though, it’s time to get back to your adventure.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_3_6: I’d like you to spend some time with your buddy. The relationship between a Trainer and their Pokémon is of utmost importance!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_3_7: How about going on a walk together? I always enjoy exploring with my buddy!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_4_0: Wonderful work, Trainer! Glad to see you’re growing closer to your buddy. Keep it up, and you’ll become even closer in no time.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_4_1: When it comes to being a Trainer, people often talk about catching techniques or battle strategies, but I find that friendship is just as essential.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_4_2: Not only are the relationships you build with your Pokémon incredibly important, but so are the friendships you build with other Trainers.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_4_3: Your personal journeys and goals may vary, but at the end of the day, you’re all Trainers! You should do your best to connect with the other Trainers you meet on your travels.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_4_4: In that spirit, how about sending your friends some Gifts to brighten their day? I’m sure they’d love to hear from you!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_5_0: Welcome back, Trainer! Hope you enjoyed connecting with other Trainers. I see you were even able to trade a few Pokémon!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_5_1: Trading is a fabulous way to acquire Pokémon you might not have otherwise encountered.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_5_2: And not only do you get a new entry in your Pokédex, but you also get a new friend!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_5_3: You’ve already made great progress on your journey. I think it’s time to show off the skills you’ve learned along the way!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_5_4: How about showcasing your throwing expertise by catching some Pokémon? Don’t forget to make use of your Berries, too.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_5_5: I’m especially fond of Pinap Berries. They help you earn extra Candy for the Pokémon you’re catching—and they’re tasty to boot!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_6_0: I’m sure I had a stash of Pinap Berries here somewhere... Oh! Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! Guess my snack will have to wait.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_6_1: I’ve been checking up on your progress, and I have to say, I’m very impressed! It seems there’s no challenge you can’t overcome.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_6_2: As I’m sure you know, a well-rounded Trainer needs to have a great team of Pokémon to battle against other Trainers or even challenge Pokémon in raids.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_6_3: I think this is a great time to power up some of your Pokémon and bolster your team.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_6_4: While you focus on that, I’ll be looking into an interesting rumor I caught wind of.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_6_5: There have been reports of encounters with a Pokémon that’s able to transform into another Pokémon entirely. Fascinating stuff!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_6_6: I’ll be sure to share whatever I find when you return.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_7_0: Glad you’re back, Trainer. After looking into those reports, it certainly sounds like the work of Ditto, the Transform Pokémon.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_7_1: Ditto rearranges its cell structure to transform itself into other shapes. What an incredible Pokémon!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_7_2: However, there seems to be something more to this situation.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_7_3: Could you help me with some research so we can find out what exactly is going on?
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_7_4: I’ll continue my work here to see if I can uncover some more information that might help us.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_8_0: %PLAYERNAME%! Is it true?! You encountered a Shiny Ditto?! I’m stunned!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_8_1: You’ve had quite the journey, haven’t you? It’s been a joy to follow your progress, as always.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_8_2: Believe it or not, though, there’s still another mystery that needs solving.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_8_3: You see, after looking over the research you’ve conducted, I think we might be on the trail of the New Species Pokémon, Mew.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_8_4: We've documented Mew in the past, but something’s different this time—though I can’t yet say what that is.
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_8_5: Whatever the case, I think it’s safe to say this is going to be a memorable adventure!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_8_6: In the meantime, keep an eye out for another research assignment. I have a feeling this is going to be an especially challenging endeavor, but I’m sure you’re up to it!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_8_7: For now, though, I think congratulations are in order. You did a tremendous job on today’s Kanto-themed journey!
gotour_kanto_srd_dialogue_8_8: I hope you were able to make some special memories with your Pokémon and fellow Trainers. Thanks again for all your help and hard work!

gotoursik_elite4_guidance: Tip: You can find a member of the GO Tour Elite Four at PokéStops. Each one will appear in a different habitat!
gotoursik_elitefour_a_loss: How embarrassing. Maybe I should take it down a notch...
gotoursik_elitefour_a_victory: Don’t beat yourself up about it. This was inevitable.
gotoursik_elitefour_b_loss: Win or lose, I stand by my Pokémon!
gotoursik_elitefour_b_quote: If you believe you can win, your Pokémon will believe it, too!
gotoursik_elitefour_b_victory: Yeah! That’s the power of my Pokémon.
gotoursik_elitefour_c_quote: I’ll battle you as many times as it takes to win.
gotoursik_elitefour_col_a_loss: Awww. If this was a cuteness contest, we totally woulda won.
gotoursik_elitefour_col_a_quote: I picked all my Pokémon because they’re super cute—but that doesn’t mean they’re not super strong, too!
gotoursik_elitefour_col_b_loss: A well-earned victory. Truly, you are worthy of being called Champion!
gotoursik_elitefour_col_b_prebattle: Let us see which of us is meant to be Champion!
gotoursik_elitefour_col_b_quote: Purple is such a noble and elegant color, don’t you agree? Quite befitting of a Champion.
gotoursik_elitefour_col_c_loss: In the end, a loss. And in loss, we learn the most. I’ll not forget this.
gotoursik_elitefour_col_c_prebattle: A sliver of sky. A single speck in the void. Blue, the hue of home.
gotoursik_elitefour_col_c_victory: Spool of fate, unfurl. Respite in a swirling storm. Victory is ours.
gotoursik_elitefour_col_d_prebattle: We’re brighter, we’re bolder, we’re better!
gotoursik_elitefour_col_d_quote: Pokémon should be bold—in color and in strength!
gotoursik_elitefour_col_d_victory: What’d I tell ya? Bold is just better.
gotoursik_elitefour_d_loss: Eh. You win some, you lose some.
gotoursik_elitefour_d_prebattle: I’ll keep you on your toes.
gotoursik_elitefour_d_quote: Didn’t expect to meet another Trainer here. So random, right?

invalid_character_tag_name_warning: This name contains an invalid character.
invasion_encounter_onboarding__blanche_s: Curious... Upon their defeat, your opponent seems to have abandoned the Pokémon they battled with. It has a strange and ominous aura.
I have a hypothesis about what kind of Pokémon it is... Could you catch it so we can examine it more closely?
invasion_encounter_onboarding__candela_s: Your opponent fled...and left their Pokémon behind. That really burns me up. There seems to be an ominous aura around the poor Pokémon, too.
Could you try to catch it and see what’s so different about this Pokémon?
invasion_encounter_onboarding__female_sp: They’ve carelessly abandoned the Pokémon they lost with! It has an ominous aura and is somewhat different from regular Pokémon. Try to catch it so we can save it!
invasion_encounter_onboarding__male_spea: They’ve carelessly abandoned the Pokémon they lost with! It has an ominous aura and is somewhat different from regular Pokémon. Try to catch it so we can save it!
invasion_encounter_onboarding__spark_spe: Whoa, looks like they couldn’t handle a little battle! They even left behind their Pokémon. Why would they do that?
It has a really odd aura around it... Let’s help it! Can you catch it so we can take a closer look?
invasion_find_boss_onboarding__blanche_s: Professor Willow’s ingenuity knows no bounds.
Once equipped, the Super Rocket Radar begins receiving encrypted signals. Could the signals be coming from Team GO Rocket Headquarters?
Best prepare for any obstacles that might appear. Team GO Rocket’s numbers are staggering.
Their leader is strong but no match for Team Mystic. Let’s GO.
invasion_find_boss_onboarding__candela_s: Just look at this radar! You can just tell it’s more powerful than the others!
My bet? It’s receiving signals from Team GO Rocket Headquarters.
I’m getting fired up, but I know there have to be more hurdles before facing the Team GO Rocket Boss.
I’ve heard their boss is fierce... But you’re on Team Valor, so I know you can handle it.
invasion_find_boss_onboarding__spark_spe: This radar looks upgraded and WAY more powerful than others we’ve made!
Think it’ll take us to whoever’s leading Team GO Rocket?
I know it can’t be that easy. I bet Team GO Rocket has plenty more Grunts blocking our way.
I’m ready if you are! Equip that radar, and let’s show ’em what Team Instinct is made of!
invasion_find_leader_onboarding__blanche: Professor Willow’s research and the components you’ve discovered have come together to produce a Rocket Radar.
We’ve reverse engineered their technology and can now receive their hideouts’ signals.
Equip the radar to activate it. It’s time to investigate—and be prepared for whatever comes our way.
invasion_find_leader_onboarding__candela: Great work! Fighting all those Grunts was worth the effort!
A Rocket Radar! Professor Willow said once it’s equipped, you can intercept signals from Team GO Rocket.
Finally, we can find those hideouts! Let’s GO take out these punks!
invasion_find_leader_onboarding__spark_s: Whoa! I knew the professor was right when he said these things could be used for something aside from hacking PokéStops!
Is that a radar? Awesome! There’s no way they can hide from us with this!
Let’s try it out and track down some hideouts!
invasion_introduction_onboarding__blanch: Trainer, some shadowy figures have been seen at PokéStops. Approach with caution, and be ready for battle.
invasion_introduction_onboarding__candel: I’ve been hearing reports of some mysterious characters near PokéStops. You should take charge and go investigate. Be careful, and make sure you’re prepared for a battle!
invasion_introduction_onboarding__female: Some mysterious characters have shown up at PokéStops! Watch out—it might turn into a battle!
invasion_introduction_onboarding__male_s: Some mysterious characters have shown up at PokéStops! Watch out—it might turn into a battle!
invasion_introduction_onboarding__spark_: I overheard that some shady characters have been showing up at PokéStops. I think you need to check it out, but be careful—I have a feeling you might end up in a battle!
invasion_map_fragment_onboarding__blanch: That Grunt dropped some sort of device. It looks like this is what they were using to hack the PokéStops.
Ah, I recognize this from Willow’s lab. I wonder...
Yes. I believe this can help with his prototype. Please head out and collect more.
invasion_map_fragment_onboarding__candel: That Grunt dropped something while they were running scared! What are they using these for?
I bet this is what Team GO Rocket is using to hack the PokéStops...
We have to find more. Time to battle some Grunts!
invasion_map_fragment_onboarding__spark_: Hey... That Grunt dropped something. What does this thing do?
This looks like a piece of something right out of Willow’s lab!
I bet this will help with that prototype he’s developing... Let’s see if we can find more.
invasion_pokemon_inventory_warning_messa: Your Pokémon storage is full, so you will not be able to encounter a Shadow Pokémon. To make room, you can transfer Pokémon to Professor Willow or upgrade your Pokémon storage in the shop.
invasion_shadow_gem_1_onboarding__profes: Great job getting those Shadow Shards! Good name, eh? Now, let’s combine them. We can use my invention—the Super Shadow Shard Scrubber! But we can just call it the Shard Refiner. Give it a try!
invasion_shadow_gem_2_onboarding__profes: Incredible! They made a beautiful gem, and we’ve purified that shadowy energy. I’ll call it...a Purified Gem! I’ll bet something like this can help calm the enraged Shadow Pokémon in Shadow Raids.
invasion_shadow_gem_3_onboarding__profes: I hypothesize that this will decrease an enraged Shadow Raid Boss’s Attack and Defense. The more of these gems you or other Trainers use, the greater the effect ought to be. Why don’t you test it?
invasion_shadow_gem_fragment_2_onboardin: Would you do me a favor and track down a few more by battling Team GO Rocket? When we have {0}, I’ll see if we can put them together to make something that can help in Shadow Raids!
invasion_shadow_gem_fragment_onboarding_: Huh? What’s this? It’s exuding some eerie energy. I wonder if it has something to do with Team GO Rocket’s increased presence and those Shadow Raids...
invasion_shadow_onboarding__blanche_spea: If my analysis is correct, we can help this Pokémon through a process known as purification. This will enable it to harness its strength. Shall we give it a try?
invasion_shadow_onboarding__candela_spea: I think we can help this Pokémon. Purification is a process that makes certain Pokémon stronger by tapping into their inner power. Let’s give it a try.
invasion_shadow_onboarding__female_speak: It looks like we can help this Pokémon become stronger through a process called purification. Let’s try it!
invasion_shadow_onboarding__male_speaker: It looks like we can help this Pokémon become stronger through a process called purification. Let’s try it!
invasion_shadow_onboarding__spark_speake: Oh! I remember Professor Willow talking about a process called purification! He said that it could help certain Pokémon become more powerful. Let’s give it a shot!

iris_social_tired_pokemon_string: played until getting tired and came back!
iris_temperature_warning_body: Due to the high temperature of the device, the camera has been temporarily disabled. Please wait until it cools to its normal temperature.
irisisocial_tutorial_body_eight: You can use stickers to decorate the pictures you take. Add a little creative flair, then share your photos with others—your next masterpiece awaits!
irisisocial_tutorial_body_five: You can call a Pokémon back by tapping the Poké Ball button beneath their icon. Your Pokémon will then be ready to be placed somewhere new!
irisisocial_tutorial_body_four: Find a flat surface and either tap the footprints or drag one of your Pokémon from the list to place it.
irisisocial_tutorial_body_one: You can take up to three Pokémon out of their Poké Balls and snap photos together! You may even encounter other Pokémon while you do!
irisisocial_tutorial_body_seven: Use the group photo option to snap the perfect shot of your Pokémon! You can also play with them to see how it affects their mood.
irisisocial_tutorial_body_six: Tap the rotate button to start using the toy. Move it around your Pokémon to get their attention!
irisisocial_tutorial_body_three: Connect to the PokéStop location by scanning the area. Doing so will allow you to view and interact with any Pokémon there.
irisisocial_tutorial_body_two: Unless you call them back, your Pokémon will stay in place for 24 hours, after which they’ll get tired and return to you. While they’re away, they may greet other Trainers and Pokémon!
irisisocial_tutorial_header_one: Take photos of your Pokémon with others!
irisisocial_tutorial_header_two: Your Pokémon will hang out and play!
