Galarian Mr. Mime is known as the Dancing Pokémon. It likes to create a sheet of ice and tap-dance on it. What a strange Pokémon!
While Galarian Mr. Mime is the prime suspect, it’s still just a hunch. Can you go out and do a bit more research to confirm? Maybe you might even come across a Galarian Mr. Mime!
quest_special_dialogue_galarian_mrmime_3: Phew! Great job catching that Galarian Mr. Mime, %PLAYERNAME%! I guess it’s not as frightening as I first thought.
Perhaps it’ll become even more approachable when it evolves?
I’ve read that Galarian Mr. Mime evolves into Mr. Rime, the Comedian Pokémon. Mr. Rime is apparently highly skilled at tap-dancing and waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.
I wonder whether it could teach me some new moves. Haha! Anyway, how about you try evolving your Galarian Mr. Mime?
quest_special_dialogue_galarian_mrmime_4: What a fascinating Pokémon Mr. Rime is! Thank you for evolving your Galarian Mr. Mime, %PLAYERNAME%.
I've heard stories of Mr. Rime’s amusing movements, and you know what? Color me amused. What a COOL discovery this was!
This has definitely been an unforgettable adventure, but I’m not sure I can say I’d do it again, given the chilling way it started. My poor breakfast...
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_0_1: I just made a tremendously exciting discovery!
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_0_2: Earlier today, I was exploring a nearby cave to collect some samples when I noticed a peculiar warmth along one of the walls.
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_0_3: Suddenly, something jumped out and tried to bite me!
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_0_4: I quickly realized I had stumbled upon a nest of Gible, the Land Shark Pokémon. Gible is known to react to anything that moves, so sometimes it leaps out and chomps passersby.
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_0_5: I know it just wanted a nibble, but that’s a nibble too much in my book!
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_0_6: Anyway, it’s not every day you run into a gaggle of Gible. Do you think you could head out and do some research on their appearance here?
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_1_1: While you were out tracking down the Land Shark Pokémon, I took a closer look at the cave I was telling you about earlier.
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_1_2: I was reminded of an interesting tidbit about Gible. It nests inside small, horizontal holes in cave walls warmed by geothermal heat.
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_1_3: Gible seems to love warm places, and that cave certainly fits the bill.
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_1_4: We’ve learned a lot about this Dragon- and Ground-type Pokémon, but there’s always more to discover!
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_1_5: When you’re ready, how about you try evolving your Gible into Gabite?
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_2_0: Nice job evolving your Gible into Gabite, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_2_1: Gabite is known as the Cave Pokémon, and it loves sparkly things.
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_2_2: It emits ultrasonic waves from protrusions on either side of its head to probe pitch-dark caves.
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_2_3: What a useful ability! Maybe it could help me avoid bumping into lab equipment in the middle of the night...
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_2_4: We’ve seen Gible and Gabite, but there’s still one more Evolution we need to document. Come see me when you’ve evolved your Gabite, Trainer!
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_3_0: Ah! Fantastic work, %PLAYERNAME%. That’s an admirable Garchomp!
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_3_1: Known as the Mach Pokémon, its body is covered in fine scales that reduce drag, enabling it to fly at high speeds.
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_3_2: Those scales don’t just reduce wind resistance—their sharp edges also cause injury to any opponent that touches them. Pretty spiffy, eh?
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_3_3: I think you’ll find Garchomp to be a powerful companion on your adventures.
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_3_4: And I can’t wait to see how your relationship develops along the way!
quest_special_dialogue_giblt_3_5: Thanks for all your help today, Trainer. I hope you had a fin-tastic time!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_0_1: I was ready for a fun-filled day of playing with Pokémon, but as you may have seen, the park has all sorts of unusual geological phenomena occurring!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_0_2: We need to figure out what’s happening and set it right, so I'm asking for your help.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_0_3: Now that you’re here, I need you to be part of my Elite Research team.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_0_4: First things first—could you help survey the park and get some supplies?
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_1_0: Yowzers! As you may have noticed, the park has all sorts of unusual geological phenomena going on today!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_1_1: I’m not sure what could have caused it—they just appeared out of nowhere...and they seem to be getting bigger and bigger!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_1_2: Whatever is causing it, the local park habitat here is quite disrupted by all the changes.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_1_3: The local Pokémon have become confused… It looks like they’re acting more aggressive and territorial!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_1_4: Let's see if we can help out by catching some Pokémon to make the situation a bit more stable.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_1_5: Please catch some Fire-, Steel-, Water-, Grass-, Rock-, and Ice-type Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_2_0: Well, it looks like there were some pretty powerful Pokémon causing the ruckus. Thanks for taking care of them! I'm sure they'll make great friends.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_2_1: However, I'm not sure that was sufficient—the strange habitats are just as active as before. The local park and all the Pokémon here seem worried. We need to get to the bottom of this!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_2_2: I've been seeing some unusual Pokémon called Unown floating around the area...
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_2_3: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing…and I think they may be trying to tell us something! I think they want us to call on a powerful Pokémon—the Guardian of the Forest? I'll bet if we follow the Unown around the park, they'll lead us to this Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_3_0: Amazing! Never thought I would see Celebi here.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_3_1: I think Celebi's time travel abilities may be exactly what we need to fix the situation.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_3_2: Celebi can go back in time and stop these distortions while they're still small!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_3_3: It's a difficult task… We need to ensure Celebi has all the support it needs!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_3_4: The Plusle and Minun in the park would be perfect to help us out.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_3_5: These Pokémon are famous for loving teamwork and cheering on their partners with their pom-poms made of sparks!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_3_6: If we collect a bunch, I think they'll be able to work together to get Celebi really pumped up!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_3_7: Then Celebi can focus its power to return to the past and prevent this problem before it starts!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_4_0: That did it! It seems like the strange habitats are slowly returning to normal.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_4_1: It appears that Celebi has safely returned from the past to stay with you. Looks like you two have formed a bond!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_4_2: I'll bet by next weekend the park will have returned to its old self! Celebi is truly a wondrous Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_4_3: Thanks for all your help today! We couldn't have done it without you.
quest_special_dialogue_gofest_4_4: This weekend will be one to remember!
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_0_0: Oh! Hi, %PLAYERNAME%! Don’t mind the mess...
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_0_1: I was just enjoying the shade and jotting down a few notes when I noticed some slime on my coat.
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_0_2: Research opportunities come in unexpected forms, and I have an inkling this residue belongs to a certain clingy culprit.
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_0_3: While I figure out how to clean this up, could you look around and let me know if you observe anything interesting in the area?
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_1_0: Aha! I knew it! This goo came from Goomy, the Soft Tissue Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_1_1: Goomy tend to live in damp, shady places so their bodies don’t dry out. I should’ve watched where I was sitting!
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_1_2: I’d love to learn more about Goomy and its Evolutions while we have this opportunity.
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_1_3: Given that you seem better than me at staying slime-free, would you mind evolving Goomy into Sliggoo?
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_2_1: But take extra care around your new Sliggoo. Its mucus can dissolve pretty much anything.
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_2_2: Also, I don’t want to alarm you, but it’s worth mentioning that Sliggoo are known to have trouble drawing a line between friends and food.
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_2_3: Might be worth seeing if yours is ready to evolve. It could save you the trouble of fending off a well-intentioned but melty hug!
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_3_1: Goodra is an amazingly friendly Pokémon with a penchant for hugging its Trainer. And yes, before you ask—that can make things pretty gooey.
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_3_2: This Pokémon isn’t all slime and rainbows though. The strikes from Goodra’s horns land 100 times harder than any blow from a heavyweight boxer.
quest_special_dialogue_goomy_3_3: Anyhow, thanks for sticking with this research! I hope you and your Goodra stay together for many years to come!
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_1_1: I take it you’ve noticed the influx of Grubbin in the area today.
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_1_2: These Pokémon spit sticky threads to stop opponents in their tracks—so you’d be wise to stay on their good side!
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_1_3: Grubbin generally live underground, though... I wonder what’s lured them to the surface today. Can you catch a few to investigate?
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_1_4: Perhaps it’s simply strength in numbers. Grubbin’s natural enemies sometimes prefer fleeing over risking a run-in with the Larva Pokémon’s powerful mandibles—or worse, an unexpected shock!
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_1_4_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! Have you discovered why so many Grubbin have appeared above ground today?
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_1_5: I’ve also heard Grubbin loves snacking on sweet tree sap. Do you think it tastes anything like Pinap Berry juice?
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_1_6: Maybe I’d better try some myself... Y-you know, for science!
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_1_7: Ahem. Grubbin is certainly a fascinating Pokémon, but just wait till you see its Evolution.
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_1_8: Why don’t you go ahead and evolve a Grubbin yourself, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_2_1: Charjabug can store electricity in its body to use later. Apparently it’s a popular companion on camping trips!
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_2_2: It also like to bury itself in fallen leaves and munch away on the rich topsoil beneath.
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_2_3: Tread carefully out there, %PLAYERNAME%—you and Charjabug might be equally shocked if you step on one!
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_2_4: Nobody likes to be interrupted while they’re lost in the feed.
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_2_5: Anyway, you’re sure to be impressed by Charjabug’s electric power. Its mandibles may be smaller than Grubbin’s, but don’t let that fool you into thinking it’s a pushover!
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_2_6: You know, Charjabug can evolve too. I’ve never witnessed its Evolution myself, but I’ve heard it’s quite a sight!
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_2_7: Why don’t you try evolving your Charjabug, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_3_1: Who would have thought that a little Grubbin would eventually evolve into this stunning, winged creature?
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_3_2: Vikavolt builds up electricity in its abdomen, focuses it through its jaws, and then fires the electricity off in concentrated beams.
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_3_3: They’ve also been known to carry Charjabug to use as spare batteries, allowing Vikavolt to rapidly fire off fully powered attacks.
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_3_4: It sounds a bit intimidating, but it’s also a lovely example of two Pokémon working in tandem. Inspiring stuff, if you ask me!
quest_special_dialogue_grubbin_3_5: Who knows—maybe your Vikavolt will act as a battery of sorts and keep YOU charged up while adventuring together! I’m looking forward to hearing all about it. Until next time, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_gt_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m glad you’re here. Something odd is happening, and I need your help investigating it.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_0_1: While I was on a walk last night with my Buddy Pokémon, Meltan, I noticed a strange light flickering in my mobile lab. It was so spooky! One might’ve called it...a ghastly sight!
quest_special_dialogue_gt_0_2: Apparently, some Gastly were in my mobile lab hiding from the wind. It’s common for them to take shelter when massive gusts are blowing about so their gaseous bodies aren’t blown away.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_0_3: However, the sheer number of Gastly seemed unusual. They’re still in the mobile lab, so could you help me look into this situation?
quest_special_dialogue_gt_1_0: Thanks, %PLAYERNAME%! While you were helping with our research, I was assisting the Gastly in the mobile lab.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_1_1: I had to be careful when I got near the Gastly. I didn’t want to be engulfed by their gaseous bodies!
quest_special_dialogue_gt_1_2: Now that the Gastly are out of the mobile lab, I think it’s time for us to start looking into Gastly’s Evolution.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_1_3: I’ve done some reading on the matter, and I think we’ll need to prepare for a dangerous Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_2_0: Excellent work, %PLAYERNAME%. Seems as though your Gastly has evolved into Haunter. I had a feeling I was being watched.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_2_1: It’s said that Haunter lurks in walls to keep an eye on its foes, but in this case, I have a feeling it’s just being playful.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_2_2: I’ve noticed the team leaders tripping and stumbling around the lab today. Seems as if Haunter is having a bit of fun with them, but I don’t think Blanche is amused.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_2_3: Let’s go ahead and fix that problem by evolving Haunter.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_3_0: Congrats, Trainer. Your Haunter has now become the Shadow Pokémon, Gengar! Are you ready for a spooky story? Let me get my flashlight.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_3_1: If you ever see your shadow suddenly and startlingly overtake you, it might be a Gengar running past you, pretending to be your shadow!
quest_special_dialogue_gt_3_2: Do you feel that chill in the air? That means a Gengar is near. OOOoooOOOooo...
quest_special_dialogue_gt_3_4: Hahaha, got you, %PLAYERNAME%! I crack myself up. Although...it looked for a second like there was a ghostly hand on your shoulder... Maybe it was just my imagination.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_3_5: Anyway, I know an accomplished Trainer such as yourself has nothing to fear when it comes to training a Pokémon like Gengar. Being both Poison- and Ghost-type, it’s a fantastic Pokémon to have on your team.
quest_special_dialogue_gt_3_6: Thanks to your help, I think we all learned something today! I’ll be in touch when I have another adventure for you!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_0_0: OoOoOo... There’s a chill in the air... Can you feel it, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_0_1: Seems like I’ve been getting goosebumps every few minutes lately! Is it just drafty, or are all the Ghost-type Pokémon we’ve been seeing somehow involved?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_0_2: Either way, I think we’re in for another adventure! Whatever happens, we’ll face it together.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_0_3: Speaking of faces, I’ve noticed a lot of Yamask in the area lately.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_0_4: I’ve been hoping to do some research on it and other Ghost-type Pokémon, so it seems like now’s the time.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_0_5: Mind lending me a hand, Trainer?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_1_1: I recently had an encounter with a Duskull that seemed creepy at first but ended up being quite heartwarming.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_1_2: It was a lovely reminder not to judge a Pokémon by its...well, skull, I suppose!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_1_4: Known as the Spirit Pokémon, Yamask is said to wander through ruins by night carrying a mask that was once its human face.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_1_5: A rather melancholy existence, if true, wouldn’t you say?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_1_6: What must it feel like to carry around a mask of your former self? No offense to Yamask, but I hope I never have to find out firsthand.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_1_7: Did you know that Yamask found in Galar are different than those found in Unova?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_1_8: Perhaps you’ll come across one while you’re out conducting research.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_1_9: I wonder just how these Yamask differ. Let’s go find out!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_2_1: Unlike Yamask first found in Unova, Galarian Yamask carries a slab rather than a mask.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_2_2: It’s said that the slab bears cursed engravings and possesses Yamask itself. Talk about spooky!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_2_3: Oh, and you’ve encountered a Banette, too! Did you know that Banette is said to be a doll that became a Pokémon through the power of its grudge toward the child that disowned it?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_2_4: I wouldn’t want to be that kid, that’s for sure!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_2_5: Between Galarian Yamask’s slab, Banette’s puppet body, and all the Pokémon in costumes walking around, it feels like the spooky factor’s turned way up at the moment!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_2_6: Even so, I’d still like to learn more about Ghost-type Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_2_7: Come on, Trainer—let’s get back out there!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_3_0: Looks like we’re coming up on the last stretch of our research here, Trainer. And hey, it looks like you found yourself an Alolan Marowak!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_3_1: Did you know that the bones used by some Marowak belonged to their mothers?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_3_2: In fact, Cubone—which evolves into Marowak—is even said to wear the skull of its mother.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_3_3: When Cubone evolves into Alolan Marowak, its mother’s regrets protect it like a vengeful spirit.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_3_4: Hmm. Between Alolan Marowak, Banette, and Yamask, we’ve witnessed the power of quite a few spirits, haven’t we?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_3_5: Try as I might to explain why Ghost-type Pokémon seem spooky, sometimes I just come up blank. But that won’t stop me from continuing to try!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_3_6: After all, I always feel like I learn a bit more about myself when I’m studying Pokémon. You know what I mean?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_2021_3_7: Anyway, I think we’re more than due some rest and treats after all that research. See you next time, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_0_1: I just observed a curious sight.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_0_2: Floating over there were vaguely human visages, and carved slabs of...clay?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_0_3: Yet despite the differences between these apparitions, they had a similar air.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_0_4: As with many mysterious things in this world, I suspect Pokémon to be behind this.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_0_5: Assuming I am correct, I wish to catch them. Then perhaps Professor Willow can share his insight.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_1_0: Where’s that old getup of mine—oh! Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_1_1: I’ve been thinking of what to wear to Spark’s upcoming costume party. A Litwick hat? A Pikachu onesie? I can’t have Candela outshine me again this year.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_1_2: Speaking of masquerades—is that a Yamask AND a Galarian Yamask? I can’t disguise my excitement!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_1_3: You know, they say Yamask carry masks that used to be their faces when they were human. Sometimes they look at them and cry.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_1_4: And Galarian Yamask are supposedly formed when ancient clay tablets are drawn to vengeful spirits.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_1_5: Somber origins, but don’t they set your curiosity ablaze? I wonder how Yamask feel now that they’ve become Pokémon. What sort of thoughts are running through their minds?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_1_6: In the “spirit” of inquiry, why don’t you see what other Ghost-type Pokémon you can find? You might even come across more Yamask!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_2_0: Professor Willow is certainly knowledgeable. We were right to seek his wisdom.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_2_1: To think that Yamask and Galarian Yamask have such origins... Incredible.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_2_2: I must thank you for catching them. With every day we spend together, I learn something new.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_2_3: The Pokémon we’ve seen of late have been...dark, in a manner of speaking.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_2_4: But as the Professor said, they are simply another mystery we researchers can illuminate with our findings. Fear need not be a component of exploring the unknown.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_2_5: %PLAYERNAME%, I shall continue observing these Yamask as I ponder today’s events.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_2_6: Perhaps you could investigate other Ghost-type Pokémon in the meantime.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_2_7: And to repay Professor Willow, I could see if I possess a GO Ultra Recon Squad uniform in his size...
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_3_0: Ah, %PLAYERNAME%! Welcome back. I’ve just about finished my Yamask, erm, mask, inspired by you and Rhi! What’ve the two of you been up to?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_3_1: Whoa, you’ve caught even more Ghost-type Pokémon! It’s starting to look like a haunted house around here—or a haunted lab.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_3_2: Ghost-type Pokémon always remind me how much remains in the world for us to uncover. Where do Drifloon drift off to? Do Duskull really spirit away bad children? What powers a Golett?
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_3_3: With enough time and perseverance, I’m sure we researchers will find the answers to these questions and more. Or maybe they’ll be answered by an up-and-at-’em Trainer like you! When it comes to learning, jump in headfirst, I always say!
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_3_4: Though...maybe I should amend that motto to exclude Ultra Wormholes. Haha.
quest_special_dialogue_hallow_22_3_5: Thanks for the extra motivation today, %PLAYERNAME%. I’ll see you again soon!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_1: Hope I didn’t scare you too badly. I was just having a bit of fun during this spooky season.
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_2: Say, since you’re here, I was wondering whether you could help me. I’ve heard some reports of an unusual Pokémon appearing in a nearby forest.
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_3: Why aren’t I going into that dark forest to find this Pokémon myself? W-well, er, it’s certainly not because I’m scared!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_4: Y-you see I would, but I’m busy here with some...uh...research! Yes!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_5: Oh! I think I see Blanche over there near my lab. Maybe it’s time for some research into the Evolution of Ghost-type Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_0_6: Could you go on ahead and let me know what you find, %PLAYERNAME%? Thanks—and good luck!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_0: Blanche, do you really think this Galarian Pokémon can evolve? Oh, glad to see you again, %PLAYERNAME%— AH!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_1: What’s that sound?! Oh, it’s just a Yamask. Seems like it’s looking at its mask and crying.
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_2: Ah, so Yamask was the unusual Pokémon appearing in the forest? I see. Sorry, Trainer, but it looks like you’re going to have to venture back out there.
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_3: After comparing eyewitness reports with some texts I found about Ghost-type Pokémon, it turns out we aren’t looking for this particular kind of Yamask, which was originally discovered in the Unova region, but another one entirely!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_4: The Yamask we’re looking for was first discovered in the Galar region and seems to be carrying a clay slab. The texts say that the slab absorbs that Yamask’s dark power.
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_1_5: Unfortunately, I can’t come along with you this time, either. Because, uh...it looks like Spark needs my help with some Strange Eggs! See ya later, and good luck!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_0: Yup, still seems like mostly Poison- and Dark-type Pokémon are hatching from Strange Eggs. I sure am glad we got to confirm what we already— Oh!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_1: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! How are— EGAD! A Spiritomb! What a tricky Ghost-type Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_2: I’ve worked with Trainers to research Spiritomb in previous years. Maybe you’ve encountered a Spiritomb before!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_3: There seem to be a few more Spiritomb around than in the past. That’s quite frightening, given that each Spiritomb is formed by 108 spirits bound to a keystone.
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_4: One might say that it’s BOUND to be a real spooky season! Haha, sorry, Spiritomb—too much?
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_5: Anyway, I hate to ask you again, Trainer, but third time’s the charm, right? I’m sure you’ll encounter the illusive and elusive Galarian Yamask this time!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_2_6: I, uh, have to go help Candela prep for an upcoming Trainer Battle, but you go on ahead! Good luck, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_0: Poison-, Bug-, Ghost-, Dark-, and Fairy-type Pokémon—looks like you’re all set for a spooky Trainer Battle, Candela!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_1: Oh, hi there, %PLAYERNAME%! And hello, Galarian Yamask! What a curious Pokémon this is. It gives off a totally different energy.
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_2: Blanche and I were looking into the Evolution of Ghost-type Pokémon earlier, and it appears that Galarian Yamask evolves into an entirely different Pokémon than its counterpart from Unova does!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_3: All you need is to collect some Yamask Candies and get to evolving! I’m certain that its Evolution will be an exciting addition to your Pokédex!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_4: Anyway, I’m so glad we got to go on this spooky adventure and discover Galarian Yamask together!
quest_special_dialogue_hallowyamas_3_5: I hope you had a ghoulishly good time, and I hope you have an extra spoOoOoOoOoOoky day!
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! Quite an eventful few months we’ve had, eh?
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_0_1: How are things with Hoopa? You two seem to get along great from what I can tell.
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_0_2: I suspect its trust in you must have deepened after you protected it from Team GO Rocket.
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_0_3: While you and Hoopa have been out adventuring together, my research into the mystery surrounding Hoopa has taken some strange turns.
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_0_4: I was up late poring over my notes recently when I heard a knock at the door of my mobile lab. I certainly wasn’t expecting anyone, but I figured it would be rude not to answer.
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_0_5: As I approached the door, I heard something scurrying away, and when I opened it, I found nothing but a curious bottle at my feet.
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_0_6: There was a note attached. I’ve managed to decipher only part of it, but here’s what I’ve got so far.
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_0_7:
“Offer sweets and dust you’ve found 
So Hoopa’s form will be unbound
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_2_10: Hoopa Unbound is said to be tremendously powerful—but I think you can handle it, Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_2_11: It’s been a long adventure with Hoopa, but I think we’ve finally reached the end.
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_2_12: It’s almost bittersweet, don’t you think? But fret not—I’m sure more discoveries await!
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_2_13: Let’s keep adventuring through this world full of mysteries—you, me, and Hoopa!
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_2_8: Of course, this is all just a theory.
quest_special_dialogue_hoopaunbound_2_9: We’ll have to test it before reaching any proper conclusions!
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_0_1: I just saw the most wonderful thing: hundreds of Hoppip are filling the sky! You’d think the clouds were pink with how many there are out there right now.
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_0_2: I believe this is the perfect opportunity for us to learn more about Hoppip, the Cottonweed Pokémon, don’t you agree?
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_0_3: It’s said that when Hoppip gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_0_4: Does it feel like spring yet, with all these Hoppip floating about? Let’s see about catching a few to find out more about them.
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_1_0: Wow, look at all those Hoppip! Hoppip are so light that they grip the ground with their feet to keep from being blown away. They also like to huddle up and link their leaves to stay grounded as a group.
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_1_1: They sure have found all sorts of clever ways to keep themselves in place.
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_1_2: Hoppip can also evolve, and it’s quite the sight. Don’t take my word for it—how about you go see for yourself!
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_2_0: What an adorable Skiploom, %PLAYERNAME%! Have you had a moment to study it?
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_2_1: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates. Because Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises, some Trainers have taken to using it as a thermometer. Isn’t that fascinating?
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_2_2: In warm weather, Skiploom can also be seen floating in the air to get closer to the sun. I don’t blame it—if I could float and get a little more sunlight, I would, too!
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_2_3: Did you know that Skiploom can evolve as well? Why don’t you evolve one, hm?
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_3_0: Great work, %PLAYERNAME%! Looks like you’ve got yourself a Jumpluff. Jumpluff rides the winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands, scattering cotton spores as it goes.
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_3_1: Wouldn’t it be wonderful to travel so breezily?
quest_special_dialogue_hoppt_3_2: On that note, you should take your new friend for a stroll—maybe bask in the sunlight together a bit, too.
quest_special_dialogue_jj_0_0: Jessie: Hey, James, did you hear?
quest_special_dialogue_jj_0_2: Jessie: Apparently, there’s a mysterious Pokémon in a jungle nearby!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_0_4: Jessie: They say it’s called the Protector of the Jungle or something like that.
quest_special_dialogue_jj_0_5: James: Oh? That sounds like the kind of Pokémon the Boss would be happy to see!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_0_6: Jessie: It’s going to be a pain, though, since we don’t really know the area.
quest_special_dialogue_jj_0_7: James: Hmmm, maybe we can con someone into helping us!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_0_8: Jessie: Yeah... Huh? Hey, you! You must be an assistant the Boss sent! Yeah, why else would someone be out here in the middle of nowhere?
quest_special_dialogue_jj_0_9: James: Assistant? Oh! Of course! An assistant! The Boss has high expectations for us, after all. Now that you’re here, let’s get to work.
quest_special_dialogue_jj_1_0: Jessie: Nice work, kid! I can’t believe you actually did it!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_1_1: James: Yeah! It feels nice to have somebody to boss around— I mean, uh, somebody to help us out! Jessie and I are constantly on our feet, you know.
quest_special_dialogue_jj_1_2: Jessie: As you can imagine, it’s hard for us to maintain our good looks when we’re always running around like this. Anyway, you did your bit, so I guess we can let you take a little break.
quest_special_dialogue_jj_1_3: James: Superb idea, Jessie! It’s important to change up the pace every once in a while!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_1_4: James: Go on and spend some time with your buddy.
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_0: Jessie: I’m so glad the Boss sent along someone so useful to help us!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_1: James: Now that you mention it, you haven’t told us anything about yourself. Where are you normally stationed? How long have you been with Team Rocket? Oh, what’s your favorite thing about the Boss? Do tell!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_10: James: Hey, who exactly are you?
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_13: Jessie: Aha! I knew you were just a no-good Twerp! This whole thing was suspicious from the start! Did someone send you to get in our way?! Yeah, that must be it!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_14: James: I trusted you! I thought you were one of us!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_15: Jessie: You know too much! We can’t let you go! Let’s get ’em, James!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_16: James: Don’t you dare get in our way! You’ll regret it if you do!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_17: Jessie: Don’t you know who we are?! Well, let us formally introduce ourselves!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_20: Jessie: To protect the world from devastation!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_21: James: To unite all people— HEY! Are you even listening?!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_3: James: Hey, why so quiet all of a sudden?
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_4: James: Jessie, who actually told you that we’d be getting an assistant?
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_6: James: Well, no one told me, either!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_7: Jessie: But you’re the one who said they were sent by the Boss!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_2_8: James: I said no such thing!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_3_0: Jessie: I can’t believe we were defeated by a Twerp like you!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_3_1: James: That was totally unexpected. What will the Boss say...?
quest_special_dialogue_jj_3_3: Jessie: Hey, behind you! Isn’t that Celebi? Could it be the so-called Protector of the Jungle?!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_3_4: James: Drat! That Pokémon was supposed to be ours!
quest_special_dialogue_jj_3_6: James: We’ll get you next time!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_0_1: I have an exciting discovery to share with you today. Have you heard of the Legendary Pokémon Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion?
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_0_2: Well, it looks like they’ve been challenging Trainers in Raid Battles recently!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_0_3: Coming face-to-face with any Legendary Pokémon is cause to celebrate, but I’m extra intrigued this time.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_0_4: Why, you ask? Well, Spark said he saw something peculiar along the waterfront while he was taking pictures earlier—a Pokémon running across the water’s surface!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_0_5: But the photos he captured are, ah... Let’s just say it’s hard to tell what exactly is in them.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_0_6: Do you think this could be connected to the appearance of those Legendary Pokémon?
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_0_7: This calls for more research. How about you document your findings with some GO Snapshots? We might be on the trail of something extraordinary!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_1_0: Thank you, %PLAYERNAME%. Your research will help us dive a bit deeper into what’s currently going on.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_1_1: Since the Legendary Pokémon we discussed previously have been testing Trainers’ skills in raids, I consulted with Candela, the authority on all things related to battle.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_1_2: She thinks the current situation points to the Colt Pokémon, Keldeo, making an appearance.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_1_3: Candela is a bona fide expert on Keldeo, you see.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_1_4: She said that Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion taught this Pokémon how to fight and that it dashes across the world, seeking opportunities to further its training.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_1_5: No wonder Candela is such a big fan! It’s clear that Keldeo has the drive to improve itself and the passion to accomplish whatever it sets its mind to doing.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_1_6: Why don’t we take some inspiration from Keldeo and do some training? With such a battle-hardened Pokémon around, we can’t be too prepared.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_2_1: While you were battling away, Blanche and I had a moment to dig into some texts and learn more about Keldeo.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_2_2: Evidently, Keldeo is considered part of a powerful group of Pokémon from the Unova region that includes Cobalion, Terrakion, and Virizion.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_2_3: This confirms a link between their appearance and Spark’s sighting near the waterfront.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_2_4: It’s said that Keldeo must survive harsh battles and fully develop the horn on its forehead before its true power will awaken.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_2_5: Hm. I wonder what this “true power” might be. Let’s investigate the relationship between power and Pokémon by...well, powering up and evolving some Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_3_0: It’s all starting to come together. I think it’s now safe to say our mysterious visitor is indeed the Mythical Pokémon Keldeo!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_3_1: Blanche and I found more information, too. For starters, Keldeo actually has two forms, one of which is called its “Ordinary Form.”
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_3_2: What’s more, Keldeo can glide across water by blasting water from its hooves—and it excels at using leg moves while battling!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_3_3: This corroborates both Spark’s sighting and Candela’s knowledge of this Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_3_4: I think I’ll contact them and propose a trip to the waterfront to see if we can gather more information firsthand. Stay tuned!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_4_0: That was quite the field trip, %PLAYERNAME%, but I bear good news!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_4_1: The team leaders and I came across fresh Keldeo tracks near the waterfall in Spark’s picture!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_4_2: Spark, Blanche, and Candela all wanted to the be first to meet the Mythical Pokémon, so they’re battling it out to decide who gets the honor.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_4_3: And then there’s you. Given what a great Pokémon Trainer you are, I reckon you and Keldeo could achieve some truly marvelous feats together.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_4_4: Not to undermine our friends, but why don’t you head out with your buddy to see if you can encounter it first?
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_5_0: Amazing, %PLAYERNAME%! You’ve caught the Mythical Pokémon Keldeo!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_5_1: What an incredible discovery. Thank you for all your help as we followed those clues to their extraordinary end.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_5_2: Whoa! I can feel Keldeo’s determination to train from here. This Pokémon’s full of drive, just like you!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_5_3: Don’t keep it waiting—feel free to give yourselves a workout by taking Keldeo to battle other Trainers!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_6_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%. I can tell that Keldeo enjoyed getting stronger with you.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_6_1: The team leaders and I are so proud of all the work you’re doing to grow as a Trainer. This only adds to the list of your accomplishments.
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_6_2: And with enough time and training, perhaps we’ll be able to see Keldeo’s other form one day. I’ll keep a blank page in my research notebook ready—no, several pages!
quest_special_dialogue_keldeo_6_3: Haha. I suppose that marks the end of this adventure, but you’ll be hearing from me soon, %PLAYERNAME%. Until then, let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_0_0: %PLAYERNAME%! Impeccable timing. I was getting ready to go look for you. There’s something I’d like your help investigating.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_0_1: This morning, Meltan and I were taking a walk along one of our favorite routes when I noticed that a hill we always pass by seemed...smaller than usual.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_0_2: There’s only one possibility—Team GO Rocket’s started LITERALLY moving mountains to get their hands on Pokémon! Those scoundrels!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_0_3: Well, whatever they’re scheming, I’m sure it’s nothing you can’t nip in the bud. Good luck out there, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_0_4:
... ... ...
Haha! I’m only pulling your leg. In truth, I suspect a Pokémon is responsible.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_0_5: Take a look around and see if you spot a Pokémon that could be our mountain-moving culprit, would you?
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_1_1: Judging from the Pokémon with you, it looks like our mountain-mover must be Larvitar!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_1_2: This intrepid Pokémon is born deep underground.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_1_3: To come up to the surface, it needs to eat its way through the soil above. It can’t see its parents’ faces until it does.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_1_4: That’s hard work for a newborn, but its tough spirit’s something to admire.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_1_5: I’ll bet that spirit endures in its evolved form, Pupitar. Let’s observe one ourselves, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_2_0: Whoa! I thought I saw something shooting past, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_2_1: Maybe it was another of those shooting stars I keep seeing...but maybe it was your Pupitar!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_2_2: Pupitar can’t wait to evolve, so it relieves its stress by wildly propelling itself around using compressed gas—almost like a rocket!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_2_3: Plus, its shell is as hard as sheet rock. Its thrashing can topple a mountain, believe it or not!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_2_4: Some think of Pupitar as a troublesome Pokémon, but I can relate to its desire to grow.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_2_5: I know sometimes I’m in a rush to find all the answers and “evolve” my knowledge. It’s how I’ve gotten into more than one scrape.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_2_6: But even when you’re growing, it’s good to appreciate where you are in life. That goes for you too, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_2_7: Next, let’s take a look at the Pokémon Pupitar is so eager to evolve into!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_3_0: I thought I felt an earthquake, but it was just your Tyranitar walking around, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_3_1: And look how powerful it’s become—from its humble beginnings burrowing up through the earth to making the surface shake with every stomp.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_3_2: In fact, Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful that it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_3_3: It’s also known to wander about in mountain ranges looking for new opponents to fight.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_3_4: Luckily, Tyranitar will ignore opponents it doesn’t consider worthy. I’m probably safe!
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_3_5: But it does make you wonder how they’re able to gauge an opponent’s strength.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_3_6: Hmm... Maybe you’ll get some insight on that as you travel with Tyranitar.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_3_7: And if you do, be sure to let your favorite professor know! In any case, congratulations on befriending yet another mighty Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_larvitar_cdc_3_8: Thanks for an exciting day of research, %PLAYERNAME%. I’ll see you again soon!
quest_special_dialogue_litten_0_0: Hey, %PLAYERNAME%! You know, I had an odd dream the other night... I was spitting fire!
quest_special_dialogue_litten_0_1: Then the strangest coincidence happened—when I woke up, there were more Litten around than usual!
quest_special_dialogue_litten_0_2: I’d love to observe them more closely, but it takes time to get them to trust you, so it’s easier said than done.
quest_special_dialogue_litten_0_3: But I bet with that spark and determination of yours, you just might be able to get some of them to warm up to you.
quest_special_dialogue_litten_1_0: Color me impressed! It’s amazing that you managed to gain their trust so quickly.
quest_special_dialogue_litten_1_1: For my part, I just can’t help smothering Litten with attention—though I’m sure they’d rather I didn’t.
quest_special_dialogue_litten_1_2: How do I know? Because if you try too hard to get close to one, it won’t open up to you.
quest_special_dialogue_litten_1_3: Tell you what—why don’t you try evolving Litten into Torracat, then fill me in on what you learn in the process of building your friendship.
quest_special_dialogue_litten_2_0: Brilliant work, Trainer! Let’s have a look at your fiery new Torracat.
quest_special_dialogue_litten_2_1: Take a peek at its throat—see that bell of flame? It rings brightly whenever Torracat spits fire.
quest_special_dialogue_litten_2_2: It also boasts powerful front legs. With a single punch, it can bend an iron bar right over!
quest_special_dialogue_litten_2_3: How about we help this fur-ocious fighter burn even brighter?
quest_special_dialogue_litten_3_0: Whew! Why do I feel like I’m about to melt?! Oh—you’ve evolved your Torracat into Incineroar!
quest_special_dialogue_litten_3_1: Did you know the temperature of the flames from its navel exceeds 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit? And that’s not all!
quest_special_dialogue_litten_3_2: Incineroar is equally formidable when it’s hurling ferocious punches or flinging furious kicks! Speaking of formidable, %PLAYERNAME%—you’ve really evolved into quite the Trainer yourself.
quest_special_dialogue_litten_3_3: I can’t wait to see how much further you’ll go. Until next time, keep that fire of yours burning hot!
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_0_0: Hey, %PLAYERNAME%! Is it just me, or is there a ghostly chill in the air?
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_0_1: It could have something to do with those lights over there! They belong to Litwick, the Candle Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_0_2: Litwick is known to leech off the life force of any who follow it.
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_0_3: The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs, the brighter and eerier the flame on its head burns. Makes for a pretty ominous candle, wouldn’t you say?
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_0_4: Litwick appearing in such force makes the perfect chance to learn more about them. I suggest you get up close and see for yourself!
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_0_5: Just be careful not to let Litwick lead you anywhere, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_1_0: Good day, Trainer. Professor Willow has tasked you with investigating...Litwick, is it?
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_1_1: The flame on its head is certainly alluring. A Pokémon that can bring light to its surroundings… What could be the source of its brilliant glow?
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_1_2: “Life force,” Professor Willow says? Peculiar. I wonder—would those flames transform if Litwick were to evolve?
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_2_0: Wow, %PLAYERNAME%! You went looking for Litwick and came back with a lamp!
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_2_1: I kid—I know a Lampent when I see one! And it was Rhi who suggested you help Litwick evolve? That’s great. We can always learn more when encouraged by our friends!
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_2_2: So, let me tell you about Lampent! While it often pretends to be a lamp, Lampent is usually feared as an emissary of death.
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_2_3: Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen. Spooky, but appropriate for the season!
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_2_4: And what a sight that fire is. I’m sure you and Rhi would get a kick out of seeing Lampent’s Evolution, Chandelure, too! But a word of caution, %PLAYERNAME%...
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_2_5: They say spirits burned up in Chandelure's ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_3_1: Oh. My apologies, %PLAYERNAME%. I was...preoccupied gazing at the flame your Pokémon is emanating.
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_3_3: The swaying of its arms is rather hypnotic.
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_3_4: It's called "Chandelure," is it? And Professor Willow said its flames can burn up spirits? An unsettling thought.
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_3_5: The Pokémon we studied today could easily be seen as frightening. Yet I believe there is a lesson we can take from them.
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_3_6: No matter how dark the world becomes, a little light always persists.
quest_special_dialogue_litwick_3_7: Thank you for teaching me that lesson once again, %PLAYERNAME%. Take care, and I will see you again.
quest_special_dialogue_lny_feb23_1_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! Guess what? I was observing a herd of Ponyta last night, and I saw a shooting star! Or maybe it was a spark from fighting Shinx?
quest_special_dialogue_lny_feb23_1_1: In any case, it looks like it was a lucky star—I wished you’d turn up today, and here you are!
quest_special_dialogue_lny_feb23_1_2: Now it’s your turn. What do you wish to research today, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! Can I just say how impressed I am with your progress as a Trainer?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_0_1: You’ve really put in the time and effort to become one of the very best. Well done!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_0_2: Say, do you remember when we first met? You were just a beginner back then, and I sent you off to catch your very first Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_0_3: And look at you now! I’m glad we can share that memory together.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_0_4: Now, I’m sure an elite Trainer like yourself has mastered the art of catching Pokémon, but it’s important to keep your skills sharp.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_0_5: How about you head out and catch some Pokémon? I’ve assigned some tasks that should challenge even a Trainer of your caliber.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_1_1: I’m sure those tasks were a breeze for someone with your skills, but they were just a warm-up!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_1_2: These next tasks should prove a bit more challenging.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_1_3: I’m sure you’ve built special bonds with several Pokémon over the course of your adventures. You might even have a few Pokémon that you like to always bring into battles.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_1_4: I’d like to see how powerful those bonds are. Why don’t you head out, challenge a few Team GO Rocket Grunts, and battle in some raids?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_1_5: After all, the best Trainers never stop training!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_2_1: I’m sure you had a great time working with your closest Pokémon companions.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_2_2: It’s always fascinating to see how Trainers and Pokémon work together, and I can tell that you take a lot of pride in training your team. Well done!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_2_3: Say, why don’t you evolve some of the Pokémon you’ve caught so they can reach their full potential? You might even discover some new options for battles.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_2_4: Enough about that, though—back to our research!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_2_5: This next batch will test your Pokémon-catching skills again, but with a twist. Or perhaps I should say a curve? Haha! That’s right—you’ll need to test your skills with Curveball Throws!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_2_6: Make sure to stretch your throwing arm!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_3_0: Nice work, Trainer! I can tell you put a lot of effort into that research.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_3_1: I have Blanche assisting me with the analysis and care of all those Pokémon you sent over. It’s an impressive display of your progress, Trainer, and it’s caught Blanche’s eye as well.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_3_2: Anyway, I should probably get back to work.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_3_3: But before I go, I want to say how nice it was to reminisce about our first memories as professor and Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_3_4: I’m truly proud of you and how much you’ve grown!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_43_3_5: I know you’re far from finished on that front, too, so I’ll be watching closely as you progress and checking in whenever I have more challenges for you.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I wanted to check in on your progress. It looks like you’ve grown even more as a Trainer since we last spoke!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_0_1: As for me, I’ve been spending a lot of time with my Buddy Pokémon lately, and it’s helped me think of some new research opportunities.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_0_2: Do you remember your first Buddy Pokémon? I remember mine—it was the mysterious Hex Nut Pokémon Meltan!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_0_3: I still remember the day it earned its very own Best Buddy ribbon.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_0_4: That’s a proud moment in any Trainer’s journey, don’t you think?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_0_5: Meltan and I have been around the block a few times, but I still look forward to the next PokéStop we’ll visit.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_0_6: Why don’t you and your buddy go out and visit some of your favorite places together?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_1_0: Hope you enjoyed a few walks together with your buddy, Trainer. Did you come across any interesting PokéStops?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_1_1: I was inspired to head outdoors myself. I joined Spark and his buddy for a long walk after he won a battle.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_1_2: I even took a celebratory snapshot to mark the occasion!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_1_3: Going on walks together can be a great way to strengthen your bond with your Pokémon. It’s also a wonderful form of exercise!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_1_4: Seeing the bond Spark shares with his Pokémon gave me some ideas for more research. Oh, and Spark also wanted me to let you know that he’s cheering you on!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_1_5: How about you and your buddy go out for a walk, challenge another Trainer and their Pokémon to battle, and take a few snapshots to capture some fun moments together?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_1_6: Working hard is important, but so is savoring the memories made along the way! Have fun!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_2_0: Did you make any fun memories with your Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_2_1: I’m always amazed by the variety in the snapshots taken by Trainers from all over the world.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_2_2: I’m especially fond of ones that capture surprise encounters with Pokémon like Smeargle!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_2_3: That’s one of the best parts of taking snapshots—you never know what you’re going to see!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_2_4: Hmm... That reminds me of when Team GO Rocket decided to start showing up in Trainers’ snapshots uninvited. And THAT reminds me of some more research I need your help with!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_2_5: To start, why don’t you and your buddy get warmed up with some raids? When you’re ready, I think we’ll need some help clearing out the Team GO Rocket Leaders in the area.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_2_6: They’re always up to something, so it’s good to keep an eye out in case they try to take over any nearby PokéStops. Good luck!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_3_1: The Team GO Rocket Leaders are a challenge for most Trainers, but I knew they wouldn’t stand a chance against you and your Buddy Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_3_2: The power of friendship is strong indeed—and just one of many benefits to building relationships with your Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_3_3: The trust between a Trainer and their Pokémon is unlike anything I’ve ever seen. Make sure to cherish it!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_3_4: I’m glad I was able to check in on your progress, Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_45_3_5: I’ll be back with more fun challenges as you continue your journey.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_0_1: I can see you’ve been working as hard as ever!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_0_2: We’ve been doing a lot of reminiscing lately, haven’t we? I think it’s important to look back on your accomplishments from time to time—especially when you’ve accomplished so much!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_0_3: A major moment for many Trainers is their first victory in battle.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_0_4: It’s an unforgettable thrill that comes with a swell of pride for the Pokémon that sealed the victory.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_0_5: How about you, %PLAYERNAME%? I’m sure you’ve got some epic battle stories to share with your fellow Trainers.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_0_6: I’d like to focus on your battling skills for this next challenge. So to prepare, why don’t you get your team sorted and get in some throwing practice?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_1_0: You clearly have some powerful Pokémon, Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_1_1: You’ve done an amazing job training them! I wanted to see how your battling skills have progressed, so I consulted with Candela to get her thoughts.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_1_2: I’m happy to report that she’s just as proud of you as I am!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_1_3: For this next challenge, she suggested taking on some of her most difficult opponents—Team GO Rocket and its leaders.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_1_4: The Team GO Rocket Leaders can be intimidating, so Candela asked me to pass along some extra guidance.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_1_5: She said that when it comes to battling, you should take on your opponents with a cool head, strong Pokémon, and a heart full of passion.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_1_6: With that in mind, I think it’s time for you to head out and put your skills to the test!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_2_0: Wonderful work, %PLAYERNAME%! Your battling skills are even more impressive than the last time we talked.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_2_1: Those skills are vital not only when you take on Team GO Rocket but also when you battle in raids. Do you remember your first raid, Trainer?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_2_2: To me, there’s something special about a group of Trainers coming together to challenge a raid with their partner Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_2_3: There’s no questioning the importance of the bonds Trainers share with their Pokémon, but I think the bonds Trainers share with their peers are equally important.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_2_4: No matter your skill level, what team you’re on, or the Pokémon you bring to battle, raids are about each Trainer working together to achieve a common goal. And that’s what the Trainer community is all about!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_2_5: I hope that inspired you to head out and challenge some raids with your fellow Trainers—because that’s part of your next task!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_2_6: It should be a fun challenge, so be sure to give it your best shot!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_3_1: Did you enjoy spending time with your fellow Trainers as you completed your tasks?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_3_2: Hopefully you even found a Pokémon that’ll make a great addition to your team!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_3_3: I hope you continue making memories with Trainers from all over as you work together and explore this amazing world filled with Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_3_4: Very few Trainers have made it as far as you have. Be sure to take a moment to celebrate your progress.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_48_3_5: And remember—the journey is just as important as the destination!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_0_0: I knew I’d see you here before long, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_0_1: But before we begin this challenge, let’s take a couple deep breaths together, shall we?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_0_2: In... And out... One more time. In... And out... There, that’s better.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_0_3: A few deep breaths go a long way when you need to clear your mind and focus on the task at hand—and you’ll need plenty of focus for what I’ll be throwing your way next.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_0_4: Get it? “Throwing”? Ahem! Anyway... The sign of a truly great Trainer is their dedication to training, and true dedication takes time to prove.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_0_5: Your next few tasks will take some time to complete, but don’t worry. Start with a deep breath, and be sure to enjoy yourself!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_0_6: Training can be hard work, but don’t forget it’s supposed to be fun, too.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_1_1: I don’t know many who would have the dedication and patience to complete those tasks.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_1_2: Say, I was just thinking... Do you remember when you decided which team you wanted to join?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_1_3: Trainers often form a strong connection to their team and become dedicated members. Others, however, eventually look to change teams in hopes of gaining a different perspective and a fresh challenge.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_1_4: Everyone’s path is different, and I’ll always encourage you to find your own. There’s much to be learned from Team Instinct, Team Mystic, and Team Valor. Each team has its own unique characteristics and focus.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_1_5: I urge you to learn from your fellow Trainers and respect their paths. It’s sure to help you become a better Trainer! After all, only when we understand others can we truly understand ourselves.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_1_6: Now, back to your research. I have a feeling this next batch will truly test your resolve, so take your time—we’ll regroup when you’re finished!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_2_0: Welcome back, Trainer. You certainly showed your dedication by completing those tasks.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_2_1: Which did you find most difficult? And which was most fun?
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_2_2: We’re approaching the end of this challenge, and I’m not ashamed to say it’s making me a bit emotional! The team leaders and I feel an immense sense of pride when we see how much you’ve grown.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_2_3: I hope you feel that pride in yourself, %PLAYERNAME%. To wrap up this challenge, each team leader wanted you to experience some of their most beloved activities.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_2_4: Spark wants you to enjoy a walk with your buddy to enhance your bond, and Blanche hopes to remind you of the importance of research and analysis by asking you to evolve some of your Pokémon to their full potential.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_2_5: As for Candela... Well, she wants to celebrate with you after you win some raids.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_2_6: I think these are great tasks for a well-rounded Trainer like yourself. I’ll be here to congratulate you when you’re done!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_3_0: Amazing. Simply amazing, %PLAYERNAME%! Let me be the first to congratulate you for completing this challenge. You’ve become a truly top-class Trainer, and it’s been an honor to work alongside you.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_3_1: It’s been astonishing to witness the growth you’ve experienced since you began your journey as a Pokémon Trainer. You’re an incredible talent, and I hope you’ll put your skills to use.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_3_2: You see, I want you to help other Trainers become the best they can be. Your experience comes with a lot of responsibility, and I hope you’ll continue to show kindness, patience, and friendship to those who could benefit from your guidance.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_3_3: The world of Pokémon is a beautiful place, and I want you to lead by example and show everyone how amazing our community can be while protecting it from the likes of Team GO Rocket and anyone else who would threaten it.
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_3_4: Remember how it felt the first time you caught a Pokémon, the first time you took a walk with your buddy, the first time you challenged a raid—and channel that energy into everything you do. With your strong heart and peerless determination, there’s nothing you can’t do!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_3_5: I can only hope you’re as proud of yourself as the team leaders and I are of you. Don’t worry—I’ll always be here when you need me, and you can be sure I’ll be calling on you from time to time to help me with research. There’s always something more to discover, after all!
quest_special_dialogue_lvl_50_3_6: Thanks for everything, %PLAYERNAME%. I know I can always count on you! And I’m sure you know what I’m about to say, so before I get too choked up—let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_0_1: Come look at this. See that there, in the dirt?
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_0_2: That’s right—footprints! Though not human ones, I’d wager.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_0_3: You’d be hard pressed to find shoes that would fit whatever feet made these, I think! There must be a Pokémon responsible, though I’m not sure which one...
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_0_4: I’m going to stick around and see if I can’t learn a bit more from these footprints, so why don’t you follow them and see where they take you?
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_0_5: Make sure to snap some photos of your findings!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_1_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! That Ground-type Pokémon you caught looks spectacular.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_1_1: Did you know that Drilbur, the Mole Pokémon, can dig through the ground at incredible speeds?
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_1_2: In the Galar region, Drilbur often leave farmers in a tizzy because they damage their crops. Sounds like mole than they can handle, eh? Haha!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_1_3: Anyway, while you were out, I received reports that the Pokémon we’re looking for has vines on its body.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_1_4: How about you search the bushes nearby to see if you can find any vines? Don’t forget to snap some photos, too!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_2_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%. You got a great shot of that Bug-type Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_2_1: I encountered a curious Bug-type Pokémon myself, actually: Combee.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_2_2: Known as the Tiny Bee Pokémon, Combee is actually a trio! The three work together to collect honey and deliver it to their colony.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_2_3: Such abundant teamwork sure is admirable!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_2_4: I’m sure our team leaders strive to achieve that same level of synergy.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_2_5: Anyway, the Combee I saw got me thinking: Maybe we’ve been searching too close to the ground. If my hypothesis is correct, we’re on the trail of a Pokémon that can sometimes be seen hopping from tree to tree.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_2_6: This time, try searching among the trees to see if you can find any leads. And don’t forget to photograph your findings!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_3_1: I believe the Pokémon we’re after tends to live deep in forests—much like Nuzleaf does—so we should be on the right track.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_3_2: Ah, look—your Nuzleaf just started playing its grass flute!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_3_3: The sound of it is said to make its listeners uneasy. I wonder if it’s trying to lead the Pokémon out into the open...
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_3_5: Look there! A dark shadow just dashed across the sky! Keep your eyes up, %PLAYERNAME%, and chase after it! Let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_4_1: The photo you sent me speaks to your efforts. And I see you made a new friend in that Rufflet!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_4_2: Did you know that Rufflet will challenge Pokémon stronger than itself, even if it might lose? That’s how it pushes itself to grow!
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_4_3: Pretty brave, huh? I think bravery is exactly what we’ll need as we prepare to encounter the mysterious Pokémon we’ve been tracking.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_4_4: Thanks to all the information we’ve gathered, I’m certain that we’re dealing with Zarude, the Rogue Monkey Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_4_5: The Mythical Pokémon Zarude tend to live in packs in the forest, but it looks like the one we’ve been following is all on its own.
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_4_6: Sounds like the perfect chance to catch it, don’t you think?
quest_special_dialogue_m23_2021_4_7: With everything we’ve learned—and all the Pokémon friends you’ve made along the way—I’m sure you’ll succeed!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_0_1: Oh! %PLAYERNAME%, you caught me by surprise. I was just thinking about some movies I’ve seen recently.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_0_2: What, you didn’t take me for a movie guy? Haha! Well, while the world of Pokémon is my greatest passion, I’ve been trying to explore my interests outside of research and Pokémon as well.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_0_3: Self-discovery is important for personal growth in all walks of life. It can also be quite fun! I’ve learned that I really enjoy watching a film to pass the time now and again.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_0_4: Also, a lot of movies feature Pokémon! Don’t you love it when your interests overlap?
quest_special_dialogue_macht_0_5: I saw an incredibly thrilling action movie the other day. It was about a fighter who, against all odds, becomes a professional boxer alongside his trusty Machop.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_0_6: Life had him on the ropes, but he just kept punching back! Talk about inspiring.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_0_7: Did you know that Machop love to work out and build their muscles? They’re never satisfied, even when they train hard all day long! I wish I had that energy when I do fieldwork!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_0_8: Speaking of Machop: Did you notice that more of them are appearing in the wild? That’s what reminded me of that movie in the first place!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_0_9: Could you head out and learn more about Machop?
quest_special_dialogue_macht_1_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! Great job catching all those Machop. I wonder if you’ll grow as close as the two characters in that movie.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_1_1: The main character started in a pretty tough place, but his Machop kept him motivated and inspired.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_1_2: Then, he was given an incredible opportunity to compete against other fighters. My favorite part was when his Machop evolved into Machoke!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_1_3: Isn’t the relationship between a Trainer and their Pokémon wonderful? Machoke are truly remarkable Pokémon, too.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_1_4: A Machoke’s muscular body is so powerful, the Pokémon must wear a power-save belt to regulate its motions.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_1_5: As it happens, you should have enough Machop Candies now to evolve Machop into a Machoke of your own. It’s almost like you’re living out that movie yourself!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_2_0: Wow—that’s one muscular Machoke! Great work evolving it.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_2_1: Sometimes, Machoke will head to fields and mountains to exercise and train. Isn’t that dedication amazing?
quest_special_dialogue_macht_2_2: It reminds me of a training montage in that film. The Trainer and his Machoke traveled to the mountains to train together.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_2_3: Watching their friendship blossom almost moved me to tears! The way they encouraged each other reminded me why I love Pokémon, especially when the Machoke evolved into Machamp!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_2_4: Oops, there I go again… Anyway, Machop and Machoke are very impressive Pokémon, but Machamp is on an entirely different level.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_2_5: Its four arms react more quickly than it can think, so Machamp can execute several punches at once!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_2_6: Hoo-hah! That was the movie Machamp’s signature move. Haha, who knew I’d become such a film buff? Get it? Buff?
quest_special_dialogue_macht_2_8: How about you do a bit of research on Machamp? Your Machoke seems pumped to get stronger. Let’s try evolving it into Machamp and see what happens!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_3_0: Wow, %PLAYERNAME%! I saw you approaching with your newly evolved Machamp, and I almost couldn’t believe my eyes. It was just like the end of that movie!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_3_1: The Trainer ended up winning the tournament, and he couldn’t have done it without his Machamp by his side.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_3_2: Movies are so powerful! Especially ones about Pokémon and their Trainers.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_3_3: I suppose you and Machamp don’t need to watch that particular film, though—you practically lived it today! It’s been inspiring to witness, and I hope to carry that inspiration with me as I grow closer to my own Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_macht_3_4: You never know what you’ll discover about yourself when you try new things—just like how you never know which Pokémon you’ll end up forming a lifelong friendship with until you catch them!
quest_special_dialogue_macht_3_5: Thanks for coming along with me on this journey, Trainer. I wish you and your Machamp well, and I’ll see you next time. Let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_magit_0_0: Good to see you, %PLAYERNAME%! Do you hear that sound?
quest_special_dialogue_magit_0_1: All morning, I’ve been hearing the distinct sound of splashing water. While somewhat relaxing, it’s definitely not a normal thing to hear around the lab.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_0_2: Upon further investigation, I noticed an increased number of Magikarp in the wild. It was quite the sight to see so many of them splashing about.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_0_3: Guess it’s time to GO fishing! Get it? Because Magikarp is the Fish Pokémon?
quest_special_dialogue_magit_0_4: Anyway, I think it’ll be safe to approach Magikarp, as documentation indicates they’re harmless.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_0_5: However, I see potential in this Pokémon. It’s time to head out and investigate.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_1_0: Great work, Trainer! While you were out, I did a bit of a refresher on Magikarp.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_1_1: Did you know that some Magikarp can jump so high, they can leap over a mountain? Now that’s something I’d like to see!
quest_special_dialogue_magit_1_2: Also, while having a reputation for being worthless, this hardy Pokémon can thrive in any body of water, regardless of how dirty or polluted the water might be.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_1_3: I think Magikarp deserves a bit more credit, don’t you think? Let’s focus on evolving Magikarp, since doing so takes some effort.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_1_4: Maybe you should try using Pinap Berries when trying to catch Magikarp. Not only are Pinap Berries tasty, but they’re quite useful as well!
quest_special_dialogue_magit_2_0: Good job, %PLAYERNAME%. Thanks to the research you’ve completed, it’s time to evolve that Magikarp of yours!
quest_special_dialogue_magit_2_1: Remember when I said that Magikarp is harmless? Well, that isn’t the case with its evolved form, Gyarados.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_2_2: Known as the Atrocious Pokémon, Gyarados has a reputation for being destructive. Tales of its rampaging nature are consistent across all research materials we have on it.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_2_3: So much for being harmless, am I right? Of note, Gyarados is both Water- and Flying-type—something you might not expect from its humble beginnings.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_2_4: Looks like you’ll be adding a powerful Pokémon to your team, but let’s proceed with caution.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_3_0: Wonderful work, %PLAYERNAME%. Looks like all your efforts have paid off, and you’ve got yourself a Gyarados.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_3_1: I’m sure this Pokémon will be a great member of your team when battling other Trainers or even Team GO Rocket!
quest_special_dialogue_magit_3_2: Even though Gyarados is known for being vicious and extremely aggressive, a talented Trainer such as yourself will be able to befriend and train it so it can meet its full potential.
quest_special_dialogue_magit_3_3: I’m excited to see what kinds of challenges you’ll demolish together!
quest_special_dialogue_magit_3_4: Just make sure that the demolition is limited to battles—not entire cities.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_0: Ah, %PLAYERNAME%! Perfect timing. I’ve just encountered something strange!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_1: I’ve been feeling a bit warm lately, so I walked to a nearby clearing to enjoy the cool breeze—but the temperature seemed to rise as I arrived!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_2: Curious, isn’t it? I suspect it’s the work of a certain Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_3: There’s one that’s known to dislike cold areas so much, it’ll blow scorching flames to heat up its surroundings.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_4: I believe there are large groups of this particular Pokémon appearing all over the place right now.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_5: Ah, you’re wondering which Pokémon I’m talking about? I think I’ll keep that to myself for now. But here—I'll write it on this piece of paper, and we can check later to see if I was right!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_0_6: Can you go investigate and let me know what you find? Thanks, Trainer!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_1: As promised, I’ll now reveal my guess as to which Pokémon is responsible for these recent temperature spikes. As you can see, I wrote down...Magmar!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_2: My intuition is pretty “lit,” eh? Am I using that ri—AH! Wow, that little fireball turned my paper straight to ash!
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_3: Anyway, it seems the cause of these irregular warm fronts is indeed Magmar, the Spitfire Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_4: When it breathes deeply, heat waves form around its body, making it hard to see clearly. Isn’t that just incredible?
quest_special_dialogue_magmt_1_5: And to think that this intimidating Pokémon evolves from the adorable Magby, the Live Coal Pokémon!
