quest_special_dialogue_power_jan22_1_8: I haven’t the foggiest if it can, but that won’t stop me. I want to learn everything about this strange and wonderful Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_power_jan22_1_9: After all, it’s not every day that a literal blast from the past falls into your lap! Get it? Because Voltorb can Self-Destruct? Haha...
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_0_0: Hi, %PLAYERNAME%, I’m glad to see you! Can I get your help with investigating something?
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_0_1: I’ve noticed an alarming number of reports from Trainers who have found PokéStops that look...discolored?
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_0_2: Some Trainers have even spotted people wearing shirts with a big letter R on them who are guarding these PokéStops.
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_0_3: These shady characters appear to have Pokémon with a mysterious dark aura around them!
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_0_4: As I investigate this with Spark, it might be best to power up some of your Pokémon. You never know what we might encounter...
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_1_1: After visiting one of the PokéStops with Spark, we were challenged to a Trainer Battle by someone who belongs to an organization called Team GO Rocket!
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_1_2: Turns out that Team GO Rocket has been stealing resources from PokéStops with the help of Pokémon that are cloaked in a dark aura. They’re called Shadow Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_1_3: Luckily, we won the battle, and afterward, Team GO Rocket carelessly abandoned their defeated Shadow Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_1_4: Help us protect local PokéStops from Team GO Rocket, Trainer! As you do so, please save any Shadow Pokémon that Team GO Rocket abandons!
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_2_0: Thanks for all your hard work, %PLAYERNAME%! Candela and I have done some research on Shadow Pokémon and learned some very unsettling things.
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_2_1: While Pokémon naturally become stronger through training, these Shadow Pokémon seem to have been overpowered through unnatural means.
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_2_2: As a result, their bodies painfully struggle with not knowing how to control this strength.
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_2_3: But don’t worry! It looks like we can help them harness this strength through a process called purification.
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_2_4: Can you help me purify some Shadow Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_3_0: WOW! Thanks for helping us learn more about the Shadow Pokémon that Team GO Rocket uses, Trainer!
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_3_1: After observing the purification process with Blanche, it’s clear that the Pokémon’s gratefulness to you for purifying them causes the move Frustration to be replaced with Return!
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_3_2: Now that you have this knowledge, we need your help with saving as many Shadow Pokémon as possible by taking back PokéStops that are under Team GO Rocket’s control!
quest_special_dialogue_rocket_3_3: The world is under attack! Can we count on you to help protect it? I do hope there’s nothing more to this...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_0_0: %PLAYERNAME%! How have you been? Finding time to relax, I hope? Perhaps with your Pokémon?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_0_1: I’m enjoying a bit of a productivity boom, myself, but it’s made me realize that my research has gone uninterrupted for quite some time.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_0_2: I fear there may be trouble brewing—specifically from Team GO Rocket. They’ve been too quiet for too long, don’t you think?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_0_3: Would you mind patrolling the area to see if anything’s amiss?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_1_0: Well done, %PLAYERNAME%. As much as I wish they’d give us a break, I know Team GO Rocket never rests—so neither can we!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_1_1: I’m relieved to see you’ve rescued a couple of Shadow Pokémon from them already.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_1_2: As both a professor and as someone who loves Pokémon, I can’t stand idly by as Team GO Rocket mistreats so many innocent Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_1_3: Let’s get back out there and rescue some more Pokémon from them!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_2_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! Thanks for handling those Team GO Rocket Grunts. You and your Pokémon have done a great job of scaring them off, as usual!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_2_1: They’ll think twice before showing up around here again, I suspect.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_2_2: But those Shadow Pokémon they’ve left behind... Well, at least they’re safe with us now.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_2_3: %PLAYERNAME%, let’s purify them so they can put their terrible time with Team GO Rocket in the past. I know they’ll be grateful for your help!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_3_0: Those Pokémon are looking much better now, %PLAYERNAME%. I’m sure they’re relieved to be with a Trainer like you and away from Team GO Rocket.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_3_1: Now that we’ve cleared out some of their underlings, I think we’d better track down the Team GO Rocket Leaders.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_3_2: Based on how you handled those Grunts, I’m sure the Leaders won’t stand a chance!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_4_0: You’ve done it, %PLAYERNAME%! Once again, you’ve been instrumental in stopping Team GO Rocket from getting their way.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_4_1: It’s a privilege to watch you and your partners grow together and use your strength to help Pokémon everywhere.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_4_2: Now. We’ve neutralized the Team GO Rocket Leaders, so it’s time to let Giovanni know that we’re not going to let him carry out his plan unchallenged.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_4_3: I know he’s tough—but you’re tougher. I have the utmost confidence in you, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_5_0: Incredible work, %PLAYERNAME%! You and your Pokémon have an impressive bond—one that Team GO Rocket will never be able match.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_5_1: Pokémon everywhere are fortunate to have you on their side!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_5_2: I know it won’t be long before Team GO Rocket appears with another scheme, but I can rest a bit easier knowing that you’re here to stop them right in their tracks.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq10_5_3: For now, though, get some rest. You’ve more than earned it!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_0_1: There appears to be an increased number of Team GO Rocket members in the area.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_0_2: I have yet to determine what they are doing here, but I suspect that a scheme of some sort is underway.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_0_3: We should investigate before they decide to cause trouble.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_1_0: Thank you, Pokémon Trainer. The atmosphere is improved with fewer Team GO Rocket members present.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_1_1: One detail still mystifies me. Why do the Pokémon used by Team GO Rocket possess those peculiar auras?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_1_2: I see. They become Shadow Pokémon through experimentation and mistreatment.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_1_3: So they corrupt a blameless creature, and then they abandon it?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_1_5: I am coming to realize that this group will pursue their goals relentlessly and without conscience.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_1_6: We must impede them however we can.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_1_7: Come, Pokémon Trainer—let us begin by rescuing some Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_2_3: Apologies for my dour demeanor. I cannot stop thinking about the Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_2_4: Is there nothing we can do beyond rescuing them from Team GO Rocket? Will they remain in this state forever?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_2_5: Hm? You are able to...purify them?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_2_6: If doing so removes their ominous aura, I would like nothing more than to observe this phenomenon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_2_7: Will you show me, Pokémon Trainer?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_3_0: So this is a Purified Pokémon. Its shadowy aura is gone. In its place—radiance.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_3_1: You are deserving of praise, Pokémon Trainer. But our efforts cannot end here.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_3_2: Perhaps we should turn our attention to Team GO Rocket members of a higher standing.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_3_3: If you can defeat their leaders in battle, we may hinder their plans.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_4_0: Those battles were among the fiercest I have witnessed, Pokémon Trainer. I am fortunate to call you my ally.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_4_1: Regrettably, it seems the Team GO Rocket leaders were not inspired to change their ways. They, too, have abandoned their Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_4_2: But surely we have at least stalled their plans. Such an expansive organization cannot function without its leaders at full strength.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_4_3: Hm? We must still deal with this...Giovanni, is it? I see.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_4_4: Then our work is not yet finished, Pokémon Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_5_0: That was a fearsome battle, Pokémon Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_5_1: I am dazzled by your capacity to overcome any challenge set before you.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_5_2: Please, relish your well-earned victory—but we must remain vigilant. If Team GO Rocket were to manipulate the Ultra Beasts...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_5_3: We do not want their villainy to interfere with our endeavors.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_5_4: For now, however, I think we can turn our attention back to the Ultra Wormholes.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_5_5: So long as they remain open in your world, more Ultra Beasts could appear.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_5_6: Though considering the strength you displayed today, perhaps my fear is unnecessary.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq11_5_7: In any case, thank you for allowing me to observe you today. I am pleased we were able to assist so many Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_0_0: %PLAYERNAME%. I suspect you have already noticed, but Team GO Rocket seems to be assembling en masse again.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_0_1: What shadowy schemes could those ruffians be plotting? They look to be glowering right at you.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_0_2: Surely they couldn’t be thinking of absconding with the Ultra Beasts?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_0_3: Or perhaps they’ve designs on Cosmoem. In its current state, I fear—
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_0_4: No. Anxious speculation will not avail us. Preventative measures must come first.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_0_5: %PLAYERNAME%. Could you use your battling skills to send some of these Grunts away?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_1_0: Huh. I thought there were more Team GO Rocket Grunts around earlier...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_1_1: Oh, %PLAYERNAME%, it’s you! I guess I’ve got you to thank for getting those goons out of here.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_1_2: Rhi says they may be taking an interest in our otherworldly visitors, huh?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_1_3: I’m inclined to think they’re right. Good thing you’re here to save the day!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_1_4: Keep flushing Team GO Rocket out, %PLAYERNAME%. Try looking for their Leaders next.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_1_5: I’m sure you and Rhi can track them down!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_2_0: Brilliant work, %PLAYERNAME%. You’ve managed to defeat Team GO Rocket’s Leaders.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_2_1: I knew your superlative skills would lead you to victory. And you had the chance to speak with Professor Willow, correct? What did he have to say?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_2_2: I see... Though I am pleased Professor Willow has corroborated my theory, I continue to be concerned for the Ultra Beasts and Cosmoem.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_2_3: I take solace in knowing that we have dispersed the majority of Team GO Rocket, if nothing else.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_2_4: Now, the time has come to challenge the man who sits atop the organization: Giovanni.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_3_0: So, you sent Giovanni home with his tail between his legs? Just another day in the life for you, huh, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_3_1: It’s no easy feat to put Team GO Rocket back in their place, but you rose to the challenge.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_3_2: Great job! Now take some well-deserved rest with your Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq12_3_3: I’ll be in touch again soon!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_0_1: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%. You know, it was shaping up to be a beautiful day, but then I noticed there are more Team GO Rocket Grunts than usual lurking about.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_0_2: Do you think they’re up to something? Could it be connected to all the Electric-type Pokémon that’ve been around recently?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_0_3: I have heard that Team GO Rocket has a reputation for causing trouble at power plants... Hm.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_0_4: Would you do me a favor and investigate what’s going on, %PLAYERNAME%? Just to be safe.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_1_1: Great work dealing with those Team GO Rocket Grunts, %PLAYERNAME%. They’ll think twice before trying to battle you again!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_1_2: If only they’d spare as much thought for the Shadow Pokémon they’ve abandoned in their wake.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_1_3: I hope that one day, we’ll put a stop Team GO Rocket’s mistreatment of Pokémon once and for all.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_1_4: But until then, at least we can do something for the Pokémon they leave behind.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_2_1: Welcome back! Those Pokémon you purified are looking better already, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_2_2: Thanks for helping them—and me. It’s a relief to see them safe with you.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_2_3: They’ll shine even brighter the longer they spend with you, I’m sure.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_2_4: But back to business. Next, look for Cliff, Sierra, and Arlo. We can’t let...whatever they’re doing proceed unchecked! Or untested for nefariousness, at least.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_3_1: Great job, %PLAYERNAME%! You’ve made quick work of the Team GO Rocket Leaders.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_3_2: *sigh* I wish they’d change their ways. I have to give them credit—they’ve got a wealth of knowledge on Pokémon, and they’re strong Trainers to boot.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_3_3: Imagine what we could learn together if they used that passion for good...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_3_4: I know, I know. That’s “highly improbable,” as Rhi might say. No harm in wishing, though!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_3_5: Now, I have one final request. I’d like you to track down the one person I’m sure will never change: Giovanni, the head of Team GO Rocket!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_4_1: Expertly handled, %PLAYERNAME%! I knew Giovanni didn’t stand a chance against you.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_4_2: You’re getting to be a real pro at battling him. No matter what he throws at you, there’s just no beating the bond between you and your Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_4_3: I think it’s time you took a rest and celebrated your victory with the Pokémon you’ve freed from Team GO Rocket’s clutches.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq13_4_4: Let’s hope they learn their lesson one day soon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_0_0: Thanks for your help in defeating Team GO Rocket Grunts, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_0_1: The team leaders and I have been observing Team GO Rocket, and something tells us this is far from over.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_0_2: The transmission sent during the Team GO Rocket take-over had a message from an unknown sender at the end.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_0_3: We’re going to need all the help we can get to reveal the identity of this unknown figure looming in the shadows, and you are just the Trainer for the job!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_0_4: Can you help us get to the bottom of this mystery?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_1_0: Thank you for your continued support against those pesky Team GO Rocket Grunts.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_1_1: As they flee, some Grunts are leaving behind Mysterious Components.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_1_2: I believe these are what Team GO Rocket is using to hack and steal resources from PokéStops. Clever little devices, aren’t they?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_1_3: There’s information we can glean from these components that will help us in our fight against this dangerous organization.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_1_4: Once you have enough pieces, you should be able to assemble something similar to the device I’ve modified in my lab. It might be best to prepare yourself for whatever might come, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_2_0: Interesting. It appears there’s more to Team GO Rocket than previously thought.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_2_1: Their ingenuity has got me thinking there might be another use for these Mysterious Components. We shouldn’t underestimate Team GO Rocket.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_2_2: It’s time to get battle ready, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_2_3: I don’t want to send you out to face another foe without some more training.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_2_4: While you sharpen your battle skills, I’ll be sure to get this little project of mine up and operational.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_3_0: Fantastic work, Trainer. I’ve been working on a prototype for something I call the Rocket Radar, but I was missing some critical components.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_3_1: Your hard work in retrieving these components actually made my device work!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_3_2: If we combine my research and these Mysterious Components you’ve found, we can create a radar-like tool to track down Team GO Rocket Hideouts!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_3_3: Trainers all over the world are figuring out how to put together devices like this, and they’re identifying more hideouts than I originally anticipated.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_3_4: %PLAYERNAME%, it’s time to head to these hideouts and face whatever—or whomever—is there head on. Let’s GO.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_4_0: You battled well, %PLAYERNAME%! You’ve done your team leaders—and me—proud.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_4_1: According to my observations, it appears the sender of that mysterious transmission during the Team GO Rocket take-over was not in attendance.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_4_2: There’s someone else calling the shots—someone above Sierra, Cliff, and Arlo.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_4_3: I’ve improved on my previous invention and put together a Super Rocket Radar that should help you track this mastermind down.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_4_4: If it is who I think it is, he signs all his messages with “G.”
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_5_1: You’ve put a stop to Team GO Rocket’s plans for the time being and rescued a special Shadow Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_5_2: It’s unlikely that Giovanni will give up this easily, so I hope we can rely on you to take down Team GO Rocket members as they appear around your area.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_5_3: Spark, Blanche, and Candela will be on the lookout as well.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq1_5_4: I’m sure Team GO Rocket will try to hatch another villainous plot soon...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%. Thanks for your help holding back Team GO Rocket’s forces. It’s good to know I can rely on you.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_0_1: However, something tells me Team GO Rocket won’t be going away anytime soon, so we’re in it for the long haul.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_0_2: We need to think long-term about our strategy when it comes to Team GO Rocket.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_0_3: I want to make sure only the most-prepared Trainers are equipped with Super Rocket Radar devices to track Giovanni.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_0_4: I know you’re an accomplished Trainer, but let’s make sure your skills are keeping up with the challenge Team GO Rocket poses.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_1_1: You know how purifying Shadow Pokémon makes them stronger afterward due to the gratitude they feel toward you for saving them?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_1_2: Maybe one of the Pokémon you purify will become a trusted partner in our efforts to fight against Team GO Rocket’s invasion.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_1_3: We need to continue saving and purifying these Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_1_4: Remember this: a good Trainer is strong, but a great Trainer is caring and kind.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_2_0: Fantastic! Good work purifying all those Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%. They’re practically glowing with gratitude!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_2_1: It’s easy to tell Shadow and Purified Pokémon apart by the auras that surround them.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_2_2: One of my favorite sights is a Purified Pokémon standing proud atop a Gym controlled by its Trainer’s team. It’s truly a thing to behold.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_2_3: It’s time for you and your new friends to train alongside one another.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_2_4: A difficult challenge awaits you, so you need to be prepared for battle, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_3_0: You should feel proud of your progress, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_3_1: The team leaders and I are certainly proud of how much you’ve grown as a Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_3_2: I have one final task for you before I can be sure your skills are keeping up with an opponent like Giovanni.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_3_3: If you can show me that you can still defeat the Team GO Rocket Leaders...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_3_4: then I’ll know that you and your Pokémon are in top form.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_4_0: Your skills are as impressive as ever. It’s time for you to take a Super Rocket Radar and see if you can track down the boss himself.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_4_1: %PLAYERNAME%, I think you’re ready to take on Giovanni again.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_4_2: You’ve proven your strength in battle, and you’ve also shown your compassion by saving and purifying Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_4_3: So get out there and confront Giovanni. With loyal Pokémon at your side and lots of experience under your belt, you’re unstoppable!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_5_0: Fantastic work, %PLAYERNAME%! You should enjoy your victory, of course, but it looks like our work isn’t done.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_5_1: While you were busy, I was doing some reconnaissance. I have to admit, it’s been quite thrilling!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_5_2: As you might have guessed, there are many more hideouts and headquarters out there that the Team GO Rocket Leaders and Giovanni could be hiding in.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_5_3: We may have defeated them for the moment, but I’m sure they’ll be back and causing more trouble soon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq2_5_4: When that day comes, be sure you’re ready for the challenge!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_0_1: I’m sure you’ve seen that Team GO Rocket has continued their plans to take over PokéStops and turn even more Pokémon into Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_0_2: Have you seen an increase in Team GO Rocket activity in your area?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_0_3: The team leaders and I have been getting reports from Trainers all over the world that these villains haven’t given up.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_0_4: We need to keep working to save Pokémon from these no-good Grunts and their leaders.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_1_1: Persistence and determination are key in our continued efforts to take down Team GO Rocket!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_1_3: It’s time to purify more Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_1_4: They have you to thank for saving them! Perhaps one of the Pokémon you saved will become an essential member of your battle team.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_2_0: How has your training been going, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_2_1: Be sure to build a healthy habit of improving yourself!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_2_3: Becoming a great Trainer is something that comes with continued practice.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_2_4: It’s important that you’re prepared for the challenges ahead, so let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_3_0: All right! You make the team leaders—and me—proud, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_3_1: It’s time to head out and show those Team GO Rocket Leaders that we’re strong enough to hold our own.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_3_2: We can’t let these bullies get in our way when we’re saving Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_4_1: There seems to be a trend behind which Pokémon Giovanni is turning into Shadow Pokémon. I’m thinking about the fact that he has Legendary Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_4_2: Could that have anything to do with why he’s here?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_4_3: In any case, the time has come to track him down.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_4_4: The more we battle Giovanni and his team of Grunts, the more we learn about why he’s waging these take-overs.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_5_0: You’ve shown what it takes to be a true Trainer, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_5_1: Your battle with Giovanni wasn’t easy, but the skills you’ve learned through practice and patience have paid off.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_5_3: Giovanni does not like to lose, so I’m sure he’ll be back soon, trying to further his plans.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq3_5_4: I’m sure I can count on you when he returns.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%. Thanks for your help battling Team GO Rocket. Trainers like you help keep Pokémon safe!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_0_1: But this battle is far from over, and we must continue learning about Team GO Rocket, their leaders, and their boss, Giovanni.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_0_2: Looks like the Rocket Radar I developed is helping the cause. I remember when this strange activity started happening...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_0_3: Back then, I had a hunch the Mysterious Components that Team GO Rocket Grunts were leaving behind held more secrets than we originally thought. We’ve come quite a long way since then!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_0_4: On that note, could you continue your work battling Grunts and helping Shadow Pokémon?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_1_1: I remember the first time we came across Shadow Pokémon. It was heartbreaking to see the pain they were in, and I knew I had to do something.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_1_2: As a Pokémon Professor, I always want to contribute and help where I can. I may not be an accomplished battler like you, %PLAYERNAME%, but I can use my skills as a researcher and scientist to assist you on your journey.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_1_3: That was why I started using Mysterious Components to build the prototype for the Rocket Radar. I hoped that Trainers like you could use it in our ongoing fight against Team GO Rocket and in our efforts to rescue more Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_1_4: So let’s get out there and do just that. I’m grateful for your help, especially now. It’s when times are toughest that we have the greatest opportunity to shine!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_2_0: Thank you for purifying those Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%. I’m sure they are just as grateful as I am for your dedication.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_2_1: Rescuing these Pokémon was the main reason for my work on the Rocket Radar prototype.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_2_2: Luckily, with the help of the team leaders and motivated Trainers like you, we were able to develop a functioning Rocket Radar and even start work on the Super Rocket Radar!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_2_3: While a terrible situation, the Team GO Rocket invasion has been a thrilling adventure and research opportunity. I’m anxious but excited to send our findings over to my mentor, Professor Oak. I’ll be sure to let him know you said hello!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_2_4: Now, it’s time to get back to work. Let’s test your battle skills, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_3_0: I’m always so impressed when Trainers use supereffective moves in battle. It’s a sign of greatness when you see a Trainer using type effectiveness to their advantage.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_3_1: All our work lately seems to have gotten Team GO Rocket’s attention.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_3_2: Reports are coming in that Sierra, Cliff, and Arlo are currently lurking in the area. You know what to do, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_4_0: I knew you could do it, %PLAYERNAME%. The more you practice, the better you’ll be able to take on those pesky Team GO Rocket Leaders. I’m sure they’re already scheming up their next plan after this defeat.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_4_2: Using the Super Rocket Radar, track him down and defeat him. We must remain strong—Giovanni is relentless. I wonder why he continues his invasion...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_4_3: There are so many resources and Pokémon in our world. His evil plans must have something to do with that. My research will continue, but we need you to face him.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_4_4: Good luck, %PLAYERNAME%. We’re counting on you.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_5_1: I will definitely be adding your victory as a note to the research I send over to Professor Oak.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_5_2: I’m sure he will be interested in anything you’ve learned about Shadow Pokémon and the continuing Team GO Rocket invasion, so please keep up your research and send it my way.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_5_3: It may seem small, but every little bit helps!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq4_5_4: I’ll be in touch soon, since we know Team GO Rocket isn’t likely to go anywhere. I know you’ll be ready for whatever happens next!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%. You’ve been instrumental in keeping back Team GO Rocket’s forces.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_0_1: Thanks to your hard work, we’ve learned so much about this enemy.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_0_2: Team GO Rocket won’t be going away anytime soon, so I’m glad I can rely on you and your fellow Trainers.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_0_3: While you’ve done an amazing job so far, I’m looking for more opportunities for you to hone your skills. Every good Trainer needs to stay on their toes!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_0_4: The Super Rocket Radar is in good hands with you on the task, but I wouldn’t be a good Professor if I didn’t make sure you were keeping up with Giovanni.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_1_1: Even though we’ve been fighting off the threat of Team GO Rocket for some time, I’m still concerned about the fact that Shadow Pokémon keep appearing.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_1_2: It seems even more Pokémon are being turned into Shadow Pokémon despite our efforts. I’ve been tracking this situation, and the numbers have almost tripled since all this began.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_1_3: We need to keep pushing forward—those Pokémon need our help! Can I rely on you to purify more Shadow Pokémon?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_1_4: I’m sure you’ll see them shine with gratitude once you do!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_2_1: I’m getting more and more concerned about the growing number of Shadow Pokémon, so we need to keep fighting back against this threat.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_2_2: Your talent has made it clear that you’re ready for the next step in your preparations.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_2_3: Use your battle skills to take on some Grunts. I think with some further observation, I can figure out what you need to do to make sure you’re at your best!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_3_0: All right! You should feel proud of your progress, %PLAYERNAME%. You consistently impress me and the team leaders.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_3_1: Candela could learn a thing or two from your battle prowess. I’m sure the Team GO Rocket Leaders see you as a challenge.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_3_2: Take that challenge to them, and drive them out of wherever they’re holed up!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_4_0: %PLAYERNAME%, your preparations are complete—you’re ready to take on Giovanni.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_4_1: It’s time for you to use the Super Rocket Radar to track down the boss himself.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_4_2: You’ve proven not only your strength in battle but also your compassion through saving and purifying Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_4_3: Confront Giovanni with that strength and compassion, and I believe he won’t be able to stop you!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_5_0: Well done, %PLAYERNAME%. You’ve shown Team GO Rocket just how strong your training has made you.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_5_1: Although your battle with Giovanni wasn’t easy, the skills you’ve learned through practice and patience have paid off.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_5_2: But keep your wits about you, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_5_3: Giovanni doesn’t like to lose, so I’m sure he’ll be back soon to further his plans.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq5_5_4: I know I can count on you when he returns, but until then, I’ll work on finding some training opportunities for you so you can keep developing your skills.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_0_0: Great to see you again, %PLAYERNAME%. You’ve done such an amazing job with every challenge I’ve given you.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_0_1: Congrats on coming so far as a Trainer! You constantly impress me with your skills.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_0_2: But there are so many aspects to Pokémon training! I think it’s time to switch things up. I spoke with Spark, and he thought it would be good for you to focus some more on taking care of Pokémon Eggs.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_0_3: Why not take a walk with your buddy Pokémon after placing some Eggs into Incubators?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_0_4: And be sure to rescue Shadow Pokémon from any Team GO Rocket members you encounter, too. Those Pokémon still need our help!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_1_0: Wonderful work, %PLAYERNAME%. While you were busy, I met up with Blanche to discuss our research on recent developments with Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_1_1: I had observed that Team GO Rocket somehow seemed to be making Shadow Pokémon deal more damage with their attacks, though they also seem to take more damage in return now. My observations line up with Blanche’s research.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_1_2: Both of us are concerned that despite our best efforts to push Team GO Rocket back, they’re still gaining ground and putting more and more Pokémon in danger.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_1_3: While Blanche and I continue to investigate, can we depend on you to take down some more Grunts to slow Team GO Rocket down?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_1_4: I’m also going to assign you some tasks to test you as a Trainer. Battling Grunts alone won’t keep your skills as sharp as they need to be to continue standing up to Team GO Rocket’s leaders.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_2_0: Thanks for taking on those Grunts, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_2_1: I was working with Candela to figure out what challenges we could give you to help you prepare for battles with other Trainers and in the GO Battle League. Those skills carry over to doing battle with the Team GO Rocket Leaders, after all!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_2_2: Candela was very excited to find ways to keep you on your toes!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_2_3: Could you take on these challenges as part of your ongoing training?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_3_0: You’ve done the team leaders proud, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_3_1: You took on those challenges like the skilled Trainer you are.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_3_2: Great work. Now it’s time to continue the battle against Team GO Rocket.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_3_3: Your efforts to rescue and purify Shadow Pokémon have certainly not gone unnoticed.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_3_4: I’ll be sure to share any new findings about Team GO Rocket’s continued invasion as soon as they crop up, but right now, we should keep up the pressure on the Team GO Rocket Leaders. Good luck, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_4_0: Taking on the Team GO Rocket Leaders is no easy task. They have proven to be difficult opponents for even the most accomplished Trainers.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_4_1: One interesting thing to note is that I’ve heard reports of Trainers rescuing Shiny Shadow Pokémon from the Team GO Rocket Leaders.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_4_2: This only further supports my suspicions that Team GO Rocket is gathering large numbers of Pokémon if they’ve been able to find Shiny ones to turn into Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_4_3: There is definitely more that we need to learn about these foes and what their plans are.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_4_4: For now, I need you to focus. It’s time to take on Giovanni himself. You got this, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_5_1: Giovanni is one of the toughest opponents out there, but your continued efforts to improve let you rise to the challenge! After this, I’m going to talk with the team leaders to discuss how we can further support you.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_5_2: You’ve been an amazing part of the team, and we wouldn’t be able to keep these villains at bay without your skills and dedication.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_5_3: But we can’t drop our guard while Team GO Rocket’s around, so keep honing your battle techniques. I suggest challenging your fellow Trainers to battles and testing yourself in the GO Battle League.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq6_5_4: I’ll be in touch again soon, but until then, let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! It’s good to see you, though I’m sorry it has to be under such dire circumstances.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_0_1: What circumstances, you ask? Well, it appears as if Team GO Rocket is—you guessed it—stirring up more trouble!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_0_2: We’ve just received word that they’re doing something strange at PokéStops.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_0_3: What exactly they’re doing—and to what end—is what we need to figure out. Let’s get out there and see what we can find!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%. It looks like Grunts aren’t involved in whatever new experiments Team GO Rocket is performing.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_1: As you might recall, Grunts use Shadow Pokémon, which are Pokémon that have been trained in unnatural and harmful ways to become incredibly powerful.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_2: We’ve heard rumors that Arlo was the one who spearheaded the Shadow Pokémon program not long after he parted ways with Candela and Team Valor.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_3: More recently, Spark discovered that Team GO Rocket may be hatching a plot involving Pokémon Eggs! Is Arlo involved in this, too?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_1_4: Let’s investigate more PokéStops and purify some Shadow Pokémon while we’re at it. Something is bound to come up!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_0: Great job saving and purifying those Shadow Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_1: I noticed you caught a Larvitar. It’s highly unusual to see one in the wild. Maybe it came from one of the Pokémon Eggs that Team GO Rocket has been collecting...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_2: While you were out battling Grunts, the team leaders and I discovered that Team GO Rocket has been collecting a mysterious kind of Pokémon Egg we’re calling Strange Eggs.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_3: It appears that mostly Poison- or Dark-type Pokémon hatch from these Eggs. Let’s save and hatch as many Strange Eggs as possible before Team GO Rocket is able to grow their ranks!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_2_4: The Team GO Rocket Leaders seem to be guarding these Strange Eggs, so let’s start by finding them. Be sure you have space for Eggs and some Incubators at the ready!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_0: Great job defeating those leaders, %PLAYERNAME%! You’ve saved some pretty cute Pokémon in the process, if I do say so myself.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_1: While you were off fighting Team GO Rocket, Spark and I did some more sleuthing and discovered that Sierra might actually be the brains behind the Strange Eggs!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_2: It appears there’s more to a Team GO Rocket Leader’s duties than just taking over PokéStops and challenging Trainers to battle.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_3: First Arlo with Shadow Pokémon, and now Sierra with these Strange Eggs... I wonder what else Team GO Rocket’s got tucked up their sleeves.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_3_4: This doesn’t sit well with me, %PLAYERNAME%. Let’s track down those leaders again! We have to do all we can to disrupt their plans!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_0: Incredible work, %PLAYERNAME%! Hopefully that’ll keep them at bay for a little while.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_1: I managed to craft another Super Rocket Radar for you that’ll help you track down Giovanni. But be careful—according to a field report from Blanche and Candela, he’s got Shadow Mewtwo with him!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_1_alt: I managed to build another Super Rocket Radar to help you track down Giovanni. But be careful—Blanche and Candela’s reports revealed that Giovanni has got a Legendary Shadow Pokémon with him!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_2: You might have encountered Shadow Mewtwo the last time Giovanni appeared. We’d thought that was the last we’d see of it, but it looks like it’s back!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_2_alt: You need to save it, Trainer! I have no doubt Giovanni plans on using this poor Pokémon to nefarious ends.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_4_3: You need to save Shadow Mewtwo, Trainer! I have a feeling Giovanni plans on using this poor Pokémon for nefarious ends.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_5_0: Celebrations are in order, %PLAYERNAME%. You’ve done it again—you’ve defeated Team GO Rocket’s Grunts, its leaders, and even Giovanni!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_5_1: Not to mention all the Shadow Pokémon you saved along the way, including Shadow Mewtwo!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_5_1_alt: Not only did you stop Team GO Rocket, but you also saved several Pokémon along the way!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq7_5_2: This is probably not the last that we’ll see of Giovanni or Team GO Rocket, but that also means there’ll likely be more Strange Eggs to collect and Shadow Pokémon to save! Let’s get cracking, Trainer!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_0_0: Good to see you, %PLAYERNAME%. I’m sorry to call you here so suddenly, but I’m afraid there’s trouble afoot.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_0_1: That’s right—Team GO Rocket is up to no good! We’re not sure what their plan is just yet, but we know we have to stop them.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_1_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%. You did a tremendous job defeating those Team GO Rocket Grunts and saving those poor Shadow Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_1_1: While you were busy battling, I received reports that Team GO Rocket has obtained a Flying-type Legendary Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_1_2: Blanche is doing recon as we speak in hopes of figuring out exactly which Legendary Pokémon we’re dealing with. I have no doubt we’ll have more information soon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_1_3: While we wait, why don’t you conduct some research on Flying-type Pokémon?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_2_0: Thanks for catching all those Flying-type Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_2_1: Blanche and I have been analyzing them to help us learn more about the Legendary Pokémon that Team GO Rocket captured.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_2_2: Unfortunately, our current hypothesis points to this Pokémon being one that’s near and dear to the team leaders’ hearts.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_2_3: While we gather more information, could you head back out into the field? We can’t let Team GO Rocket continue its plan unopposed!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_3_0: Welcome back, Trainer. I see you’ve got yourself a Pidgeot and some Pidgeot Mega Energy!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_3_1: As impressive as this Pokémon is, though, it doesn’t seem to be the Flying-type Pokémon we've heard about in our reports.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_3_2: Blanche’s latest intel points to Giovanni being the one holding on to this mysterious Flying-type Legendary Pokémon, so we need to track him down.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_3_3: We believe our best bet at doing so is by first finding the Team GO Rocket Leaders—and that’s where you come in, Trainer. Let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_4_0: Great work, %PLAYERNAME%! You’ve been a huge help in our efforts to track down Giovanni. I’m happy to report that the team leaders and I have made significant headway in our investigation.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_4_1: I’ve managed to finish building another Super Rocket Radar for you. You can use it to find and defeat Giovanni—and save that Legendary Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq8_5_1: The fight against Team GO Rocket and their malicious machinations continues, but at least for today we can rest knowing that we’ve foiled their latest scheme.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%. Have you looked up at the sky lately? I thought I’d been staring at reports for too long, but no, there are rainbows everywhere!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_0_1: That’s not all—I’ve also heard rumors that a mysterious Pokémon has been sighted wherever these rainbows appear. They say rainbows bring good luck, so why not follow one to the end? Haha!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_0_2: In all seriousness, why don’t you go for a stroll and see for yourself? You never know what we might find!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_0_3: Keep your eye on the sky, and good luck!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_1_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%. I’m afraid I have some dire news... It sounds like Team GO Rocket’s gotten wind of these sightings and have set out to catch the mysterious Pokémon for themselves.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_1_1: Perhaps they're looking for a bit of good luck as well! Haha! Well, whatever their motive, we can’t have them creating more powerful Shadow Pokémon. It’s time to do some investigating.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_1_2: Knowing how large Team GO Rocket’s forces are, I fear they may have already found it, no doubt leaving Shadow Pokémon in their wake. Let’s go catch some Shadow Pokémon and see where they lead us!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_2_0: Great job rescuing all those Shadow Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%! I wish we had time to celebrate, but I just discovered that Team GO Rocket caught up to our mysterious Pokémon...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_2_1: ...and that it’s none other than Ho-Oh, the Rainbow Pokémon! But don’t be discouraged! I truly believe that with enough determination, we can save it, just as we have in the past.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_2_2: Let’s prep for the gauntlet of battles ahead and gather more information about Ho-Oh’s whereabouts by pursuing more Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_3_0: Great job saving even more Shadow Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%! Through your efforts, we’ve learned that Ho-Oh has been handed off to Giovanni and made into a Shadow Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_3_1: For now, I want you to find and defeat Arlo, Cliff, and Sierra! Doing so will help us build a Super Rocket Radar that’ll lead us right to Giovanni...and to Ho-Oh! Good luck!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_4_0: Incredible work, %PLAYERNAME%! With a Super Rocket Radar in hand, we’ll have no problem finding Giovanni. Defeating him in battle, however, is another story entirely...
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_4_1: Still! Seeing how you were able to beat his underlings, I’m certain you’ll come out on top—and save Ho-Oh to boot!
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_5_0: What a magnificent battle, %PLAYERNAME%! Congrats on defeating Giovanni and saving Ho-Oh from his clutches.
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_5_1: Team GO Rocket never rests, so we should continue to be vigilant. In the meantime, why not get to know your newly saved Ho-Oh?
quest_special_dialogue_rockethq9_5_2: With the right care and a little luck, any Shadow Pokémon can be purified! I wish you the best, %PLAYERNAME%, and I’ll see you next time!
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_0_0: %PLAYERNAME%! Glad you’re here. There’s something I could use your help with today.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_0_1: As you know, I’ve been away for a while.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_0_2: I’ve been thinking about how to shake off the doldrums. Then it hit me like a ton of bricks—Pokémon research! Specifically, I’d like to learn about Roggenrola.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_0_3: Roggenrola were first discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure, but the dirt that makes up their bodies is even older!
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_0_4: A Pokémon made of earth is just the thing to get me feeling grounded again, don’t you think? Not that I need an excuse to study Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_0_5: Could you unearth some Roggenrola for me, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_1_0: Great job, %PLAYERNAME%! Let’s get a closer look at those Roggenrola.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_1_1: Hm... Did you notice the hexagonal cavities on their bodies? Those are their ears, and deep inside is an energy core that makes Roggenrola slightly warm to the touch.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_1_2: But don’t stick your hand inside the cavity—that’s a surefire way to get on their bad side, and fast!
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_1_3: Is that from firsthand experience, you ask? W-well, any researcher worth his salt has to take the occasional risk.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_1_4: You know, when Roggenrola evolve into Boldore and their energy is too great to be contained, they grow orange crystals on their bodies hard enough to smash diamonds.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_1_5: Doesn’t that sound like a sight, %PLAYERNAME%? Why don’t you help Roggenrola evolve so you can see for yourself?
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_2_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! Your Boldore are looking great.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_2_1: Their crystals—amazing! If only I had some diamonds to put that whole “smashing” thing to the proof.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_2_2: Well, while we can’t conduct that particular experiment, I can still tell you more about Boldore.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_2_3: Their crystals are actually masses of energy. Just one crystal fragment could provide enough fuel for a hundred dump trucks!
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_2_4: *sigh* Yet another theory we can’t test ourselves. But if you help Boldore evolve, I’ll tell you all about what they do with that power, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_3_0: There you have it, %PLAYERNAME%—a Gigalith of your own. Those crystals are even bigger now!
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_3_1: When Gigalith’s orange crystals absorb solar energy, it’s magnified internally and fired from its mouth. It’s even capable of blowing away a mountain!
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_3_2: Because of its hefty horsepower, Gigalith is a popular partner for construction workers.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_3_3: I’m sure you and Gigalith will get along great too, seeing as you’re always out and about.
quest_special_dialogue_roggenrola_3_4: At any rate, thanks for helping me with my research today, %PLAYERNAME%. I’m feeling more like my old self already.
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_0_0: Aha! I hoped we’d have a run-in today, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_0_1: I was out hiking earlier when I saw a quick flash of something in the trees—something unusual.
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_0_2: I can’t say for certain, but it may have been the Mythical Pokémon Zarude! Or possibly just some falling leaves.
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_0_3: Either way, would you keep an eye—or even two—out for any unusual Grass-type Pokémon while you’re exploring?
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_1_0: %PLAYERNAME%, just the person I wanted to see!
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_1_1: I managed to spot our elusive friend again, and I can confirm that it’s definitely a Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_1_2: Unfortunately, it zipped away before I could get a closer look. Why don’t you canvas the area?
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_1_3: In the meantime, I’ll put my nose to my notes and see if I can’t confirm its identity.
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_2_0: Excellent, you’re back! I’ve got fantastic news, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_2_1: After digging into my archives, I can confirm that this mystery Pokémon is indeed none other than the Mythical Pokémon Zarude!
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_2_2: They tend to move in packs, but I can’t be certain how many we’re dealing with. It doesn’t matter, though. Either way, we must approach carefully!
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_2_3: I’m going to dive back into research and uncover whatever I can about Zarude’s behavior to help you prepare for this encounter.
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_3_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! I have some super interesting tidbits to share about our elusive friend, Zarude!
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_3_1: When the vines on its body are torn off, they enrich the soil, and cause plants to grow large and lush.
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_3_2: Interesting, right? And useful, too! Do be on the lookout for any unusually lush areas—that could indicate a Zarude is close by!
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_3_3: You take care of that and let me know what you find. I’ll take some more time to study up.
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_4_0: %PLAYERNAME%, thanks to your exemplary field work, we’ve managed to locate the exact location of our Zarude.
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_4_1: I don’t think I have to remind you to be careful—it’s incredibly aggressive, and other forest Pokémon fear it. But I’m sure a talented Trainer like you can earn its trust in no time.
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_4_2: Just treat it like any other Pokémon—approach with patience and an open heart. Then I’m sure you’ll have yourself a steadfast new companion!
quest_special_dialogue_rogue_jungle_4_3: Great work so far, and good luck with what’s to come!
quest_special_dialogue_roset_0_0: Ahhh... Do you smell that, Trainer?
quest_special_dialogue_roset_0_1: I first caught a whiff of that curious aroma as I was out on my daily morning walk.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_0_2: Upon investigation, I discovered that the scent was being produced by an uncommonly large group of Roselia that had assembled nearby.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_0_3: Did you know you can judge a Roselia’s health by the strength of its aroma? Well, let me tell you—those were VERY healthy Roselia!
quest_special_dialogue_roset_0_4: But while they certainly smell nice and look pretty, I advise you to take care when encountering them.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_0_5: The thorns on Roselia’s head contain a vicious poison, and it can launch them at any opponent bold enough to try to steal the flowers on its arms. Every rose, as they say!
quest_special_dialogue_roset_0_6: It’s unusual to see so many Roselia in one place. Would you mind assisting me in researching this phenomenon?
quest_special_dialogue_roset_1_1: While you were out in the field, I did some reading on Roselia.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_1_2: When it comes to Pokémon, new discoveries are being made all the time—so it’s important to make sure your information is up to date.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_1_3: Roselia, the Thorn Pokémon, evolves from Budew, the Bud Pokémon. Budew is sensitive to changes in temperature, and its bud is said to bloom when warmed by the sun.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_1_4: It’s also both Grass and Poison type, much like Roselia.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_1_5: In reviewing these two Pokémon, I remembered something tremendously exciting! I still need to conduct a bit more research before sharing my findings, however. Would you mind assisting me?
quest_special_dialogue_roset_2_0: As aromatic Pokémon go, we’re pretty fortunate it’s Roselia appearing en masse and not, say, Muk.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_2_1: A big group of Muk gathered under the sun... The whole place would smell like baked garbage!
quest_special_dialogue_roset_2_2: Oh! Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%. Didn’t realize you were back.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_2_3: I found that interesting bit of information I wanted to share with you.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_2_4: According to my research, Roselia that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_2_5: Isn’t that fascinating? Have you seen anything like that while you’ve been out doing research?
quest_special_dialogue_roset_2_6: You seem to have a lucky streak, so I wouldn’t put it past you!
quest_special_dialogue_roset_2_7: Now that you’re back, I’d like you to evolve a Roselia with the Sinnoh Stone I gave you.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_2_8: I’m excited to see the final Evolution in this line of Grass- and Poison-type Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_roset_3_0: Great work, Trainer! Your Roselia has evolved into the Bouquet Pokémon, Roserade!
quest_special_dialogue_roset_3_1: It moves like a dancer and strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_3_2: Oh, and have you noticed that each of Roserade’s hands is a different color?
quest_special_dialogue_roset_3_3: Each contains a different toxin. The poison in its right hand is quick acting, while the poison in its left hand is slow acting.
quest_special_dialogue_roset_3_5: Thanks for all your assistance today, Trainer. Documenting situations like this is essential to learning more about the Pokémon in the world around us.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_0_1: I wanted to warn you about the feathers you may have seen scattered around. If you’re considering picking one up—don’t. They’re surprisingly sharp. Trust me.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_0_2: I have a hypothesis about the identity of our feather flinger, but I’d love an extra set of eyes to confirm it. Could you poke around and let me know what you find?
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_1_0: Aha! I was right! These feathers belong to Rowlet, the Grass Quill Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_1_1: As a Grass type, Rowlet use photosynthesis to store up energy during the day.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_1_2: Rowlet are typically active at night—thus my initial hesitancy to pin this loose plumage on them.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_1_3: Though delightfully round and known to cuddle up in Trainers’ backpacks, this Pokémon shouldn’t be underestimated. Rowlet has mastered the art of deftly launching dagger-sharp feathers.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_1_4: Certainly not a Pokémon whose feathers you want to ruffle.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_1_5: Consider my interest piqued! How about we see what we can learn about its Evolution next?
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_2_0: Just look at that dashing Dartrix, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_2_1: Dartrix is known to be a bit of a dandy. It never slacks when it comes to cleaning its feathers.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_2_2: Thorough preening keeps it looking spiffy and its knife-like feathers—appropriately dubbed “blade quills”—nice and sharp.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_2_3: It throws these quills at its enemies, striking their weak points with remarkable precision.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_2_5: Let’s go ahead and give evolving Dartrix a shot.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_3_1: Decidueye is an expert archer. It can nock and fire an arrow quill in a tenth of a second and pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_3_2: Despite its cool demeanor, when caught by surprise, it’s seized by panic.
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_3_3: That happens to me from time to time!
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_3_4: A colleague recently told me that Decidueye’s appearance may be influenced by its environment. Isn’t that fascinating?
quest_special_dialogue_rowlet_3_5: Anyway, thanks for indulging my curiosity today, %PLAYERNAME%. It’s always such a delight to research on the fly with you. Until next time!
quest_special_dialogue_rue_0_0: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%! It’s great to see you.
quest_special_dialogue_rue_0_1: It’s been a while, hasn’t it? I’m sure your skills are as sharp as ever, but it couldn’t hurt to do a little warm-up anyway.
quest_special_dialogue_rue_0_2: Why don’t you start by seeing what Pokémon are in the area?
quest_special_dialogue_rue_0_3: I can’t wait to see what you find!
quest_special_dialogue_rue_1_0: %PLAYERNAME%! Back already, eh? Let’s take a look at the Pokémon you caught.
quest_special_dialogue_rue_1_1: Hmm... Well done! I knew you wouldn’t have any problem getting back into the swing of things.
quest_special_dialogue_rue_1_2: This is a great start—so let’s keep going! Why don’t you head out and see what other Pokémon you can discover?
quest_special_dialogue_rue_1_3: While you do, I’ll stay here and start researching the ones you caught already.
quest_special_dialogue_rue_2_1: Thanks to your recent efforts, I’ve got plenty of research topics to keep me occupied—for now, anyway.
quest_special_dialogue_rue_2_2: I’ll be sure to reach out whenever I need a hand.
quest_special_dialogue_rue_2_3: Until then, I hope you have a wonderful time exploring the world around you and meeting all sorts of incredible Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_0_0: Good morning, %PLAYERNAME%! There sure seems to be a surplus of Sandshrew around today, don’t you think?
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_0_1: I’m especially surprised to see both Sandshrew and Alolan Sandshrew appearing at once!
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_0_2: These two forms of Sandshrew usually prefer vastly different climates. Sandshrew usually make their homes in deserts and arid zones, where rain doesn’t fall.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_0_3: Alolan Sandshrew, on the other hand, are typically found in snowy mountains. What an uncommon sight for them to both be here together!
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_0_4: How about you spend some time with them and see what they’re up to, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_1_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! That’s an impressive number of Sandshrew you have in tow. I’d love to take a closer look at them—especially their shells.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_1_1: Did you know that there’s a traditional competition in Alolan festivals where Trainers slide Alolan Sandshrew across ice as far as possible?
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_1_2: How must the Sandshrew feel about that, I wonder!
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_1_3: The Sandshrew first found in the Kanto region are quite fascinating in their own right.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_1_4: When their skin gets wrinkled from moisture, they head for volcanoes and lie flat on a spot with a lot of geothermal heat to dry themselves out.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_1_5: It’s truly incredible how different geography and climates can influence Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_1_6: I’d love to get an even closer look at both of these forms of Sandshrew. What do you say, %PLAYERNAME%? Let’s get back out there!
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_2_0: You never disappoint, %PLAYERNAME%! Seeing all the Sandshrew together, don’t they look like a tough bunch?
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_2_1: Sandshrew evolve into Sandslash, another hardy Pokémon. Alolan Sandslash use their large, hooked claws to cut paths through deep snow as they run.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_2_2: On snowy mountains, these Sandslash are faster than any other Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_2_3: But Sandslash first found in Kanto are tough, too! They climb trees by hooking on with their sharp claws.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_2_4: They even share the Berries they gather by dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting on the ground. If only I could gather Berries so easily...
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_2_5: Try and evolve Sandshrew to Sandslash for yourself, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_3_0: Great work, %PLAYERNAME%. Your new Sandslash are an impressive sight—befitting an impressive Trainer such as yourself!
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_3_1: Up close, you can really appreciate the differences in the spikes of these Sandslash.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_3_2: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother their spikes feel.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_3_3: Meanwhile, Alolan Sandslash have beautiful icy spikes that glisten in the light of dawn.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_3_4: Thanks for helping me look into these Sandshrew today, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_3_5: I’ll keep studying Sandshrew and Sandslash in hopes of discovering more differences and similarities between them!
quest_special_dialogue_sandt_3_6: And I’ll be sure to get in touch the next time I need a helping hand. Something tells me it won’t be long!
quest_special_dialogue_searching_gold_ju: Great to see you, %PLAYERNAME%! We’ve got a golden day of research ahead of us. I can’t wait to get started!
Say, are you looking forward to finding one of these Pokémon? I’ve got a good feeling about them!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_0_0: %PLAYERNAME%, exciting news! In my recent research into other regions, I learned of Paldea—a vast, open place dotted with agricultural villages, port towns, and lively markets.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_0_1: And beyond those settlements, Paldea has all sorts of magnificent places begging to be explored, from towering mountains to resplendent lakes.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_0_2: Most importantly for us, there are plenty of Pokémon first discovered in Paldea for us to study!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_0_3: Doesn’t the very idea get your heart racing?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_0_4: If you’re up for it, I say we put our all-star teamwork to the proof by learning all there is to learn about them!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_1_0: Great choice! You know, Sprigatito’s a bit of a rascal. It’s capricious and attention-seeking, to the point that it may sulk if it sees you giving attention to another Pokémon!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_1_1: As for its physical characteristics, its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants, letting it create energy by absorbing sunlight.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_1_2: And when Sprigatito kneads and rubs with its forepaws, a sweet aroma is released that can mesmerize those around it.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_1_3: While you contemplate that, how about you walk around and look for some Grass-type Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_2_0: Welcome back! How did it go? Exploring with a new Pokémon is a great way to develop your bond. Now, here’s another fun Sprigatito fact.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_2_1: Sprigatito washes its face regularly to keep its fur from drying out. What a great self-care regimen!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_2_2: I wonder how Sprigatito’s Evolution, Floragato, behaves in comparison. Could you help your Sprigatito evolve so we can find out for ourselves?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_3_0: Wow! Amazing progress, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m sure there’s plenty you’ll learn with a Pokémon like Floragato at your side.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_3_1: Did you know that its fur can become softer or harder depending on its mood? It can even be needle sharp when Floragato is ready to battle.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_3_2: Speaking of battle, Floragato deftly wields a vine hidden beneath its long fur, slamming the hard flower bud against its opponents. I bet that smarts!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_3_3: I can’t wait to see how Floragato changes when it evolves into Meowscarada. Please come see me when it does!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_4_0: Whoa! Meowscarada is one a-meow-zing Pokémon! I’ve heard that with skillful misdirection, it rigs foes with pollen-packed flower bombs, which it sets off before its foes realize what’s going on.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_a_4_1: That’s quite the magic trick. I hope to see it firsthand someday—from a safe distance, of course! But that’s enough out of me—you deserve a rest after all that research. Thanks for your help, as always, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_1_0: Great choice! Fuecoco’s one cheerful little chomper. Flickering atop its head is fire energy that is leaking out from inside its body—and when Fuecoco gets excited, its head spouts more flames!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_1_1: How about you match that enthusiasm as you walk around and look for Fire-type Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_2_0: Welcome back! How did it go? Exploring with a new Pokémon is a great way to develop your bond. Now, here’s another fun Fuecoco fact.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_2_1: Fuecoco lies on warm rocks and uses the heat absorbed by its square-shaped scales to create fire energy.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_2_2: I wonder how Fuecoco’s Evolution, Crocalor, behaves in comparison. Could you help your Fuecoco evolve so we can find out for ourselves?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_3_0: Wow! Amazing progress, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m sure there’s plenty you’ll learn with a Pokémon like Crocalor at your side.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_3_1: Did you know that the combination of Crocalor’s fire energy and overflowing vitality is what caused an egg-shaped fireball to appear on the Pokémon’s head?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_3_2: What’s more, the valve in Crocalor’s flame sac is closely connected to its vocal cords. It utters a guttural cry as it spews flames every which way. Spicy!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_3_3: I can’t wait to see how Crocalor changes when it evolves into Skeledirge. Please come see me when it does!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_4_0: Whoa! Skeledirge is one sizzlingly slick Pokémon—and yet somehow so serene! I’ve heard that Skeledirge’s gentle singing soothes the souls of all that hear it.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_4_1: And yet it burns its enemies to a crisp with flames of over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It’s, uh, certainly comforting to know you’re on the same team!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_b_4_2: But that’s enough out of me—you deserve a rest after all that research. Thanks for your help, as always, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_branch_0: Which Pokémon first discovered in Paldea would you like to join you on your adventure, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_1_0: Great choice! Quaxly is an earnest and tidy Pokémon. Perhaps you’re the sort of Trainer who likes it when everything is neatly in place—and for Quaxly, that place is at your side!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_1_1: Quaxly’s feathers secrete a gel that repels water and grime, so its body is always glossy. And get a gander at that coif atop its head! So luxurious.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_1_2: I’m suddenly inspired to tidy things up around here. While I’m doing that, why don’t you walk around and look for Water-type Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_2_0: Welcome back! How did it go? Exploring with a new Pokémon is a great way to develop your bond. Now, here’s another fun Quaxly fact.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_2_1: This Pokémon migrated to Paldea from distant lands long ago. Its strong legs let it easily swim around in even fast-flowing rivers.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_2_2: I wonder how Quaxly’s Evolution, Quaxwell, behaves in comparison. Could you help your Quaxly evolve so we can find out for ourselves?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_3_0: Wow! Amazing progress, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m sure there’s plenty you’ll learn with a Pokémon like Quaxwell at your side.
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_3_1: Did you know that these Pokémon constantly run through shallow waters to train their legs, then compete with each other to see which of them kicks most gracefully?
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_3_2: The hardworking Quaxwell observes people and Pokémon from various regions and incorporates their movements into its own dance routines. So studious!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_3_3: I can’t wait to see how Quaxwell changes when it evolves into Quaquaval. Please come see me when it does!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_4_0: Whoa! Quaquaval is one mesmerizing Pokémon! This Pokémon uses its powerful legs to perform striking dances from far-off lands. And that’s not all those legs can do—I’ve heard that a single kick from a Quaquaval can send a truck rolling. Yikes!
quest_special_dialogue_season12_c_4_1: But that’s enough out of me—you deserve a rest after all that research. Thanks for your help, as always, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_season2_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! It’s good to see you.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_0_1: As you know, I’ve recently been conducting research on several different regions in the world of Pokémon. Along the way, I came across some books that collected stories and legends from various regions.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_0_2: One of these tomes told of three Legendary Pokémon from the Unova region—a trio that seem to be capable of changing formes.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_0_3: Needless to say, that piqued my interest, and I became so enveloped in my research that I even began seeing those three Legendary Pokémon in my dreams!
quest_special_dialogue_season2_0_4: Which brings me to why I called you here. Can you help me with some research, Trainer? I was thinking we could start by catching some Rock-type Pokémon—you know, just to give ourselves a sturdy foundation to build from.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_0_5: ...Get it? Sturdy? Because they’re...Rock-type? A-anyway, I’d appreciate the help. Let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_season2_1_0: Welcome back, Trainer. Now that we’ve established a foundation for our research, we need to narrow our focus.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_1_1: There are three stories I want to investigate, so I think the best approach is to focus on one story at a time and see what we can learn.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_1_2: My hope is to discover as much as we can about these Pokémon, so that when we see clues or signs of their appearance, we’re as prepared as possible!
quest_special_dialogue_season2_1_3: This first story tells of a Legendary Pokémon called Landorus. The story says that lands visited by Landorus yield such bountiful crops that it’s been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”
quest_special_dialogue_season2_1_4: Landorus seems to have two formes: Incarnate Forme, and the very rarely seen Therian Forme. I haven’t been able to find any imagery depicting the latter, but every source I’ve read agrees on its existence!
quest_special_dialogue_season2_1_5: For now, why don’t we research Ground-type Pokémon? Maybe in doing so we can better equip ourselves to identify Landorus’s Therian Forme when the time comes.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_2_0: Thank you, %PLAYERNAME%. I think we’ve gained a better understanding of Landorus after studying Ground-type Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_2_1: And is that a Drilbur you’ve got there? I dig it! ...Haha! Sorry, sorry.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_2_2: Anyway, since we’ve explored all our leads on Landorus for the moment, what do you say we move on to another Pokémon from my dream?
quest_special_dialogue_season2_2_3: Let’s focus on Tornadus next. The texts say Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms, and that its power is great enough to blow houses away.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_2_4: Like Landorus, Tornadus also has both Incarnate and Therian Formes. Hmm... Maybe researching Flying-type Pokémon in the area is our best bet for now? Let’s give it a shot, Trainer!
quest_special_dialogue_season2_3_0: Excellent work, Trainer! Thanks for documenting that information about Tornadus. It seems you even found yourself a darling Ducklett along the way! Is it all it’s quacked up to be? Haha!
quest_special_dialogue_season2_3_1: I think we’ve learned everything we can about Tornadus for now. Its Therian Forme is still a mystery, but hopefully not for long!
quest_special_dialogue_season2_3_2: Before we start investigating the final Legendary Pokémon from my dream, I need to share something...strange.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_3_3: You see, I’d been running myself a bit ragged with research, so I stopped for an afternoon nap. In the resulting dream, I saw those three Unovan Legendary Pokémon again, clear as crystal. But then, the whole dream just started...fading.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_3_4: It was almost like something was eating the dream itself. I’m still not sure what to make of it all, but let's stay on the lookout for anything suspicious. I have a hunch this may be the work of a Pokémon nearby.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_3_5: For now, though, let’s continue our research and turn our attention to the last of the three Unovan Legendary Pokémon detailed in those stories—Thundurus.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_3_6: Thundurus is known as the Bolt Strike Pokémon, and its story also references both Incarnate and Therian Formes. The spikes on its tail are said to discharge immense bolts of lightning.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_3_7: For the sake of consistency, let’s go ahead and research Electric-type Pokémon in the area as we compile our notes on Thundurus.
quest_special_dialogue_season2_4_0: Ah, there you are, %PLAYERNAME%. I have something big to share!
quest_special_dialogue_season2_4_1: But first, I want to thank you for all your hard work collecting information on Landorus, Tornadus, and Thundurus.
