quest_special_dialogue_tepit_2_1: Just when I thought Pokémon couldn’t inspire me any more than they already do, here I am taking cooking tips from Tepig. Haha!
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_2_2: Nice Pignite, by the way! Very round. Did you know that Pignite can evolve? Its Evolution is a Pokémon called Emboar.
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_2_3: Emboar is known to heat up its punches by setting its fists ablaze with its fiery chin. It’s also known to care deeply about its friends.
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_2_4: Speaking of friends, I should let the team leaders know that I’ll be on my way soon.
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_2_5: How about evolving your Pignite into Emboar, Trainer? I’d love to see its fiery beard firsthand.
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_3_0: Fantastic work, %PLAYERNAME%! Your Emboar is truly a sight to see!
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_3_1: This powerful Fire- and Fighting-type Pokémon is known as the Mega Fire Pig Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_3_2: According to my research, Emboar is a master of fast and powerful Fighting-type attacks.
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_3_3: And wow... Look at that beard of fire. What do you think, Trainer? Could you see me with one of those?
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_3_4: Haha, only joking! I’m sure I’d find it far too itchy.
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_3_5: Anyway, I should let you get back to exploring. And I should get to that picnic!
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_3_6: Have a wonderful weekend, and keep up all the hard work. It’s always a joy to see how much you’ve grown as a Trainer each time we meet.
quest_special_dialogue_tepit_3_7: I’ll be in touch soon with some more research opportunities. Or who knows—maybe even some recipes!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_0_0: Rrrgh... Eight, nine, ten... Phew! Oh, hey there, %PLAYERNAME%. You caught me right at the end of my workout!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_0_1: Being a Pokémon Professor’s not just about using your noodle—I’d argue it requires a strong body as well!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_0_2: I’m feeling even more inspired than usual to stay fit thanks to the recent inflex—er, inFLUX of burly-looking Timburr.
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_0_3: Despite their smallish stature, these Pokémon can lift and carry some serious lumber. They love helping out with construction projects.
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_0_4: Why don’t you go catch a few Timburr so we can see their strength in action?
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_1_1: Check out how easily they carry those squared logs! Did you know Timburr carry bigger and bigger logs as they grow?
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_1_2: In fact, they love helping with construction so much that when rain causes work to stop, Timburr’s mood gets a bit...stormy.
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_1_3: It’ll swing its log around and throw a tantrum!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_1_4: Say, a few of your Timburr look like they’re carrying some pretty big logs. I think they might be ready to evolve!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_1_5: Why don’t you help them out and show me when you’re done, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_2_0: Wow! Get a load of those Gurdurr!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_2_1: Gurdurr take great pride in their awe-inspiring muscles, and like to show them off to Machoke and other Gurdurr.
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_2_2: It’s so strong that even a group of wrestlers can’t make it budge an inch! Now that’s a fitness goal I’d like to hit one day.
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_2_3: One thing to note is that unlike Timburr, Gurdurr’s strength is best applied to demolition rather than construction. They skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_2_4: Gurdurr evolves into quite the fascinating Pokémon as well. Why don’t you help one evolve so we can observe it more closely?
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_3_0: Great job evolving your Gurdurr into Conkeldurr, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_3_1: Rather than relying on sheer force, Conkeldurr takes a more sophisticated approach to battle. Did you notice those concrete pillars it uses as walking canes?
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_3_2: Conkeldurr spins those around and uses centrifugal force to defeat its opponents.
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_3_3: Conkeldurr’s mastery of concrete is well documented. Some of my colleagues believe that Conkeldurr actually taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_3_4: Somehow, the concrete that Conkeldurr mixes is more durable than what humans can create.
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_3_5: There’s so much more to this Pokémon than meets the eye—truly an inspiration to those of us who aim to sharpen both our minds and bodies!
quest_special_dialogue_timburr_3_6: And with our research finished for the day, I’d say it’s time for my cooldown lap. Thanks for spending the day with me, %PLAYERNAME%. I’ll see you again soon!
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_0_0: There you are! I had a feeling I’d see you today, %PLAYERNAME%.
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_0_1: Look at all the Togetic fluttering around. I’ve never seen so many at once!
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_0_2: Togetic is said to be a Pokémon that brings good fortune, and what better fortune could I have than running into you?
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_0_3: Let’s see what other good things lie in store for us as we continue observing these Togetic.
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_1_0: Your Togetic is positively glowing, %PLAYERNAME%! Could that glow be from Togetic’s distinctive joy dust?
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_1_1: You see, research says that Togetic appear in front of kindly people to scatter a glowing down called “joy dust,” showering them with happiness.
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_1_2: What practical applications could there be for joy dust? Will Pokémon and humans feel joy upon seeing it?
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_1_3: We researchers have yet to answer these questions. Just thinking of the possibilities is filling me with happiness!
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_1_4: But first things first. A kindhearted Trainer—or Professor—doesn’t forget to take care of Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_1_5: Let’s share some happiness with Togetic by feeding them some Berries, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_2_0: Nice work, %PLAYERNAME%. Those Togetic look positively jubilant.
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_2_1: Speaking of being jubilant, let me tell you about Togetic’s Evolution, Togekiss! It’s also known as the Jubilee Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_2_2: Togekiss share their many blessings with people who respect one another’s rights and avoid needless strife. It sounds like quite the wonderful Pokémon to have around.
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_2_3: I bet you’d have no trouble evolving Togetic into a Togekiss of your own. Why not give it a try?
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_3_0: Amazing, %PLAYERNAME%! You’ve evolved Togetic into your very own Togekiss!
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_3_1: These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near conflict or turmoil. It’s been depicted on good-luck charms since ancient times.
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_3_2: Speaking of bygone times, a researcher from long ago wrote, “After studying what literature remains, I am certain Togekiss will reveal itself when peace reigns over the land.”
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_3_3: I know I’m filled with peace and happiness whenever you reveal yourself to help with my research.
quest_special_dialogue_togetic_3_4: Thanks for spending another day with me, %PLAYERNAME%. Until next time, let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_0_0: Perfect timing, %PLAYERNAME%! I’ve got an electrifying adventure lined up for you today.
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_0_1: I’ve been monitoring some nearby waters and have picked up intriguing electrical signals.
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_0_2: If my hunch is correct, we’ve got a school of the Electric-type Pokémon Tynamo on our hands! Well, maybe not literally on our hands—they’re pretty zappy—but you know what I mean.
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_0_3: See if you can spot any Tynamo out there. Even better if you can bring one back for us to study up close!
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_1_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%. I see I was right to charge you with researching Tynamo today!
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_1_1: I just learned that one Tynamo alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_1_2: And things get even more shocking once Tynamo evolves!
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_1_3: Why don’t you try evolving your Tynamo into Eelektrik so we can study it together?
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_2_0: Incredible work, %PLAYERNAME%. Your Eelektrik has me en-wrap-tured! Get it? Because they coil around their prey!
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_2_1: Anyway... If you look closely, you can see these circular patterns along Eelektrik’s body are actually electricity-generating organs.
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_2_2: That’s why I always pack a pair of rubber gloves. You never know when you’ll be handling Electric-type Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_2_3: Now, I think you’re ready to take this research up a notch and evolve your Eelektrik into Eelektross!
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_3_0: Wow! What an achievement, %PLAYERNAME%. Your Eelektross has me totally amped!
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_3_1: Did you know that Eelektross’ fangs have electricity running through them? It makes me glad I didn’t become a Pokémon dentist! Haha.
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_3_2: The fact that you’ve befriended such a phenomenal Electric-type Pokémon is grounds for celebration, I say!
quest_special_dialogue_tynamo_3_3: Keep up the fantastic work out there. I’m sure I’ll see you again soon. Until then, let’s GO!
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_0_1: Your timing is excellent. I’ve hit a bit of a roadblock in my research!
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_0_2: You see, I’m still puzzling over the guardian deities both Spark and Blanche have seen recently. I’ve yet to suss out why they’ve been appearing.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_0_3: I can only hope they’re not angry with us—or worse!
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_0_4: I think I’ll take a break in the shade to clear my mind. It’s important to give your brain a breather now and then!
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_0_5: Why don’t you head out to find some shade for yourself, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_1_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! I see you’ve found some leafy Pokémon to rest under.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_1_1: Are you feeling refreshed? I know I am!
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_1_2: While you were out, I thought of a new angle for our investigation.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_1_3: As you may know, Alola is home to four guardian deities. We’ve seen two, so it stands to reason the other two may be buzzing about already.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_1_4: Instead of waiting for them to come to us, I think we should get out and search for them ourselves.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_1_5: Let’s start with Tapu Bulu, guardian deity of Ula’Ula Island.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_1_6: Ula’Ula Island is a rugged locale, home to Mount Lanakila, the highest peak in Alola.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_1_7: Tapu Bulu is said to make ringing sounds with its tail to let others know where it is and avoid unneeded conflicts. Knowing that, it shouldn’t be too hard to find!
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_1_8: In addition, I know Tapu Bulu can help plants grow, so perhaps we’ll have some luck if we begin by looking for Pokémon that are known to grow. Let’s get out there, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_2_0: Ah, %PLAYERNAME%—you’re back. How did your search go?
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_2_1: I asked Candela to lend us a hand shortly after you left.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_2_2: And just a few minutes later, before I’d even finished packing my gear, she came running back saying she’d heard a ringing in the air and looked up to see Tapu Bulu floating by!
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_2_3: Yet another guardian deity I’ve missed by a hair... Such is the fickle nature of Pokémon research, I suppose.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_2_4: I’m glad you’ve at least been more successful, %PLAYERNAME%. Now that we know it’s out there, let’s double down on our search for Tapu Bulu!
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_2_5: I’ll speak with Candela to see if she might know any more details that could help us.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_3_1: What was it like? Tell me everything! Did you hear a ringing noise? Did you see it making vegetation grow, or maybe even swinging large trees around by their roots?
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_3_2: Those are all things Tapu Bulu is known for, you know.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_3_3: As you might’ve expected, I was—yet again—unable to witness Tapu Bulu myself. I did, however, think up a new theory.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_3_4: The guardian deities seem to be keeping a relatively low profile. Perhaps they’re just here to investigate something—or even help us somehow.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_3_5: Things may become clearer if we see Tapu Fini, the last of Alola’s guardian deities.
quest_special_dialogue_ulaula_3_6: For now, though, I think we’ve earned some rest. See you next time, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_valentines_feb23_: What a lovely day! But it looks like there’s pollen in the ah...ah...ah-choo!
Shame it’s garden-variety pollen and not healing pollen from the Flabébé I’ve seen around.
I wish I were as carefree as the Flabébé seem to be! With their untroubled hearts, I wonder what Flabébé wish for...
Sorry, I got lost in my daydreams! What about you, %PLAYERNAME%? What’s your research wish today?
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_0_2: I’m *yawn* running on very little sleep. Candela gave me some of the coffee beans she’s been raving about, so I did the neighborly thing and gave ’em a whirl.
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_0_3: The coffee was delicious, but WAY stronger than I’m used to. It kept me wide awake into the wee hours of the night.
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_0_4: Getting a good amount of sleep is essential if you want to keep your brain sharp. Speaking personally, exhaustion tends to steer me toward more...outlandish theories.
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_0_5: Hm? You want to hear one? Well...all right. But let’s keep it between us, OK?
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_0_6: Somewhere on my desk there’s an early draft of a paper called “The Aerodynamics of Various Hats as Worn by Pikachu.” It’s very well researched, I assure you!
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_0_7: But that’s enough about me. Do you have any theories of your own you’d like to explore?
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_0_8: Why don’t you sleep on it and get back to me?
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_1_1: Candela’s extra-strength coffee is finally out of my system, so I’m back to snoozing like a Snorlax—and thinking up more promising ideas for papers.
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_1_2: “The Effects of Elevation on Snorlax Snoring Patterns” is going to be a hit, I just know it!
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_1_3: How about you, %PLAYERNAME%? Feeling refreshed, I hope?
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_1_4: I’m sure whatever you’ve thought up over the last few days is more than worthy of research!
quest_special_dialogue_waina_temp_1_5: Now get out there and seize the day—and remember to get a good night’s sleep!
quest_special_dialogue_winter_wishes_1_0: Brrr... Ah! %PLAYERNAME%! Did you notice the snow we’ve been getting? It’s beautiful—and freezing! I feel colder than a Bergmite!
quest_special_dialogue_winter_wishes_1_1: Winter is a time for wishing, and while a Bergmite might wish for the weather to stay like this forever, I’m wishing for an extra layer!
quest_special_dialogue_winter_wishes_1_2: What about you, %PLAYERNAME%? What’s your winter research wish?
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I’ve discovered some tracks nearby that could only belong to one Pokémon—Wooper!
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_0_1: While Wooper are generally aquatic, they do brave the shore when searching for food.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_0_2: It’s also possible that the tracks I found belong to Paldean Wooper, who live on land!
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_0_3: No matter which of the two has been squelching around the area, this presents an exciting opportunity to observe these charming Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_0_4: What do you say? Shall we try “tracking” them down?
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_0_5: Then let’s get our galoshes on and GO!
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_1_0: Goodness, %PLAYERNAME%—I’d hoped to find either Wooper or Paldean Wooper, but both? What an unexpected delight!
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_1_1: I’m thrilled to get this opportunity to research the two’s similarities and differences.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_1_2: Though a word of caution before you get too friendly—Wooper covers itself with a gooey, toxic film while walking on land to keep its skin from dehydrating.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_1_3: The same goes for Paldean Wooper.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_1_4: That’s why we’ll need to be careful with our hands-on—or in this case, hands-off—research.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_1_5: I think our next steps should be to finish up our initial observations and help some Wooper evolve.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_2_1: As you’ve just discovered, Wooper evolves into Quagsire, whereas Paldean Wooper evolves into Clodsire.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_2_2: Quagsire are known to be easygoing—so much that they couldn’t care less when they bump their heads on boulders and boats while swimming!
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_2_3: Your Quagsire looks particularly carefree. It must know it’s in the best possible hands with you as its Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_2_4: Did you know that when it’s time for Quagsire to eat, it lies at a river’s bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth?
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_2_5: Thankfully, it doesn’t get hungry often, since it doesn’t move much! Haha!
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_2_6: Now, we’ve learned plenty about Quagsire, so let’s turn our attention to Paldean Wooper’s Evolution, Clodsire. Think you can bring one to me, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_3_0: Welcome back! Let’s take a closer look at Clodsire.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_3_1: Clodsire are known to carry Wooper on their backs, ferrying them across water from one shore to the other.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_3_2: But if Clodsire is provoked, it sticks thick spines out from its body. Let’s...take care not to startle them.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_3_3: Phew! What an exciting day. My coat is caked with mud, but it was worth it to get some up-close research time with these intriguing Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_wooper_3_4: Thanks for all your help braving the muddy unknown, %PLAYERNAME%. Until next time!
quest_special_dialogue_wp_0_1: I need help with—you guessed it—research! But this isn’t work that you can do alone.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_0_2: Try joining a party so you can go on an adventure with other Trainers.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_0_3: You might even make a new friend along the way!
quest_special_dialogue_wp_1_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! I hope you enjoyed spending time with other Trainers.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_1_1: Now, let’s take a look at the Pokémon you caught.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_1_2: Excellent! You’ve accomplished great things while working together.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_1_3: In fact, I’ll bet teamwork is the key to advancing our research!
quest_special_dialogue_wp_1_4: Why don’t you join other Trainers on another adventure? I can’t wait to see what Pokémon you’ll find together.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_2_1: Let’s take a peek at the Pokémon you found with your party.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_2_2: Wow, look at that! Another win for teamwork, I’d say.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_2_3: So many things become possible when you work together towards a common goal!
quest_special_dialogue_wp_2_4: I know you and the other Trainers can make even greater discoveries if you join forces again.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_3_0: %PLAYERNAME%! It’s good to see you back.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_3_1: And what a stupendous number of Pokémon you’ve caught!
quest_special_dialogue_wp_3_2: Thanks to you and your party’s hard work, I have plenty to keep me occupied.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_3_3: Thank you, %PLAYERNAME%. I’m confident you have many exciting discoveries ahead, both with the Pokémon you’ll find and the people you’ll meet.
quest_special_dialogue_wp_3_4: After all, exploring the world together is one of life’s greatest adventures.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_0_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I stepped out of my mobile lab this morning only to see needlelike horns poking out of the grass all around me.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_0_1: Luckily, I also saw big red noses poking out of the grass and realized they belonged to Weedle, the Hairy Bug Pokémon. I guess you could say we’re in a...hairy situation!
quest_special_dialogue_wt_0_3: Weedle’s horn measures about two inches. It’s a sharp stinger that can inject poison!
quest_special_dialogue_wt_0_4: Let’s investigate Weedle further—but watch your step! There are Weedle everywhere, and you wouldn’t want to get poked by one.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_1_0: Nice footwork, Trainer. I read a fascinating tidbit while you were conducting your research—Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_1_1: It finds its favorite kinds of leaves by sniffing them out with its big, red, and—in my opinion—honkable nose.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_1_2: I can think of a number of times this useful skill would come in handy, like when the team leaders start sharing snacks around the lab and don’t think to offer me any.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_1_3: Anyway, I think that we should look further into Weedle’s Evolution. I can’t wait to see what other fascinating details we learn.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_2_0: Well done with that evolving, %PLAYERNAME%. However, it looks like the evolved form of Weedle, Kakuna, is just...sitting there. I knew this Cocoon Pokémon didn’t move much, but wow.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_2_1: Seeing it in person has made me realize that...it really does just sit there. But while it seems like it’s doing nothing, it’s actually extremely busy preparing for its upcoming Evolution.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_2_2: And that’s evident by how hot to the touch the shell becomes! Isn’t that exciting? Thanks to our research, we’ve learned so much about what’s happening to Kakuna!
quest_special_dialogue_wt_2_3: Let’s keep going! I think that Kakuna of yours is almost ready to show you what it’s been working on.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_3_0: Thanks to its hard work, Kakuna has evolved into Beedrill! It now has three poisonous stingers and wings that allow it to fly quickly. Talk about a glow-up!
quest_special_dialogue_wt_3_1: Beedrill, the Poison Bee Pokémon, is known for being extremely territorial. It sometimes attacks in swarms, and Beedrill nests are very dangerous!
quest_special_dialogue_wt_3_2: This powerful Bug- and Poison-type Pokémon may surprise you in Trainer Battles, too.
quest_special_dialogue_wt_3_3: Thanks for your help today, %PLAYERNAME%. I’ll be in touch once I figure out how to maneuver my mobile lab out of this area. I wouldn’t want a Weedle poking a hole in one of the mobile lab’s tires!
quest_special_dialogue_yokosuka_0_0: %PLAYERNAME%! Thank goodness you made it to this important research site.
quest_special_dialogue_yokosuka_0_1: I came to study Pokémon that commonly appear in this area, but it seems I need your help! The species of Pokémon I’ve observed today don’t normally appear around here. What a strange occurrence!
quest_special_dialogue_yokosuka_0_2: Would you be willing to travel throughout the park and perform some tasks for me? With all these wild Pokémon around, it almost feels like a safari!
quest_special_dialogue_yokosuka_1_0: Wow, great work today! In addition to completing some insightful research, you’ve skillfully helped me document the amazing nature around us and the fascinating migration patterns that Pokémon follow. I have a feeling there’s even more to discover out here!
quest_special_dialogue_yokosuka_1_1: The results of your work have produced an awesome amount of Stardust. Perhaps you could find good use for it in powering up or trading a Pokémon! Enjoy, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_0_0: What peculiar coloring. Is it an aberration, or—?
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_0_1: Ah. You have arrived at an opportune moment, Pokémon Trainer. Might I seek your insight?
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_0_2: Zigzagoon are present in vast numbers today, but they are notably different from those I have observed previously.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_0_3: Zigzagoon’s fur is normally earthy in hue, but these Zigzagoon are black and white.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_0_5: I see... These Zigzagoon were first discovered in the Galar region.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_0_6: So a single Pokémon species can develop differently based on its habitat? Fascinating.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_0_7: I will spend today observing these Galarian Zigzagoon. Will you assist me, Pokémon Trainer?
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_1_0: How energetic these Galarian Zigzagoon are. Have you also observed how they dash in a zigzag pattern?
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_1_1: I hypothesized that this may increase its evasiveness—but when I tested it myself, I grew quite dizzy.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_1_2: Fret not, Pokémon Trainer—no people or Pokémon were harmed during my experiment.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_1_3: I am left wondering whether evolution would ease or encourage Galarian Zigzagoon’s frenetic movements. Perhaps we can discover that answer together.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_2_0: Thank you for your assistance, Pokémon Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_2_1: I have concluded that Galarian Linoone’s disposition is no calmer than Galarian Zigzagoon’s. Indeed, its aggression appears to have increased.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_2_2: Not long before your arrival, I observed a group of Galarian Linoone using their long tongues to taunt other Pokémon.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_2_3: They then hurled themselves at their enraged foes.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_2_4: I am continuously enthralled by the ways Pokémon interact with each other.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_2_5: Might Galarian Linoone itself be capable of evolution? More research is required.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_3_0: Greetings, Pokémon Trainer. You have brought me...Obstagoon, is it?
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_3_1: Unlike Galarian Linoone, Obstagoon stands on two legs. I surmise this is to establish a threatening posture.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_3_2: What’s more, I witnessed firsthand its ability to make staggering vocal outbursts.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_3_3: My heart has yet to return to its normal rhythm.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_3_4: I find it remarkable that the assertive Obstagoon was once a diminutive Galarian Zigzagoon.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_3_5: How must it feel to experience such profound transformation? I assume your Professor Willow would have some insight.
quest_special_dialogue_zigzagoon_3_6: This has been a valuable learning experience. Thank you for your assistance today, Pokémon Trainer.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_0_0: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%! What’ve you been up to? Catching Pokémon? Exploring a new Route, perhaps?
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_0_1: As for me, I’ve been absorbed in reading a research article about the Order Pokémon, Zygarde.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_0_2: The writer hypothesizes that Zygarde monitors the ecosystem from deep within the cave where it lives. And when the ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_0_3: I wonder if it ventures outside for other reasons. Here’s an idea for a paper: “Zygarde Habitats and Migration Patterns”!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_0_4: What do you think? I wonder what other activities and locales might interest Zygarde...
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_0_5: Try to come up with a few theories while you’re out exploring!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_1_1: While you were out, I caught up on observational reports from local Trainers.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_1_2: Curiously, several mentioned amorphous, green blobs they found along Routes. Some Trainers even thought they might be alive!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_1_3: I have a theory about what those wobbly blobs might be, but I’d like to review my research materials first. Maybe even reread that article from earlier...
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_1_4: In the meantime, please continue your fieldwork. I’m positive I’ll have a less amorphous update by the time you get back.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_1_5: Oh, and I suggest you power up your Pokémon, just in case you run into anything unexpected out there!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_2_0: There you are, %PLAYERNAME%! You’ll never guess what happened!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_2_1: As I combed through my notes, I saw something blur past me and come to a screeching halt outside the lab.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_2_2: It moved fast, but I’m almost positive it was the very Pokémon I’ve been investigating: Zygarde!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_2_3: It might still be there. Check it out, and here—take this. I’ll explain how to use it once you’re back.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_3_2: Zygarde is a curious Pokémon. It’s made of Zygarde Cells, and its appearance depends on the number of cells it has gathered.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_3_3: I’d say this one has about 10% of its cells. It’ll change and grow as it collects more.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_3_4: And that’s what my gift is for! The Zygarde Cube can be used to store the Zygarde Cells that you find. You can think of it as a nest for those cells.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_3_5: And as for where can you find those cells... Do you recall those green blobs that have been found along Routes? I reckon they were, in fact, Zygarde Cells!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_3_6: Could I ask you to test that hypothesis, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_4_0: Excellent work finding your first Zygarde Cell, %PLAYERNAME%!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_4_1: You’re off to a great start to assembling Zygarde’s forms, but there’s a long journey ahead of you.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_4_2: It looks like this Zygarde needs to collect 250 cells to reach its Complete Forme. It seems the cells are only gathering along Routes, so you’ve got a lot of traveling in your future!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_4_3: I can’t wait for you to get started—just think of all the Pokémon and friends you’ll meet on the way!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_4_4: Explore a few more Routes, and I suggest you use an Incense while you’re out there. We’ve got to keep up with our studies of other Pokémon as well!
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_5_1: You traveled five entire Routes?! Well done! That adventurous spirit is what makes you such a joy to work with.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_5_2: I’m sure Zygarde appreciates your perseverance too. And your efforts will be well-rewarded! In its Complete Forme, Zygarde has enough power to overwhelm even Xerneas or Yveltal.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_5_3: Zygarde can radiate high-powered energy from the orifice on its chest. It uses force to neutralize those who harm the ecosystem.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_5_4: That’s some good motivation for us to each do our part, eh? Even little things, like recycling when we can. But I don’t think we should need a threat to want to care for our surroundings.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_5_5: After all, Pokémon and even Trainers like yourself do their best in a healthy environment—we should all work hard to make the world a place where everyone can thrive.
quest_special_dialogue_zygarde_5_6: I’ll leave you with that thought, %PLAYERNAME%. Smooth travels on your journey to gather Zygarde Cells, and let me be the first to know when you’ve collected enough to see its Complete Forme. I’ll be waiting on the edge of my seat!

quest_summer_return_0_1: There’s a lot to do this summer! New things to experience—new Pokémon to find!
quest_summer_return_0_2: Let’s start with a few simple tasks to help you get your bearings.
quest_summer_return_1_0: Wow, is that a Dratini you’ve found? That’s quite a rare Pokémon!
quest_summer_return_1_1: I can tell this Dratini has the potential to become a close friend of yours! Why don’t you two take some time to get to know each other?
quest_summer_return_2_0: Impressive! Dragonair is a powerful Pokémon in its own right. Let’s get Dragonair ready to battle!
quest_summer_return_2_1: You can try taking on other Trainers or working together to take down huge Raid Bosses!
quest_summer_return_3_0: Nice work! You and your Pokémon make a great team!
quest_summer_return_3_1: There are many new kinds of Pokémon that have started appearing recently in the world.
quest_summer_return_3_2: You should take a look and see if you can find anything new.
quest_summer_return_4_0: Amazing! You found some rare Pokémon that were first discovered in the Sinnoh region already? And is that...a Shiny Pokémon?
quest_summer_return_4_1: Amazing! I’ve never seen an Eevee like that before! Shiny Pokémon have a rare and distinct coloration that sets them apart from others of their species!
quest_summer_return_4_2: Let’s commemorate this moment! Why don’t you take a snapshot and celebrate with friends?
quest_summer_return_5_0: Wow, a wild Lapras sought you out?
quest_summer_return_5_1: Looks like you’re going to do great this summer!
quest_summer_return_5_2: They say Trainers and Pokémon are most powerful when they band together.
quest_summer_return_5_3: Good luck! It’s time to GO!

quest_timed_dialogue_cornet_0_0: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%! I see you, too, have been caught up in the detective craze. Those Pikachu are quite cute in their hats, eh?
quest_timed_dialogue_cornet_0_1: In the spirit of detective work, I’ve devised a little deduction game for you. I call it—Pokémon of Interest!
quest_timed_dialogue_cornet_0_2: I’m going to give you a couple clues, and you’ll have to deduce which Pokémon I’m talking about. Here we go!
quest_timed_dialogue_cornet_0_3: This Pokémon is known for its green accents, but it’s a type of Pokémon that hasn’t been appearing around here recently.
quest_timed_dialogue_cornet_0_4: It also peddles in deception. You might say it’s not what it seems!
quest_timed_dialogue_cornet_0_5: What do you think, %PLAYERNAME%? Any ideas? If your deduction is correct, you may just earn some personal congratulations from one of the local Pokémon!

quest_title_rockethq4_2: A Professor’s Work Is Never Done (3/6)

quest_title_rockethq4_5: A Professor’s Work Is Never Done (6/6)
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_10_d: Ah, %PLAYERNAME%—I’ve got news. The leaders of Team GO Rocket—Arlo, Cliff, and Sierra—have been spotted in the area.
We still don’t know what their plans are for the Dynamax phenomenon, but whatever they are, those three will be carrying them out!
Follow the leaders and find out what they’re up to—and stop them, if necessary!
I’ll be mapping out our next move—I think I’ll have something by the time you’ve dealt with the leaders. Good luck!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_11_d: It looks like my suspicions were correct—this goes all the way to the top: Giovanni.
We’ve got to put a stop to his schemes, and I know you’re the perfect Trainer to do just that.
Go and show him what you’re made of!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_12_d: Excellent work! Couldn’t have done better myself!
I’m too familiar with Team GO Rocket to believe we’ve heard the last of Giovanni, but you’ve definitely thrown a wrench into their plans.
I want to check in on nearby Dynamax Pokémon, so please take care of any Team GO Rocket Grunts still hanging around.
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_13_d: Great job, %PLAYERNAME%! The Dynamax Pokémon are safe now, thanks to your courage and skill.
We’ll need to keep a close eye on Team GO Rocket as we keep up our research on the Dynamax phenomenon, though.
Call it a professor’s intuition, but I’ve got a feeling a gigantic discovery is just around the corner.
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_14_d: %PLAYERNAME%, I have MASSIVE news to share!
We’ve come across even more enormous Pokémon—and what’s more, they appear to have changed appearance altogether!
There are still a bunch of questions to be answered, but thankfully I have an expert team—you!
I’m going to dive into some research, and while I do, I’ll need you to investigate in the field. With your help, we’ll get to the bottom of this supersized mystery!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_15_d: I hope you’re ready for big updates, %PLAYERNAME%! Based on my research, I believe we might be witnessing what’s called the “Gigantamax” phenomenon.
Gigantamaxed Pokémon seem to not only have altered size and appearance, but they also gain the ability to use a new move. This move seems to be unique to a given species of Gigantamax Pokémon.
We have to gather more data from these Pokémon at Power Spots. It’s a tall order, but I know you’re up to it.
I’ll keep up the research at the lab while you’re out investigating!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_16_d: While you were out, a fellow professor confirmed my hypothesis—we’re observing the Gigantamax phenomenon!
Can you imagine the incredible new Pokémon forms waiting to be discovered? The possibilities are as enormous as the Pokémon themselves! I’m getting chills!
Nothing beats knowing there’s so much more for us to learn, and I can’t imagine a better research partner than you!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_17_d: I’ve got to say it again—well done, %PLAYERNAME%!
Your tireless efforts and incredible discoveries in recent weeks have advanced our understanding of the Gigantamax phenomenon in a big way!
Why don’t you take some time to relax and recharge? You’ve earned it.
Maybe a peaceful stroll or a quiet picnic in your favorite spot? I’m sure your Buddy Pokémon would like that too!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_18_d: Every time I think I might’ve seen it all, the world of Pokémon drops a surprise on us like the Gigantamax phenomenon.
Every discovery makes me feel like we’re writing the latest and greatest chapter in Pokémon research!
There’s always more for us to learn, but the thrill of uncovering new mysteries never gets old.
As always, thanks for all your hard work, %PLAYERNAME%. Until next time!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_1_di: I was out for my daily stroll when I stumbled upon a group of fascinating Pokémon I’d never encountered before!
I’ve been poring over my research materials, but so far I haven’t turned up any records about these particular Pokémon.
And so, I turn to the power of networking! I’m hoping that I can unravel this mystery by reaching out to my fellow Pokémon Professors. Maybe one of them will know something!
So please give me a moment to organize my notes, and then we’ll get to know these Pokémon better together!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_2a_d: So Grookey caught your eye! I’ve learned that this spirited little Grass type strikes everything in sight with its trusty stick.
The rhythms it makes with that stick grow more lively as it has more and more fun.
I’ll bet Grookey would make an incredible partner for someone who likes to dance! So shimmy on out there and find one! ...If shimmying is your thing, that is.
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_2b_d: Aha, the fiery Scorbunny has “sparked” your interest, eh?
I’ve noted that this energetic Fire type does warm-up exercises to help heat up its body and unleash its full potential.
Sounds like having Scorbunny by your side would give you the perfect workout buddy! What do you say, %PLAYERNAME%?
Head on out there and make yourself a fiery new friend!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_2c_d: I’ve learned that this Water type has a unique defense mechanism: it bursts into tears when frightened.
Oh, but these waterworks don’t just soften hearts—Sobble’s tears pack the punch of 100 onions, causing its attackers to weep!
How about you track down a Sobble so you’ve got a shoulder to cry on? Er, to...make you cry on? I’ll work on that one...
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_3a_d: You got one! My curious side loves seeing Grookey up close, but the rest of me thinks we ought to steer clear of its stick!
I’ve got good news, too—a fellow professor shared their research with me. Did you know that when Grookey evolves into Thwackey, it gains a second stick?
It makes skillful use of those twin sticks not only to drum out rapid beats, but also to pummel opponents in battle.
How about we try to help your little rockstar evolve so we can learn even more about Thwackey’s musical talents?
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_3b_d: Hello to you, and hello to your new friend, Scorbunny! Excellent work catching it!
I’ve got good news, too—a fellow professor shared their research with me. I was just reading up on Scorbunny’s Evolution, Raboot.
Did you know that they kick berries right off tree branches and juggle them with their feet? It’s a way to practice footwork!
Now that’s something I’ve just got to see! And who wouldn’t want the chance to enjoy some delicious berries in the name of research?
How about you help your Scorbunny evolve into Raboot?
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_3c_d: Now that you’ve made a new friend in Sobble, let’s take a few moments to indulge in the delights of learning!
And on that front, I’ve got news that WON’T make you cry—a fellow professor sent me their research. From it, I learned that when Sobble evolves into Drizzile, it becomes quite lazy.
But don’t let that laziness fool you. Drizzile is highly intelligent and will defend its territory by laying traps for its enemies!
A clever Pokémon like that sounds like something we need to know more about, so why don’t you work on evolving your Sobble?
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_4a_d: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! And welcome to your new pal Thwackey!
I’ve been reading, and I’ve found some great stuff on Thwackey’s Evolution, Rillaboom!
Apparently, when two of them meet, they’ll engage in a drumming battle to decide who will lead their troop.
How about we do some firsthand observation and help your Thwackey evolve? I’ll bet you and Rillaboom would really hit it off!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_4b_d: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%. That’s quite an impressive Raboot! I bet it’s really been heating things up with its fancy footwork!
But save your applause until you see its final Evolution, Cinderace. It juggles pebbles with its feet and turns them into blazing soccer balls that scorch opponents!
I wouldn’t want to be goalie—or the net, for that matter—with Cinderace on the field! But I do think we should “net” ourselves some new data and evolve your Raboot into Cinderace.
Just think of the fiery spectacle you’ll get to enjoy alongside your new friend!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_4c_d: You’re back! And you’ve got a Drizzile in tow! Let’s take a closer look.
Did you know that its long, slimy tongue can move at blinding speeds to attack enemies?
And when it evolves into Inteleon, it gains even more incredible abilities—like fingertips that can shoot water at Mach 3!
That sounds like something we ought to see. Why don’t you continue your adventure and evolve your Drizzile into Inteleon?
It’ll be an incredible scientific opportunity to see those amazing abilities firsthand—just remember to wear a raincoat!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_5_di: Yes! You’re just the person I wanted to see, %PLAYERNAME%!
I was investigating the power emanating from one of those strange lights that appeared—and you won’t believe the colossal discovery I made!
There’s an enormous Pokémon in it! Truly HUMUNGOUS! And it’s not the only one—I’ve received reports of these massive Pokémon showing up all over the place.
So how about it? Are you up for meeting some supersized Pokémon and getting to the bottom of a BIG mystery?
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_6_di: We’ve made a massive breakthrough, %PLAYERNAME%! My fellow Pokémon Professors and I have confirmed that we’ve been witnessing the Dynamax phenomenon.
And on top of that, we’ve learned that the locations with the strange lights are an entirely new occurrence!
Honestly, those Power Spots give me tingles!
Further, Power Spots are definitely related to Dynamaxing. This is truly fascinating stuff, my friend! Let’s go size up the situation and gather more data.
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_7_di: %PLAYERNAME%, this Dynamax discovery of ours is no small thing. It’s as though every detail we learn leads to new questions!
How did the Power Spots form? How much stronger are these Pokémon? Do Dynamax Pokémon have equally “maxed” appetites? Hoo boy, we might need to stock up on Berries!
In any case, we need to keep thinking big and tracking down these gargantuan Pokémon!
So c’mon, let’s get out there and supersize this Dynamax adventure!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_8_di: %PLAYERNAME%, I’m glad you’re here. I’ve been bombarded with reports of Team GO Rocket sightings!
Those troublemakers are up to something. I’m sure of it.
Let me know what you find out, and I’ll keep you updated on my end. And stay safe out there!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_9_di: Glad you’re back. I’ve been reviewing these Team GO Rocket reports, and I think I’ve pieced together something troubling.
The evidence suggests that they’re trying to take advantage of the Dynamax phenomenon.
Can you imagine the chaos if they could harness that kind of power? We can’t let that happen!
Please stop Team GO Rocket from getting anywhere near any Dynamax Pokémon!
quest_title_season_16_first_partner_bran: Good news—I have some information for you! Which Pokémon would you like to learn more about, %PLAYERNAME%?
quest_title_season_17_1_dialogue_1: Welcome, %PLAYERNAME%! Rhi and I were just discussing some strange weather that we’ve observed recently.
quest_title_season_17_1_dialogue_2: Heat one moment, cold and thunderclouds the next! Absolutely bizarre.
quest_title_season_17_1_dialogue_3: Indeed. I wonder how wild Pokémon will adapt to these environmental changes.
quest_title_season_17_1_dialogue_4: Would you look into that and report your findings while I investigate?
quest_title_season_17_2_dialogue_1: Your initial investigation was stellar as always, %PLAYERNAME%. But I have some alarming news.
quest_title_season_17_2_dialogue_2: Team GO Rocket might know something about why this is happening. While I was out, I saw that their leaders were up to something.
quest_title_season_17_2_dialogue_3: We need to get to the bottom of this, even if that means getting close to Team GO Rocket to crack the case.
quest_title_season_17_2_dialogue_4: Thankfully, you won’t be alone. I asked Candela, Blanche, and Spark to investigate too.
quest_title_season_17_2_dialogue_5: Why don’t you find them and see what they’ve discovered?

rewarded_spend_helpshift_desc: The Reward Road is a monthly reward program where Trainers can earn Reward Points with eligible purchases every month.* Earn a certain amount of Reward Points to level up the Reward Road and unlock rewards! 1. Make an eligible purchase to earn Reward Points.* 2. Unlock rewards by earning Reward Points. 3. Visit our website to learn how to claim unlocked rewards.** *Only purchases made with real-world currency count toward Reward Road progress. Exchanges made using PokéCoins will not grant Reward Points. **Reward Points expire at the end of the calendar month. Even if a Trainer claims every reward, Reward Points will not carry over between months. Trainers using child accounts are not eligible to participate in the Reward Road program. Reward Points are not cash or any other currency, and they are non-transferable between accounts. Reward Road program availability and terms are subject to change.

route_creation_onboarding_page_1:
Create a Route in three easy steps!
1. Select the start point and end point.
2. Walk between these points.
3. Name and describe your Route!
route_creation_onboarding_page_2:
Routes must:
1. Be between {0} km and {1} km.
2. Be in safe areas and not go through private property.
3. Have a clear description and theme.
route_creation_onboarding_page_3:
Place pins along your Route to mark interesting highlights!

Pins must be placed:
1. Within {0} meters of the Route’s path.
2. At least {1} meters away from other pins.
route_creation_onboarding_page_4:
Created Routes are submitted to Niantic for review and approval. If your Route is rejected, you may be given a chance to edit and resubmit it.

It’s time to create your Route!

safari_2020_dialogue_0_1: Thank you for coming. There are lots of interesting Pokémon appearing in the wild here.
safari_2020_dialogue_0_2: Let’s discover and study them all together!
safari_2020_dialogue_1_0: Wow, %PLAYERNAME%! That was such an exciting journey.
safari_2020_dialogue_1_2: Why not take the time to bond with the other Trainers here?
safari_2020_dialogue_1_2a: Why not take some time to bond with your buddy?
safari_2020_goyang_dialogue_1_1: Thanks to you, we’ve learned a lot about the Pokémon at Safari Zone Goyang 2020!

safari_2020_stlouis_dialogue_1_1: Thanks to you, we’ve learned a lot about the Pokémon at Safari Zone St. Louis!

safari_2022_goyang_dialogue_1_1: Thanks to you, we’ve learned a lot about the Pokémon at Pokémon GO Safari Zone Goyang 2022!

safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_00_00: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%. It’s wonderful to see you here! This is one of my favorite cities, and it’s popular with other Pokémon Trainers, too!
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_00_01: In fact, there was a large gathering of Trainers here some time ago, just as some species of Pokémon that aren’t commonly found in the area happened to be appearing.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_00_02: And wouldn’t you know it, those Pokémon are also appearing now! Let’s see if we can find them.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_01_00: All set to explore the city, %PLAYERNAME%?
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_01_01: That’s the spirit! Let’s get to it.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_01_02: We can start by checking out those PokéStops over there.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_02_00: Great job, %PLAYERNAME%! That’s a Pokémon that you don’t usually see in these parts.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_02_01: Funnily enough, I remember seeing it around here during that previous gathering of Trainers I mentioned.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_02_02: What other Pokémon do you think we’ll spot today?
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_03_01: It’s been a while since I’ve seen that Pokémon! You’re really on a roll today.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_03_02: Let’s see what other Pokémon are around, shall we?
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_04_01: That Pokémon was also spotted during that previous gathering!
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_04_02: Maybe it had such a good time it stuck around to meet more Trainers...
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_04_03: Whatever the case, it couldn’t have met a nicer Trainer, %PLAYERNAME%.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_05_00: Good work, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m sure that Pokémon will have a great time adventuring with you.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_05_01: Phew! We’ve been moving a lot today, huh? Let’s make one more stop before we take a well-earned rest.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_06_00: That’s all for our tour this time, %PLAYERNAME%. Thanks for coming on this little adventure!
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_06_01: I’m always grateful for the chance to research Pokémon alongside skilled Trainers like yourself.
safari_city_leave_behind_dialog_06_02: Plus, it’s hard not to get fired up in the presence of such passion! So the next time there’s a research opportunity, I’m sure I’ll see you there.
safari_city_leave_behind_title_barcelona: Barcelona City Safari: The Journey Continues
Barcelona City Safari: The Journey Continues (1/1)
safari_city_leave_behind_title_mxc: Mexico City Safari: The Journey Continues
safari_city_leave_behind_title_mxc_00: Mexico City Safari: The Journey Continues (1/1)
safari_city_leave_behind_title_seoul: Seoul City Safari: The Journey Continues
safari_city_leave_behind_title_seoul_00: Seoul City Safari: The Journey Continues (1/1)
safari_city_leave_behind_title_tainan: Tainan City Safari: The Journey Continues
safari_city_leave_behind_title_tainan_00: Tainan City Safari: The Journey Continues (1/1)
safari_city_sr_dialog_00_00: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%! Ready for an eventful day of research in the city?
safari_city_sr_dialog_00_01: I’m sure you’ll meet all sorts of Pokémon, but first I’d like to introduce you to one in particular—this intrepid Eevee!
safari_city_sr_dialog_00_02: Charming, isn’t it? Something tells me the two of you will make an excellent team. Now, get out there and start your adventure together!
safari_city_sr_dialog_01_01_backup: Now, you and Eevee have a great time exploring the city! Don’t forget to stop for snacks now and then—and make sure to take some snapshots to remember your adventure!
safari_city_sr_dialog_01_01_blanche: I hope you and Eevee have an educational day exploring the city. Please remember to stay hydrated and to document your findings via snapshots.
safari_city_sr_dialog_01_01_candela: You and Eevee are primed for a fruitful day of exploration. Just don’t forget to stop for snacks and snapshots now and then, yeah?
safari_city_sr_dialog_01_01_spark: I hope you and Eevee have a great time zooming all over town! Remember to grab some snacks, snap some shots, and above all—stay hydrated!
safari_city_sr_dialog_01_02_backup: I’m looking forward to hearing all about your discoveries when you’re back.
safari_city_sr_dialog_01_02_blanche: I look forward to hearing your final report.
safari_city_sr_dialog_01_02_candela: I can’t wait to hear all about your adventures later!
safari_city_sr_dialog_01_02_spark: Tell me all about it when you’re back!
safari_city_sr_dialog_02_00: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! Oh, and you too, Eevee!
safari_city_sr_dialog_02_01: Take any good snapshots? Have any tasty food?
safari_city_sr_dialog_02_02: There’s tons to see, so I hope the two of you enjoy exploring together! I have no doubt you and Eevee are bound to share many journeys to come.
safari_city_sr_dialog_branch_00_blanche: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%. It’s good to see you.
safari_city_sr_dialog_branch_01_backup: Which of these do you think will help you get the most out of your City Safari experience?
safari_city_sr_dialog_branch_01_blanche: I would like to offer you something that will assist your research. Please choose whatever you think will be most helpful.
safari_city_sr_dialog_branch_01_candela: Why don’t you pick something that gets you fired up?
safari_city_sr_dialog_branch_01_spark: Let’s kick it up a notch today. Which one of these gives you a jolt of excitement?

sierra_challenge#1: This is probably a waste of my time, but I do love winning!
sierra_challenge#10: This won’t be all bad—when you lose, you’ll at least get to hear me say you made a good effort.
sierra_challenge#2: I won’t be surprised when I win.
sierra_challenge#3: It will be good for you to see a true Trainer like me in battle.
sierra_challenge#4: If you are as weak as your team leaders, then this fight will be easy.
sierra_challenge#5: You should probably take notes, dear.
sierra_challenge#6: I’ll never pass up an opportunity to show off on the battlefield!
sierra_challenge#7: Can we move this along? I’d love to stay and chat, but I have a meeting to get to.
sierra_challenge#8: You shouldn’t get in my way. You might get hurt, dear.
sierra_challenge#9: This is a challenge you should walk away from, dear.
sierra_defeat#1: I’ve lost my touch... But it will not happen again.
sierra_defeat#2: I underestimated you, but I will not make the same mistake again.
sierra_defeat#3: I can’t lose... What does this mean?
sierra_defeat#4: You win this time, but things’ll go differently next time we meet!
sierra_defeat#5: Ugh, these Pokémon are too weak for a Trainer like me!
sierra_greeting#1: How amusing! You dare to challenge me?
sierra_greeting#10: I’m not fond of dealing with weaklings. Pay attention! You might learn something.
sierra_greeting#2: Such an eager Trainer. I’ll happily defeat you.
sierra_greeting#3: Your inevitable loss will be such a good lesson.
sierra_greeting#4: Pay attention, Trainer. You just might learn something!
sierra_greeting#5: I’m getting tired of battling weaklings. Let’s get this over with.
sierra_greeting#6: Silly Trainer. You ought to know better than to oppose me.
sierra_greeting#7: You’ve had your fun. Now it’s time for you to fight me.
sierra_greeting#8: I can see this will be a struggle for you. Don’t worry. I’ll defeat you quickly.
sierra_greeting#9: It’s so cute how willing you are to accept your defeat. Let’s battle.
sierra_victory#1: I wish I could enjoy this victory, but it wasn’t a surprise!
sierra_victory#3: Move along, dear. Team GO Rocket always wins.
sierra_victory#5: Come back when you can actually pose a challenge, dear!

sleep_not_tracked_title: You didn’t track any sleep yesterday.
sleep_reward_modal_subtitle_flavor_0: Great job! You slept {0} longer than last time!
sleep_reward_modal_subtitle_flavor_1: Wow! You got a lot of sleep yesterday!
sleep_reward_modal_subtitle_flavor_2: Nice! You had a good night’s rest!
sleep_reward_modal_subtitle_flavor_4: Keep it up! Track your sleep every night!
sleep_tips_1_text_1: First, allow your sleep data to be shared with Pokémon GO.
sleep_tips_1_text_2: If you decline, data from up to eight sleep sessions you track will still be recorded locally on your Pokémon GO Plus + and will remain stored there until it’s overwritten by data from new sleep sessions.
sleep_tips_1_title: Earn Rewards for Tracking Sleep with Your Pokémon GO Plus +!
sleep_tips_2_description_0: Your Pokémon GO Plus + must be near your body, otherwise your sleep may not be detected properly.
sleep_tips_2_description_1:
Do this by pressing the main button on your Pokémon GO Plus + until you see blue light flash once. 
Your Pokémon GO Plus + must be paired to Pokémon GO but not actively connected for this to work.
sleep_tips_2_description_2: Do this by pressing the main button on your Pokémon GO Plus + until you see multicolored lights flash once.
sleep_tips_2_description_3: After recording your sleep, open Pokémon GO and connect your Pokémon GO Plus + to begin transferring your sleep data.
sleep_tips_2_text_0: Place your Pokémon GO Plus + on your bed or clip it to your pillow.
sleep_tips_2_text_1: Before you go to bed, begin a sleep session.
sleep_tips_2_text_2: When you wake up, end your sleep session.
sleep_tips_2_text_3: Share your sleep data with Pokémon GO.
sleep_tips_2_text_4: Sleep sessions must be at least 90 minutes long to be recorded by your Pokémon GO Plus +.
sleep_tips_3_text_1: With Quick-Reconnect Mode enabled, you can reconnect your nearby Pokémon GO Plus + to your paired smart device by simply tapping the Pokémon GO Plus + icon on the Map view or in Settings. If this feature is disabled, you’ll need to press the main button on your Pokémon GO Plus + to reconnect it.
sleep_tips_3_text_2: You can change this later in Settings.
sleep_tips_4_text_1: You can earn rewards by tracking your sleep. The longer you sleep, the more rewards you earn! You can also choose what time you receive these rewards each day.
sleep_tips_5_text_1: Now it’s time to get some rest!
sleep_tips_5_text_2: Make sure to activate your Pokémon GO Plus + tonight when you’re ready to go to sleep.

spacetime_anomaly_desc: A space-time anomaly has formed in the area! Pokémon first discovered in the Hisui region are appearing!
spacial_rend_adventure_effects_mapview_d: Manipulates space, allowing you to find and encounter Pokémon from farther away.
spacial_rend_use_summary: {0} manipulates space for the next {1}, allowing you to find and encounter Pokémon from farther away.
spark_incident_combat_quote__female_spea: I remember when you were just a newbie. But I won’t go easy on ya just because we’re old friends!
spark_incident_combat_quote__male_speake: I remember when you were just a newbie. But I won’t go easy on ya just because we’re old friends!
spark_incident_greeting: Instincts sure are handy, don’t you think? Team Instinct knows what’s up!
spark_incident_victory__female_speaker: I won? I mean, yeah! I won! Woohoo!
spark_incident_victory__male_speaker: I won? I mean, yeah! I won! Woohoo!
spark_map_empty_warning|1: Whoa—not a signal in sight! I wonder what they’re scared of?
spark_map_empty_warning|2: Just when I was energized to do some battling! Maybe we should check out other locations.
spark_map_time_warning|1: No signals? Well, it is getting pretty late... and I need to go meet up with Willow.
spark_map_time_warning|2: We might have better luck catching them during the daytime, when Candela and I usually get most of our research done.

sparkly_incense_counter: The Coin Bag can be used once per day.
sparkly_incense_description_detail: Open the Coin Bag in your Item Bag for a mysterious effect.

sponsored_gift_tutorial_description_1: As you explore the world around you, you may receive Sponsored Gifts along with messages from advertisers relevant to your location. Sponsored Gifts now have a fresh, new look!
sponsored_gift_tutorial_description_2: As always, we do not share your personal information with sponsors. For more information on this feature, please check out Niantic Support.
sponsored_gift_tutorial_description_3: You can manage Sponsored Gifts in your settings. This does not affect Gifts you exchange with friends, even if you obtain the Gifts from Sponsored Locations.
