sr_gofest2022_d1_battle_narrative_sectio: I was thinking: Because we don’t know what attracted Shaymin here, we should make sure the surrounding area is safe.
I really hope Shaymin hasn’t found itself in any trouble!
Before we start, though, why don’t you power up some of your Pokémon in case we need to defend Shaymin when we find it?
Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! We’re off to a great start already.
I have another research-related question for you.
How intensely do you think we’ll need to focus our efforts today?
That sounds good to me.
Something else just occurred to me. Do you think Team GO Rocket will try to capture Shaymin?
The thought of something happening to that sweet little Pokémon is almost too much to bear.
Well, now that your team’s powered up, we can stop Team GO Rocket before they even get started. Let’s get out there and scare them off, %PLAYERNAME%!
Welcome back! Thanks for taking care of those Team GO Rocket members.
Now that the area’s safe, we can really focus on our search for Shaymin.
After meeting with the team leaders, I’ve learned that Shaymin sightings are happening around the world! Since we can’t be everywhere all at once, let’s start the search right here, where we are.
Hm? You didn’t know the team leaders were assisting us? But of course!
The team leaders are a curious bunch, and dutiful, too. They’re more than happy to help investigate the mysteries of Pokémon.
My current theory is that Shaymin will appear wherever Trainers are feeling thankful. With that in mind, why don’t you and your Buddy Pokémon try challenging a raid?
Perhaps Shaymin will sense the gratitude you feel for your Pokémon and the other Trainers battling at your side.
Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! How’d it go?
No sign of Shaymin yet, eh? Not to worry. What fun would life be if we got everything on the first try?
I’ll check in with the team leaders to see if they have any new intel. In the meantime, let’s think of other ways we can encourage Shaymin to appear.
What if you try battling some other Trainers? Perhaps Shaymin will sense the bonds of gratitude between you and your Pokémon team. Give it a try, %PLAYERNAME%!
sr_gofest2022_d1_catch_narrative_section: Before we get started, let’s take a moment to appreciate our Pokémon pals.
It’s always exciting to meet new Pokémon, but it’s important to make time for the ones that have supported us all along. After all, we’d be lost without them!
Much like I’d be lost without your unwavering support. Thanks as always, %PLAYERNAME%!
Now, why don’t you spend some time with your Buddy Pokémon?
And I hope you had a pleasant time with your Buddy Pokémon!
Hm? You didn’t know the team leaders were assisting us? But of course! They’re a curious bunch, and dutiful, too. They’re more than happy to help investigate the mysteries of Pokémon.
I wonder if Shaymin is out getting to know the nearby Pokémon. Try catching a few and see if you can spot Shaymin!
No sign of Shaymin yet, eh? Well, that’s understandable. Mythical Pokémon aren’t known to be easy to find, after all!
I appreciate you entertaining my hypothesis, though. Perhaps we can try luring Shaymin out with some Pinap Berries next? That would certainly work for me... Haha!
Welcome back! No Shaymin yet, eh? Not to worry. What fun would life be if everything came easily?
I’ll check in with the team leaders to see if they have any new info.
While we gather more intel, why don’t you head back out and see what Pokémon you can find?
sr_gofest2022_d1_explore_narrative_secti: I’m sure you’re raring to go, but let’s take a moment to think about the friends who’ve helped you on your journey thus far.
Why don’t you send them some Gifts to let them know you’re thinking about them? It’s a great way to show your appreciation!
I hope you know how much I appreciate all you’ve done to help me, %PLAYERNAME%. I really don’t know what I’d do without you!
How intensely do you think we’ll need to focus our efforts today?
Hm? You didn’t know the team leaders were assisting us? But of course!
The team leaders are a curious bunch, and dutiful, too. They’re more than happy to help investigate the mysteries of Pokémon.
Why don’t you visit some interesting locations that are nearby, %PLAYERNAME%? Maybe they’ll have caught Shaymin’s eye!
No sign of Shaymin yet, eh? Well, that’s understandable. Mythical Pokémon aren’t known to be easy to find, after all!
Hmm... Shaymin is known as the Gratitude Pokémon, so perhaps we can attract it to us by expressing gratitude.
It’s just a theory, but maybe hatching an Egg would help? It can’t hurt to try!
I can tell from your expression that you haven’t encountered Shaymin yet—but try not to worry.
After all, what fun would life be if everything came easily?
While we gather more intel, why don’t you head back out and see what you can find?
sr_gofest2022_d1_find_shaymin_narrative_: I’m hearing reports that Shaymin has been seen nearby!
But unfortunately, I’ve also heard that Team GO Rocket is sneaking around as well. Needless to say, we’ll have to clear them out before they can harm Shaymin.
sr_gofest2022_d1_intro_narrative_section: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%! Welcome to Pokémon GO Fest 2022.
This year’s festivities are already off to an incredible start—I’m receiving reports that the Mythical Pokémon Shaymin has been sighted nearby!
The flowers on Shaymin’s body are said to burst into bloom when Shaymin is lovingly hugged and senses gratitude. Believe me, it’s not every day you see Shaymin around!
I wonder if Shaymin’s appearance is somehow related to the island guardians...
Or... What if Shaymin’s appeared in response to how thankful I am for all your help lately! Shaymin is known as the Gratitude Pokémon, after all.
I’m also thankful that you’re here today to enjoy the celebrations. You’ve more than earned it!
I’m sure you’re eager to start searching for Shaymin, so I won’t keep you. Something tells me it’s going to be an exciting day!
sr_gofest2022_d1_outro_narrative_section: Once you’re better friends, I hope you’ll hug it so we can see its flowers burst into bloom!
As always, thanks for helping me with today’s research! Your contributions are truly invaluable.
I’d like to give you a hug myself—but I spilled some Pinap Juice on myself earlier, so I think I’ll keep my stickiness to myself.
I want to hear all about how you found Shaymin, but first—have you noticed what’s appeared in the sky?

Those gaping anomalies appear reminiscent of Hoopa’s rings, but also quite different. A bit like...black holes, perhaps? No—wormholes? What could be on the other side, I wonder? Is this why Alola’s island guardians have been appearing?
My mind is buzzing with all the possibilities! Though, I think we should tackle this tomorrow. Today’s been plenty exciting.
I can’t wait to see what tomorrow holds.
And I’m certain that whatever it is, we’ll face it together!
Thanks again for all your help today, %PLAYERNAME%. And here’s to an exciting tomorrow!
sr_gofest2022_d1_pre_choice_narrative_se: Hello! Looks like you’re already all warmed up.
Before we continue, I’d like your opinion on something very important.
What’s your preferred method of searching for Shaymin?
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_1: Or, hmm... Would “what is up” be an acceptable greeting in this circumstance? I have been told the humans of this world are fond of such parlance.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_10: This world is mysterious. Would you assist me in expanding my knowledge of it?
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_11: Thank you. I am fortunate to have found someone so kind.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_12: Tell me all about your world, Pokémon Trainer.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_13: Together, perhaps we can expose why the Ultra Wormholes have materialized in your world and mitigate the anomalies that result.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_2: It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance. I am Rhi of the GO Ultra Recon Squad.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_3: You are a...Pokémon Trainer, is it? I am familiar with the concept.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_4: I apologize if I appear awkward. You are the first human I’ve met in this world.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_5: Do you see that hole in the sky? That is called an Ultra Wormhole, a tear in space that leads to a world very different from yours.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_6: In fact, I’ve traveled through that wormhole myself, in order to research its appearance and assist with any resulting anomalies occurring in your world.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_8: I see. This “Professor Willow” failed to appear before you, is it? I’m unfamiliar with any such individual, but I understand the concern that arises when a companion is missing.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_1_9: I will assist you in your search. In return, however, I would ask a favor.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_0: Wah tee sup, Pokémon Trainer? Hmm... That feels incorrect.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_1: Thank you for your assistance thus far. Shall we turn our attention to other objectives?
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_2: First, we must find out what caused the Ultra Wormholes to appear in this world.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_3: Second, we must keep watch for anything that may travel through them.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_4: And third, we must find your missing Willow friend.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_5: But before all of that, a question: what are those large, towering structures spread throughout the area? They seem to sometimes be blue or red or yellow, and they’re far larger than what you said are “PokéStops.”
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_6: “Gyms,” is it? And Pokémon Trainers gather there to challenge powerful Pokémon in “Raid Battles”? Fascinating.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_7: Tell me everything you know about these Raid Battles, Pokémon Trainer.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_8: They seem to serve as nexus between powerful creatures and humans.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_2_9: If it is acceptable to you, I would like to start by focusing our efforts there.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_0: Thank you for shining a light on the concept of Raid Battles, Pokémon Trainer. In return, I will confide in you what I know about the Ultra Wormholes.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_1: Ultra Wormholes are portals into Ultra Space.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_11: If that person was the Willow professor you’re searching for, the GO Ultra Recon Squad will no doubt come to their aid. Such is our purpose.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_12: In the between time, I will remain here to provide assistance and illuminate any truths I can.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_13: Let us continue to help each other, Pokémon Trainer.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_2: These dimensional passageways allow creatures known as Ultra Beasts to spill into worlds they don’t belong—and they are fiercely strong.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_3: Ultra Beasts are similar to the creatures you call Pokémon—but to your eyes, I imagine they might appear...somewhat different than what you’re accustomed.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_4: As you have likely observed, more and more Ultra Beasts are appearing around you.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_5: The one in your world now is known as UB-01 Symbiont. Certain humans also call it Nihilego.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_6: It is a Rock- and Poison-type Ultra Beast that is thought to produce a strong neurotoxin. It appears to be a parasite that lives by feeding on people and Pokémon.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_7: I’d like to subdue it before it causes trouble for anyone in this world. Can I beg your help in this undertaking?
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_8: I have no experience in Pokémon battles. Where I come from, Pokémon are shared.
sr_gofest2022_d2_basic_3_9: Furthermore, there are indications that someone from this world was sucked into an Ultra Wormhole. If that is true, that person could be in tremendous danger.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_4_0: To what are you up, Pokémon Trainer? That...that’s not it, is it? *sigh* I see you have caught many Ground-type Pokémon. May I ask why?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_4_1: They’re particularly effective against Rock- and Poison-type Pokémon like Nihilego, is it? I see. Your forethought is impressive.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_4_2: I have decided it would be prudent of me to explore and better familiarize myself with the surrounding area. Would you like to accompany?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_4_3: We can tell each other more about our worlds as we go.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_4_4: I am once again thankful to have acquainted myself with someone so cordial.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_4_5: There is still much for me to learn about this world, but it has been quite exciting thus far.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_4_6: Come, Pokémon Trainer. Let us see what we can discover together.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_5_0: A question, Pokémon Trainer—who are those people with the large red Rs on their clothes?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_5_1: Judging by their dour expressions, I do not believe they’re friends of yours.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_5_2: Team GO Rocket, is it? Curious...
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_5_4: If they intend to cause us problems, may I rely on you?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_6_0: Your skill in battle is effervescent, Pokémon Trainer! Your aptitude assures me that Nihilego can be safely subdued.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_6_1: May we now observe the Gyms where Nihilego has been appearing? Participating in Raid Battles may prove illuminating as well.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_6_2: Hm? Ultra Beasts aren’t the only creatures you’ve encountered of late that are far from their homes?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_6_3: I see... The Island Guardians of Alola, is it? Perhaps they sensed that the Ultra Wormholes would appear and came to assess how much of a threat they may pose to Alola.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_6_4: The Alola region... I’ve heard tell of its shine. But we haven’t time for my wistfulness. Let us embark, Pokémon Trainer.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_7_1: This is my first time in the field with another by my side. I apologize—I’ve yet to grow accustomed to the nuances of this dynamic.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_7_2: How do you typically enjoy your rest in this world?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_7_3: I see... Spending time with your Pokémon and friends, hatching Eggs, and other such endeavors, is it?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_7_4: I am enchanted by these “Incubators” that you place Eggs within.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_7_5: They seem an amazing feat of human science. Would you provide me a demonstration?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_7_6: Perhaps if we appear relaxed, Nihilego may respond in kind.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_7_7: Though there is always a chance it may try to feast upon you—but I will alert you if I notice such behavior in action.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_7_8: To think I may soon witness Nihilego being captured in a Poké Ball...
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_8_0: You were unfazed by that confrontation with Nihilego.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_8_1: You seem unafraid of the unknown. It’s an admirable trait.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_8_2: Do you think Nihilego felt disoriented and alone when it found itself in an unfamiliar world? I feel a kinship with it in that way...
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_8_3: I am lucky to have met a nice human so quickly. I hope Nihilego may also consider itself lucky to have encountered such a kind and accomplished Pokémon Trainer.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_8_4: In the end, Ultra Beasts are powerful creatures—and not easily controlled.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_8_5: Once they have arrived in a world, there is little left I can do...
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_8_6: And yet you have managed to take it in gently as if it were any other Pokémon. Selfishly, I wish for a closer look at Nihilego in this state. Do you have a way to observe it safely?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_8_7: A “snapshot,” is it? What a delight.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_8_8: Seeing Nihilego in this lucent world, I might even say it is...beautiful?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_0: Your world is almost blindingly bright—and more verdant than I’ve ever experienced. I do hope you and your people take care to preserve its splendor.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_1: Were I to exist in such a sparkling world, I would devote my power to its protection.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_10: Would you mind if we continued our work as partners, Pokémon Trainer?
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_11: Our goals easily entwine. Together, we can accomplish and learn much.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_12: You agree? Excellent. Now, our first course of action should be—
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_13: Wait. What are these flowers blooming about us? Is this what Pokémon can do? Yours is truly a dazzling world...
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_2: Judging by your recent actions, you seem to feel similar. You captured Nihilego, derailing disaster while seeking a solution to this world’s new dilemma.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_3: And regarding your Willow... I recently discovered this juice-stained coat near an Ultra Wormhole. There’s no way to be certain, but it seems highly probable that your Willow is somewhere in Ultra Space.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_4: But worry not, Pokémon Trainer. I will work with you to rescue him. You have done me many favors—it is only fair.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_5: If this man is anything like you’ve described, I have no doubt he’ll be well in the end.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_6: So long as Ultra Wormholes remain open here, we have a chance of his safe return—but Ultra Beasts may also continue to spill into this world.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_7: For now, I’ll see what else I can do to assist you.
sr_gofest2022_d2_nihilego_9_8: The GO Ultra Recon Squad normally works in pairs, and your presence has helped me understand why that is.

sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_0: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%! Are you ready? Your very own Pokémon story is about to unfold. This adventure may be brand new to some, while for others, it might be very familiar.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_1: That’s right—today we’re learning all about the Johto region and meeting some Pokémon originally discovered there, too!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_10: But nothing’s happened yet, so you just focus on having fun with your friends and your Pokémon!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_2: The Johto region is a land steeped in history and tradition, where the bygone beauty of Ecruteak City lies just steps away from the modern metropolis of Goldenrod City.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_3: It’s also the region where Dark- and Steel-type Pokémon were first discovered! Not to mention Mr. Pokémon and the mysterious Mystery Egg.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_4: Speaking of Pokémon originally discovered in the Johto region, I’ve heard tell that Celebi, the Time Travel Pokémon, has been seen nearby.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_5: Celebi has the ability to move through time.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_6: I still can’t shake the feeling that Celebi had something to do with Hisuian Voltorb appearing in our time.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_7: In any case, rumor has it this Celebi knows a special move. I hope we’ll get a chance to see if that’s true!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_8: While you enjoy today’s festivities, keep vigilant for any signs of Team GO Rocket. I know I haven’t forgotten about them.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_0_9: Hopefully we can get some insight into what they’ve been up to since they smashed open that mysterious door...
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_1_0: You know what your adventure needs, %PLAYERNAME%? A new buddy! I spoke with a colleague and was able to orchestrate a little surprise for you.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_1_1: These Pokémon are the first partner Pokémon offered to Trainers in the Johto region. Go on—pick one!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_2_0: I think that’s a great Pokémon, too, %PLAYERNAME%!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_2_1_chikorita: Chikorita, the Leaf Pokémon, is docile and loves to soak up the sun’s rays. A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. Doesn’t it have just the most adorable face?
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_2_1_cyndaquil: Cyndaquil, the Fire Mouse Pokémon, is timid and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection. Doesn’t its shyness make you want to cuddle it even more?
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_2_1_totodile: Totodile, the Big Jaw Pokémon, is small but rough and tough. It won’t hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves. Though what’s the harm in one quick pet...
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_2_2: I’m sure this little one is eager to spend some time with you, and what better way than letting it join you on your Johto-inspired journey!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_3_0_chikorita: Wow, your Chikorita evolved into Bayleef already! And just in time, %PLAYERNAME%—I have some troubling news.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_3_0_cyndaquil: Wow, your Cyndaquil evolved into Quilava already! And just in time, %PLAYERNAME%—I have some troubling news.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_3_0_totodile: Wow, your Totodile evolved into Croconaw already! And just in time, %PLAYERNAME%—I have some troubling news.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_3_1: Team GO Rocket is mobilizing—and they’re headed straight toward us!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_3_2: I have a feeling they’re stirring up more than just a mild bit of mischief... That must be why they’re launching an invasion—more distractions! Not to mention they always love to crash our parties.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_3_3: Have they heard about the Celebi sightings? Or maybe they have something even more sinister up their sleeve...
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_3_4: I’m going to need your help defeating some Team GO Rocket Grunts—distract the distraction, and buy me some time to investigate. Can I count on your help?
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_4_0: Magnificent work, %PLAYERNAME%! While I was investigating, some Team GO Rocket Grunts ran by, whining about losing to an “unfairly strong Trainer.”
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_4_1: I assume you’re the Trainer in question? Haha, but of course! I knew I could trust you.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_4_2: So, my sleuthing turned up an interesting rumor. A Gyarados has been spotted nearby, but it isn’t at all like your typical Gyarados.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_4_3: This one seems like it’s mired in a fit of rage—not unlike a certain Red Gyarados that once rampaged the Johto region’s Lake of Rage.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_4_4: Back then, Team Rocket used a mysterious radio broadcast to force Magikarp to evolve.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_4_5: Hm. That sounds similar to Shadow Pokémon, don’t you think? And there have been a lot more Shadow Pokémon appearing lately. Could Team GO Rocket be using the same technology again?
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_4_6: And is this connected to what they stole from behind the mysterious door? What if it was some sort of power that they’ve now amplified and corrupted...?
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_4_7: And with Celebi about and its time travel powers— Egad! Who knows what Team GO Rocket could do! There’s no time to waste. Let’s save Gyarados and then set our sights on finding Celebi before it’s too late!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_0: Great work, %PLAYERNAME%! That Gyarados is much calmer now that you’ve rescued it from Team GO Rocket.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_1: It looks like Team GO Rocket’s retreating as well, so how about we continue with our festivities? They’ve stolen enough of our time.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_2_chikorita: I think your Bayleef would like to play with you!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_2_cyndaquil: I think your Quilava would like to play with you!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_2_totodile: I think your Croconaw would like to play with you!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_3: Even in the direst of situations, when you’re pulled from all sides, it’s essential to take time to decompress and enjoy a peaceful moment with your friends.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_4: Times like that give us the strength to persevere.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_5_chikorita: Speaking of strength, your Bayleef looks ready to evolve!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_5_cyndaquil: Speaking of strength, your Quilava looks ready to evolve!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_5_5_totodile: Speaking of strength, your Croconaw looks ready to evolve!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_6_0_chikorita: Ah, your Meganium is absolutely efflorescent with happiness! Are you two having fun? It’s been a delight to see your friendship blossom.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_6_0_cyndaquil: Ah, your Typhlosion is absolutely ablaze with happiness! Are you two having fun? It’s been a delight to see your new friendship burn so brightly.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_6_0_totodile: Ah, your Feraligatr is absolutely awash with happiness! Are you two having fun? It’s been a delight to experience the refreshing friendship between you two.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_6_1: Making new friends and exploring the world around you are two of life’s greatest joys. My life is richer for the adventures I’ve had.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_6_2: I’d have never found that mysterious door if not for a random adventure! Despite Team GO Rocket’s interference, I’m still grateful for the time I got to spend with the team leaders and the research I was able to do.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_6_3: Enough of my chatter—why don’t you go make some new friends yourself? There’s plenty of day left to enjoy.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_7_0: %PLAYERNAME%, sorry to rush you, but we have to hurry! There’s been a confirmed Celebi sighting just moments ago. If you go now, you might be able to catch it!
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_8_0: Great work catching Celebi! It is thought that so long as Celebi appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_8_1: I wonder why Celebi decided to appear to us today. Maybe it’s a sign of good things to come.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_8_2: After all the trouble we’ve had with Team GO Rocket, I welcome the reminder that peaceful times aren’t too far off.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_8_3: While you were out, I uncovered the truth Team GO Rocket has been trying so hard to hide: they’ve captured Lugia and Ho-Oh.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_8_4: It gets worse: using the power they stole from behind the mysterious door in conjunction with radio technology developed via their past broadcasts, they’ve forced Lugia and Ho-Oh to ascend to a level of power beyond any Shadow Pokémon we’ve ever seen.
sr_gotour2022_sr_dialogue_8_5: They’re calling them Apex Shadow Lugia and Apex Shadow Ho-Oh. Get ready, %PLAYERNAME%—the battle’s only just begun.
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_0_0: Well hello, %PLAYERNAME%! How’d you enjoy yesterday’s festivities? I hope you’re still feeling energetic, because there’s more in store—and this time, we’re focusing on the Kanto region!
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_0_1: What better place to start one’s Pokémon adventure, no?
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_0_2: Now, let’s get out there and start exploring!
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_1_0: Ah, %PLAYERNAME%, you’re looking a bit tired. Why not take a quick break? Play with your buddy a bit, maybe feed it a nice juicy Berry?
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_1_1: While you’re at it, why not grab a snack yourself! Even the strongest Trainers can’t run on an empty stomach.
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_2_0: Having fun, %PLAYERNAME%? Are you all warmed up for your next adventure? I hope so, because you’ll soon be exploring the area’s different habitats.
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_2_1: There are five habitats, each filled with unique Pokémon. Which habitats have which Pokémon, you ask? Well, let’s go find out!
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_3_0: Nice snapshots, %PLAYERNAME%! You really captured the essence of the Pokémon, and it looks like the little models were having a good time, too.
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_3_1: Did you enjoy your excursion through the habitats? I bet you encountered an immense amount of Pokémon, both familiar and new to you!
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_3_2: There are tons of amazing Trainers out here exploring as well.
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_3_3: Why not make a few new friends, then trade or battle with them?
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_4_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! While you were out, I heard that a powerful Legendary Pokémon has been sighted in the area.
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_4_1: Maybe it heard about our festivities and wanted to join the fun? Let’s go check it out!
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_5_0: Whoa! Is that...Mewtwo? Incredible! Will the world’s wonders never cease?
sr_gotoursik_dialogue_5_1: This has been such a fun day, %PLAYERNAME%. I hope you enjoy the rest of your adventure—there’s still plenty more to do. Until next time...let’s GO!

sticker_nia_logo_desc: A sticker featuring the Niantic Labs logo. See you out there!
sticker_pgo_fest_2017_desc: An exclusive sticker for Pokémon GO Fest attendees, featuring the Pokémon GO Fest 2017 shirt design.

sticker_photo_save_description: Your decorated snapshot will be saved as a separate image. This will use up any stickers you applied.
stickers_tutorial_adjust_body: To place a sticker, select it and then tap where you want it on the snapshot. Pinch the sticker to resize it. Tap the X to remove it.

stickers_tutorial_intro_body: You can use stickers to decorate the snapshots you take. Swipe up on the sticker panel at the bottom of the screen to select stickers.
stickers_tutorial_save_body: Stickers placed on photos will be consumed once you save your picture. To return stickers to your inventory, tap "don't save" when prompted.
stickers_v2_collect_from: You can get these stickers from Gifts, the shop, or PokéStops.
stickers_v2_no_recent: Add a sticker to a Gift to start seeing your recently used stickers.
stickers_v2_no_sticker_of_type: You have no stickers of this type.

stickers_v2_no_stickers_of_category: You have no stickers from this category.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_0_1: I just got back from a harrowing expedition. I’ll spare you the gritty details, but it involved boulders, quicksand, and lots of Venipede.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_0_2: Anyway, I’ve come out on the other side with some exciting treasures: fossils, King’s Rocks, and a trove of maps!
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_0_3: It’s hard to determine who or what left the maps behind, especially given their contents. For example, this one apparently leads to “the world’s tastiest Poffin.”
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_0_4: There was one in particular that caught my eye: a map of the skies showing the exact position of the stars today!
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_0_5: It made me wonder if this is a purely informational map, or if it points toward something special.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_0_6: What do you say we find out together?
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_0_7: Seeing as the stars are our inspiration, how about we focus on either diurnal Pokémon—meaning Pokémon that are active during the day—or their opposite, nocturnal Pokémon?
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_0_8: Take some time to think about which Pokémon you’re more interested in researching. Once you’ve decided, we can set off!
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_1a_0: Great choice! There’s nothing like a warm sunbeam to refresh a tired body!
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_1a_1: Speaking of which, here’s a refreshing Pokémon fact: the leaves on Petilil’s head are highly valued for medicinal purposes. They provide relief from weariness—even more so when boiled.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_1a_2: Heh. Now I’m in the mood to look for some Grass-type Pokémon. Shall we, %PLAYERNAME%?
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_1b_0: Great choice! I always enjoy a stroll in the cool, crisp moonlight.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_1b_1: Speaking of which, here’s a cool Pokémon fact: Misdreavus conceals itself in darkness, sending chills up travelers’ spines with its childlike weeping.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_1b_2: Spooky, eh? Now I’m in the mood to look for some Ghost-type Pokémon. Shall we, %PLAYERNAME%?
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_2_1: It has been some time since we last spoke. Have you been faring well?
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_2_2: Splendid. Are you out doing research for Professor Willow?
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_2_4: I, too, find the cycles of the sun and moon fascinating.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_2_5: But I am here for a different matter. I have picked up readings that indicate the presence of something from beyond this world.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_2_6: I had hoped to request your company, but your research for Professor Willow comes first.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_2a_3: I see. So you‘ve both been moved to study Pokémon associated with daytime after finding a celestial chart.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_2a_7: This is farewell for now. I hope you and your Buddy Pokémon have a radiant day, %PLAYERNAME%.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_2b_3: I see. So you‘ve both been moved to study Pokémon associated with nighttime after finding a celestial chart.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_2b_7: This is farewell for now, %PLAYERNAME%. I hope you have a fruitful day—or should I say night?—learning about Pokémon.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_3_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! How did it go?
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_3_1: You ran into Rhi? They just stopped by to chat with me, too!
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_3_2: Rhi was hot on the heels of something otherworldly. We were getting ready to rally the Team Leaders when—get this—a Cosmog blissfully bobbed by!
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_3_3: You don’t see that every day.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_3_4: I recall Rhi mentioning that Cosmog’s gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, but it doesn’t seem to care.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_3_5: Even so, we can’t just leave it be. You’d better hurry and catch that Cosmog before it blows into some trouble!
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_3_6: While you’re doing that, I’ll ponder how another Cosmog found its way here...and whether it was more than luck that we happened to have a map of the stars on this exact day.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_3_7: Mysteries to illuminate in the future, as Rhi might say!
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_branch_0: Which would you rather research: Pokémon that appear during the daytime or Pokémon that appear at night?
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_branch_1_descri: Choose this option to help research Pokémon that are more active during the day. You’ll be tasked with exploring widely and catching many Pokémon.
story_quest_cosmog_sol23_branch_2_descri: Choose this option to help research Pokémon that are more active at night. You’ll be tasked with completing research and catching Pokémon in different ways.
story_quest_dark_flames_june23_branch_1_: If you select this option, your Timed Research rewards will include encounters with Fire-type Pokémon.
story_quest_dark_flames_june23_branch_2_: If you select this option, your Timed Research rewards will include encounters with Dark-type Pokémon.
story_quest_dark_flames_june23_branch_ch: You’ve come at just the right time. I’m trying to pick which of these two maps to follow.
They both lead to my favorite thing—Pokémon to research!
One map will take us past more Fire-type Pokémon, and the other past more Dark-type Pokémon.
I just can’t decide! And that’s where you come in. What do you think? Blazing Fire types or mysterious Dark types?
story_quest_mateointro_0_0: Well, hey there! I’m Mateo. You must be %PLAYERNAME%. Professor Willow has told me a lot about you, so it’s grand to finally put a face to the name.
story_quest_mateointro_0_1: I hear you’ve been a great help with his research. That’s actually how he and I met—out in the field!
story_quest_mateointro_0_2: I come from a long line of researchers and love observing Pokémon in different habitats.
story_quest_mateointro_0_3: My travels take me all around the world, and I enjoy picking up Gifts from the places I’ve been—as well as sharing those Gifts with the Trainers I meet.
story_quest_mateointro_0_4: Whenever you hear adventure calling, find me on a Route and I’ll show you what I mean!
story_quest_mateointro_1_0: Good to see you, %PLAYERNAME%! So you’ve had the chance to check out a Route, eh?
story_quest_mateointro_1_1: I find it invigorating to follow in the figurative footsteps of our fellow explorers and see the world through their eyes.
story_quest_mateointro_1_2: It’s also a great way to pick up Gifts to share with other Trainers!
story_quest_mateointro_1_3: And speaking of Routes, I see you’ve met my good friend Mateo! We go way back. He’s a gold-star guy, and I hope you get to know him as well as I do.
story_quest_mateointro_1_4: By the way, did you see the tape measure Mateo keeps wrapped around his hat?
story_quest_mateointro_1_5: He keeps it handy to better survey the land he travels and to measure the Pokémon he encounters—especially if they’re small. But I’ll let him tell you more about that.
story_quest_mateointro_1_6: Now, in the spirit of Mateo, why don’t you get out there and explore some more Routes yourself?
story_quest_mateointro_2_0: Well, if it isn’t my new friend %PLAYERNAME%! I enjoyed running into you on my last outing!
story_quest_mateointro_2_1: You taking care of yourself? Me, I always make sure to drink plenty of water when I’m out on a Route. Hydrate or...well, hydrate, I always say!
story_quest_mateointro_2_2: I’ve started doing lunges between Routes, too. Talk about taking a big step forward!
story_quest_mateointro_2_3: Get it? “A big step”? Gahaha! My little sister taught me that joke. Speaking of, I can’t wait to show her all the amazing Postcards I’ve collected, like the one I got over in—
story_quest_mateointro_2_4: Oops! There I go again. I just have so many stories to tell! And I’m sure you will too if you keep following Routes.
story_quest_mateointro_2_5: Now, I oughta get going, but I’m sure our paths will cross again soon. See you on the road, %PLAYERNAME%!
story_quest_mateointro_3_0: %PLAYERNAME%! Seems like you and Mateo have become fast friends. I’m thrilled you two have hit it off!
story_quest_mateointro_3_1: It’s clear that your dedication to exchanging Gifts has made an impression on him.
story_quest_mateointro_3_2: He even left some items for me to pass along before he set off on his next adventure!
story_quest_mateointro_3_3: Please give Mateo my regards when you see him.
story_quest_mateointro_3_4: And remember—as you explore Routes and exchange Gifts, you’re bridging the gap between Trainers around the world!
story_quest_rockethq14_0_1: I was just settling in to read the latest edition of Pokémon Researcher’s Weekly when I saw a couple of Team GO Rocket Grunts run by.
story_quest_rockethq14_0_2: We should go after them before they get up to anything too dastardly.
story_quest_rockethq14_0_3: *sigh* It looks like my reading will have to wait. I’ll head this way, and you go that way!
story_quest_rockethq14_1_0: Phew! That was a bit of a workout, eh, %PLAYERNAME%?
story_quest_rockethq14_1_1: But I’ll bet you took on that Grunt without breaking a sweat!
story_quest_rockethq14_1_2: And, as usual, I’ll bet they abandoned some poor Pokémon in their wake...
story_quest_rockethq14_1_3: How sad. The least we can do is purify some of these Pokémon.
story_quest_rockethq14_1_4: They’ll have a much happier future with you, %PLAYERNAME%.
story_quest_rockethq14_2_1: They’re looking so cheerful—I’m sure they see you as their hero!
story_quest_rockethq14_2_2: I know I do, but we can’t rest just yet. We need to stop Team GO Rocket at their source—the leaders.
story_quest_rockethq14_2_3: Let’s get cracking on tracking down those nefarious nuisances!
story_quest_rockethq14_3_1: You made short work of those Team GO Rocket Leaders.
story_quest_rockethq14_3_2: That’s no easy feat. Well, maybe it is for someone like you!
story_quest_rockethq14_3_3: If only they could change their ways permanently... But until they do, we’ll be around to prevent them from doing anything too troublesome.
story_quest_rockethq14_3_4: And that means showing their boss who’s boss.
story_quest_rockethq14_3_5: Challenge the Team GO Rocket Boss Giovanni, %PLAYERNAME%!
story_quest_rockethq14_4_0: Back so soon, %PLAYERNAME%? You’re really not giving Team GO Rocket any time to rest!
story_quest_rockethq14_4_1: And that’s just the way it should be—all in the name of keeping Pokémon everywhere safe.
story_quest_rockethq14_4_2: Thanks for your help, %PLAYERNAME%. Until the next time we need to foil their plans!
story_quest_rockethq15_0_0: I’m sure I left them around here somewhere...
story_quest_rockethq15_0_2: You haven’t seen my earplugs, have you? Those Team GO Rocket Grunts over there have been blasting music at higher volume than a Loudred all day!
story_quest_rockethq15_0_3: What’s more, I’ve barely been able to walk two steps without the crinkling of littered candy wrappers underfoot.
story_quest_rockethq15_0_4: And do you see all the bright red Rs they’ve spray-painted around here?
story_quest_rockethq15_0_5: I’m all for a good party, but theirs has been a real nuisance.
story_quest_rockethq15_0_6: Could you have a chat with those Grunts while I clean things up, %PLAYERNAME%?
story_quest_rockethq15_1_0: How did it go, %PLAYERNAME%? Did you have a calm, reasonable discussion with those Team GO Rocket Grunts?
story_quest_rockethq15_1_1: No? They just started battling you? *sigh* I guess that’s to be expected.
story_quest_rockethq15_1_2: Well, thanks for getting them to quiet down all the same! I can finally hear myself think again.
story_quest_rockethq15_1_3: And what I’m thinking is, there’s no way those rambunctious Grunts would settle down so easily. I’m positive they’ll come back before long.
story_quest_rockethq15_1_4: Could you “chat” with them again if you see them, please?
story_quest_rockethq15_2_1: You defeated them so quickly, it almost makes ME want to start a party!
story_quest_rockethq15_2_2: But it’ll have to wait, because right as those Grunts scampered away, I overheard them muttering about coming back bigger, louder, and wilder than ever.
story_quest_rockethq15_2_3: We can’t have them disturbing the local Pokémon—to say nothing of the assault on my eardrums!
story_quest_rockethq15_2_4: Let’s put in a complaint with their superiors, shall we? Defeat the Team GO Rocket Leaders!
story_quest_rockethq15_3_1: You’ve won us some peace and quiet, but I think we should make certain Team GO Rocket isn’t planning any more mischief.
story_quest_rockethq15_3_2: And that means taking down their boss, Giovanni!
story_quest_rockethq15_3_3: I know you can do it!
story_quest_rockethq15_4_1: Good news on my end—Meltan and I are just about finished picking up all the litter Team GO Rocket left behind.
story_quest_rockethq15_4_2: Thanks for your help today. We should throw our own party to celebrate your success!
story_quest_rockethq15_4_3: Just...at a reasonable volume. And we’ll pick up after ourselves, of course.
story_quest_rockethq16_0_0: %PLAYERNAME%! Just who I wanted to see.
story_quest_rockethq16_0_1: Those Team GO Rocket Grunts have been quite the nuisance lately.
story_quest_rockethq16_0_2: They keep appearing out of nowhere and scaring away all the Pokémon I’m researching!
story_quest_rockethq16_0_3: I think a good battle will teach them that their antics aren’t welcome here. Would you mind playing “professor” today?
story_quest_rockethq16_0_4: That way, these poor startled Pokémon can settle down, and I can get back to my research.
story_quest_rockethq16_1_1: As a Pokémon Professor, I couldn’t be prouder!
story_quest_rockethq16_1_2: But even though you chased most of them off, there are still a few stubborn Team GO Rocket Grunts lurking around.
story_quest_rockethq16_1_3: It seems they didn’t learn their lesson the first time around. Up for another round of “education,” %PLAYERNAME%?
story_quest_rockethq16_2_1: While you were “re-educating” those Grunts, I dug into why they’re around in such numbers today.
story_quest_rockethq16_2_2: Unsurprisingly, Team GO Rocket Leaders Arlo, Cliff, and Sierra have got them working towards yet another plot.
story_quest_rockethq16_2_3: They’re apparently hoping that giving Pokémon a jump scare will make it easier to catch them.
story_quest_rockethq16_2_4: I say we put your battling skills to use and stop these ruffians from upsetting any more innocent Pokémon!
story_quest_rockethq16_3_1: While I’m eager to resume my research, I fear these interruptions will continue until we confront the one pulling the strings here—Giovanni.
story_quest_rockethq16_3_2: He may seem intimidating, but your courageous spirit and formidable Pokémon make you more than a match for him in battle.
story_quest_rockethq16_3_3: Good luck. I believe in you!
story_quest_rockethq16_4_0: Well done taking down the Team GO Rocket Boss himself, %PLAYERNAME%—a truly impressive feat!
story_quest_rockethq16_4_1: Thanks to you, I can finally get back to my research without disruption.
story_quest_rockethq16_4_2: There’s too much we’ve yet to discover in this wide, wide world—and I’m not about to let Team GO Rocket stand in our way!
story_quest_rockethq16_4_3: Chances are they’ll put together another scheme soon, but if that happens, you and I can put a stop to it together.
story_quest_rockethq16_4_4: Until then, take a good rest with your Pokémon. You’ve earned it!
story_quest_s10willow_0_1: Things are pretty calm right now, aren’t they? The Pidove are chirping, the Hoppip are floating...
story_quest_s10willow_0_2: It makes me want to take a big stretch and go on a nice walk.
story_quest_s10willow_0_3: You’ve got to savor peaceful days like these, especially considering that Pokémon research can be fraught with all sorts of mystery and danger! Just, well, not today.
story_quest_s10willow_0_4: But no matter the circumstances, I know you’re looking out for Pokémon everywhere—and for me! In fact, I’ve always thought of you as my hero when I’m in a pinch.
story_quest_s10willow_0_5: On a relaxing day like this, you deserve a change of pace from our grand adventures. It’s a perfect time to take a look at what’s going on in our own backyard.
story_quest_s10willow_0_6: Could you check out the Pokémon in the area for me, %PLAYERNAME%?
story_quest_s10willow_1_0: Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! Let’s look at those Pokémon...
story_quest_s10willow_1_1: You’ve already powered some of them up, I see. Staying prepared in case any dangers arise? Great work, as usual!
story_quest_s10willow_1_2: With Trainers like you around, even forces like Team GO Rocket can be defeated. Speaking of which, something seems especially sinister about them lately. Just my Pokémon Professor’s intuition.
story_quest_s10willow_1_3: Hmm. Well, I’ll keep noodling on that. Could be my intuition is oversensitive lately. Let’s just enjoy this peace while we can!
story_quest_s10willow_1_4: I’m going to review some of my older observations. Why don’t you leave some of those Pokémon with me and see what other Pokémon pals are around?
story_quest_s10willow_2_0: Thank goodness, %PLAYERNAME%! You came back just in time! You and your new Pokémon are urgently needed!
story_quest_s10willow_2_3: ...I’ve just set up lunch plans with an old friend that I can’t miss.
story_quest_s10willow_2_4: Haha, sorry for winding you up there! I know you’d never miss a chance to jump in and save the day.
story_quest_s10willow_2_5: I’ve got a feeling my friend will have some valuable insight into my observations, so I need to collect my notes. I’ll tell you all about our discussion when I get back.
story_quest_s10willow_2_6: Actually, I could use your help with something—while I look for those notes, could you keep an eye on the team leaders in case they need anything? I bet they could use a hero of their own!
story_quest_s10willow_2_7: I’m sure you’ll hear from them soon, %PLAYERNAME%. Until then, let’s...hope I can find my notes!
story_quest_s10willow_3_0: Hey there, %PLAYERNAME%! I don’t have anything juicy for you right now. Have you checked in on the team leaders lately?
story_quest_s10willow_5_0: What do you think of THAT, %PLAYERNAME%? Pretty snazzy, isn’t it?
story_quest_s10willow_5_1: You can’t buy that anywhere. Master Balls were developed by Silph Co. and aren’t easy to come by.
story_quest_s10willow_5_2: I’ve heard they’re the very best Poké Ball out there—it’ll catch any wild Pokémon without fail! I know you’ll think carefully about when to use it.
story_quest_s10willow_5_3: Now for the bad news. Have you seen Team GO Rocket in front of Gyms today?
story_quest_s10willow_5_4: They’ve found a way to take over Gyms with Shadow Pokémon.
story_quest_s10willow_5_5: With so many Gyms under their control, who knows what trouble they’ll cause if left unchecked.
story_quest_s10willow_5_6: %PLAYERNAME%, I need your help. Please take on the Shadow Pokémon in those Gyms wherever and whenever you find them.
story_quest_s10willow_5_7: And who knows? With everything you do for Pokémon and other Trainers, you may have an opportunity to get your hands on another Master Ball someday.
story_quest_s10willow_5_8: But for now, get out there and be the hero I know you are!
story_quest_s10willow_return_0: %PLAYERNAME%! I’ve been looking all over for you!
story_quest_s10willow_return_1: I heard about your heroics with the team leaders. I couldn’t be happier that you all have been spending so much quality time together.
story_quest_s10willow_return_2: I hope you’ve enjoyed getting to know them better, too!
story_quest_s10willow_return_3: But there’s another reason I’m glad you’re here.
story_quest_s10willow_return_4: The team leaders have noticed Team GO Rocket acting even MORE suspicious lately.
story_quest_s10willow_return_5: And so have I. Remember that meeting I was preparing to attend? It was with Silph Co., a large company in the Kanto region.
story_quest_s10willow_return_6: They’ve had issues with villainous organizations in the past, and I was curious if they’d had any trouble recently.
story_quest_s10willow_return_7: Have you heard of Silph Co.? They develop and manufacture useful tools and items—including Poké Balls—that are distributed all over.
story_quest_s10willow_return_8: Unfortunately, they didn’t have any answers about Team GO Rocket. But there’s some good news!
story_quest_s10willow_return_9: I have a gift for you, courtesy of Silph Co. I’ll be right back, just as soon...as I remember...where I put it...
story_rockethq14_0_0: Hi, %PLAYERNAME%. I have some troubling news to share.
story_rockethq14_0_1: Team GO Rocket members have been popping up in greater numbers—and you and I both know that wherever those troublemakers are, chaos is sure to follow.
story_rockethq14_0_2: We need more info. Why don’t you go confront some of them and see what intel you can get your hands on?
story_rockethq14_0_3: The more we learn, the better prepared we’ll be to stop them—that’s the power of knowledge!
story_rockethq14_1_0: Those Team GO Rocket Grunts weren’t the chatty sort, were they, %PLAYERNAME%?
story_rockethq14_1_1: Not to worry! We’ll just cut right to the source and find where their rabble-rousing leaders are hiding!
story_rockethq14_1_2: But until we can track them down, keep seeking out Grunts and purify any Shadow Pokémon you come across. Rescuing them from those rascals is a top priority.
story_rockethq14_1_3: I know a Trainer like you is more than up to the task!
story_rockethq14_2_0: Great work out there, %PLAYERNAME%! I wish I could say I did as well with my own search here.
story_rockethq14_2_1: Sadly, I haven’t been able to track down Team GO Rocket’s leaders—Arlo, Cliff, and Sierra. Not to worry, though! Any professor worth their salt always has a plan B!
story_rockethq14_2_2: If you can collect some Mysterious Components, we’ll be able to knock together a Rocket Radar!
story_rockethq14_2_3: With top-tier tech like that in our hands, there’s no way those miscreants will be able to hide from us.
story_rockethq14_3_0: Amazing work, %PLAYERNAME%! You really gave those Team GO Rocket leaders what for!
story_rockethq14_3_1: That said, even putting their leaders out of commission hasn’t put a stop to Team GO Rocket’s activity. Which means we’ll need to escalate our little issue all the way to the top—to Giovanni.
story_rockethq14_3_2: Be careful, though. He’s more powerful than any other member of Team GO Rocket. But if there’s anyone who can put him in his place, it’s you.
story_rockethq14_4_0: Kudos to you, %PLAYERNAME%! You showed Giovanni and his band of bullies and malcontents that they aren’t welcome around here!
story_rockethq14_4_1: ...For now, at least. There’s not a doubt in my mind that those louts will be back eventually. But at least for now, the Pokémon in this area are safe, and we have you to thank.
story_rockethq14_4_2: A victory like this calls for a celebration—perhaps a nice bowl of Pinap Berries?
story_rockethq14_4_3: And know I speak from the heart when I say this: thank you for keeping the Pokémon of our world safe. Now go and enjoy some well-earned rest!
story_timeless_travels_10_0: %PLAYERNAME%! You won’t believe what just happened!
story_timeless_travels_10_1: While you were teaching those Team GO Rocket Grunts a lesson, I took a cautionary stroll around the lab.
story_timeless_travels_10_2: When I returned, I found the Adamant Crystal and Lustrous Globe had been stolen!
story_timeless_travels_10_3: This must be why Team GO Rocket has been so active lately. Those thieving ruffians!
story_timeless_travels_10_4: I’ll stay here and look for clues that might lead to where they’ve taken these items.
story_timeless_travels_10_5: Meanwhile, can you and Rhi track down some more Grunts and see if you can get to the bottom of this?
story_timeless_travels_11_0: I admire your success in defeating several Team GO Rocket Grunts, %PLAYERNAME%.
story_timeless_travels_11_1: Unfortunately, they had little information about Team GO Rocket’s plans for the Adamant Crystal and Lustrous Globe.
story_timeless_travels_11_2: Perhaps it would be wise to locate the Team GO Rocket Leaders.
story_timeless_travels_11_3: I surmise they will know more about their organization’s plans.
story_timeless_travels_12_0: Well done defeating the Team GO Rocket Leaders, %PLAYERNAME%.
story_timeless_travels_12_1: Your determination never ceases to impress me, and your efforts were not in vain.
story_timeless_travels_12_2: Each of the leaders’ hideouts contained information regarding Team GO Rocket’s scheme.
story_timeless_travels_12_3: But we do not yet have the full picture.
story_timeless_travels_12_4: As I suspected, it seems we must face Giovanni himself to find out what is really happening.
story_timeless_travels_12_5: This will be a tough battle, %PLAYERNAME%, but I believe your courage and fortitude will lead you to victory.
story_timeless_travels_13_1: Amazing! Unfortunately, we couldn’t find the Adamant Crystal or the Lustrous Globe in his hideout, but thanks to you we found oodles of other clues!
story_timeless_travels_13_2: Hopefully, now we have all the pieces to better understand their nefarious plot.
story_timeless_travels_13_3: I’ll gather the evidence and see what conclusions we can draw.
story_timeless_travels_13_4: In the meantime, I noticed a few Team GO Rocket Grunts still lurking about. Would you scare them off?
story_timeless_travels_14_1: Professor Willow just left the lab in a hurry.
story_timeless_travels_14_2: He was greatly disturbed by what he uncovered in our investigation into Team GO Rocket and their plans with the Adamant Crystal and Lustrous Globe.
story_timeless_travels_14_3: Did you know that Dialga can control time and Palkia can distort space?
story_timeless_travels_14_4: With the stolen items, Team GO Rocket may attempt to harness Dialga and Palkia’s power to bend time and space for their own ends!
story_timeless_travels_14_5: For now, let us wait for the professor’s return so we can learn how we can prevent this.
story_timeless_travels_14_6: Thank you for your assistance. I am sure I will see you again soon.
story_timeless_travels_1_1: Do you feel the change in the air? The seasons are shifting, and nature is transforming right before our eyes. Isn’t it inspiring?
story_timeless_travels_1_2: The change in seasons often brings different Pokémon to the places around us.
story_timeless_travels_1_3: And you know what that means—it’s a great time to head out and see what Pokémon we encounter!
story_timeless_travels_2_0: Looks like you found a variety of Pokémon, %PLAYERNAME%!
story_timeless_travels_2_1: Do you feel the call to adventure with any of them?
story_timeless_travels_2_2: Spending time with a buddy is a great way to strengthen your bond!
story_timeless_travels_3_1: You and your buddy make a terrific team.
story_timeless_travels_3_2: It’s important to tend to our friendships—both with Pokémon and people.
story_timeless_travels_3_3: Why not send a few Gifts to your friends to show them how much you care?
story_timeless_travels_4_1: I’m sure your fellow Trainers appreciated all the Gifts.
story_timeless_travels_4_2: Now, while you were out exploring, some colleagues of mine entrusted me with a couple of intriguing items for us to research.
story_timeless_travels_4_3: In fact, I’ve never seen anything quite like them!
story_timeless_travels_4_4: I need time to prepare, but I’ll let you know when we can start researching in earnest.
story_timeless_travels_5_0: Hey, %PLAYERNAME%! Come take a look at these items my colleagues asked me to research.
story_timeless_travels_5_1: They’re called the “Adamant Crystal” and the “Lustrous Globe”—treasures from the Sinnoh region that date back to when it was called the Hisui region.
story_timeless_travels_5_2: With names like those, they’re bound to lead to exciting discoveries! Will you join me in learning more about them? I’ll do my own digging while you’re out in the field.
story_timeless_travels_6_0: Greetings, %PLAYERNAME%. It has been some time since we last spoke. I hope you have been well.
story_timeless_travels_6_1: Professor Willow has asked me to help with his ongoing research on the Adamant Crystal and Lustrous Globe.
story_timeless_travels_6_2: Unfortunately, I haven’t come across anything like them in my travels.
story_timeless_travels_6_3: Perhaps together, we can learn more about these items and the secrets they may hold.
story_timeless_travels_6_4: I suggest we start by learning more about the Pokémon around us to see if that triggers any insights.
story_timeless_travels_7_1: I did some independent research while you were in the field.
story_timeless_travels_7_2: While I have not uncovered any true leads, I can at least confirm that the Adamant Crystal and Lustrous Globe are not related to the Ultra Beasts.
story_timeless_travels_7_3: It may feel as if we have reached a dead end, but I am confident that with diligent research, we will learn more soon.
story_timeless_travels_7_4: For now, let us continue to observe Pokémon so that we may share our findings with Professor Willow upon his return.
story_timeless_travels_8_0: Here I am, %PLAYERNAME%! You know, it’s great seeing you and Rhi back in action as a team.
story_timeless_travels_8_1: Oh... You hit a dead end, huh? Hey, no sweat—that’s often the case with Pokémon research!
story_timeless_travels_8_2: Thankfully, I was able to find a few hints in some old manuscripts sent to me by colleagues in the Sinnoh region.
story_timeless_travels_8_3: They mentioned that the Adamant Crystal and Lustrous Globe are somehow connected to Dialga and Palkia—Legendary Pokémon originally discovered in the very same Sinnoh region!
story_timeless_travels_8_4: I’m gobsmacked by this discovery and can’t wait to learn more.
story_timeless_travels_8_5: Come back in a little while, won’t you, %PLAYERNAME%? Once I’ve collated my data, I’ll have more research opportunities for you!
story_timeless_travels_9_0: I’m so glad to see you, %PLAYERNAME%!
story_timeless_travels_9_1: I’m sure you’ve noticed more Team GO Rocket skulking about lately.
story_timeless_travels_9_2: Would you mind poking around for clues about whatever scheme they’re up to now?
story_worldofwonders_0_1: You won’t believe the wondrous sight I stumbled upon—an unfamiliar Pokémon not documented in any of my notes!
story_worldofwonders_0_2: I only glimpsed the creature briefly, but its vivid purple and pink palette seemed almost otherworldly.
story_worldofwonders_0_3: Our good friend Rhi might have a thought or two about this mysterious Pokémon.
story_worldofwonders_0_4: Why don’t you see if you can find our enigmatic new friend while I describe the discovery to Rhi?
story_worldofwonders_1_1: As Professor Willow surmised, I am familiar with the being you have encountered.
story_worldofwonders_1_2: It is an Ultra Beast known as Poipole.
story_worldofwonders_1_3: In my world, this Ultra Beast is liked well enough to be chosen as a first partner companion.
story_worldofwonders_1_4: It is a mystery as to why this Poipole has ventured so far. Perhaps it even traveled through an Ultra Wormhole.
story_worldofwonders_2_0: %PLAYERNAME%! Just who I was looking for!
story_worldofwonders_2_1: We’re getting some of the most startling reports coming in—eyewitness accounts of Ultra Beast sightings once more.
story_worldofwonders_2_2: I’m desperate to know what’s going on, but given they’re not from this world, we should be cautious until we understand why this is happening.
story_worldofwonders_2_3: Rhi and I will put our investigation hats on and learn what we can here. Would you head out into the field to gather info?
story_worldofwonders_3_0: Rhi and I can confirm that the reports we’ve been getting are no mistake—we’ve got Ultra Beasts.
story_worldofwonders_3_1: And that’s only accounting for the ones we know about. There might still be more out there.
story_worldofwonders_3_2: What’s the meaning of all of this? Why are they back? Is our world in danger?
story_worldofwonders_3_3: Their sudden appearance raises a lot of questions, but don’t worry. Rhi and I are committed to figuring out what’s causing this phenomenon.
story_worldofwonders_3_4: Until we make more headway, please report anything else you find that might help our research. And be safe out there.
story_worldofwonders_4_0: Greetings, %PLAYERNAME%. How fortunate to see you, though doing so under more favorable circumstances would be preferable.
story_worldofwonders_4_1: Reports of Ultra Beast sightings continue to arrive, but we have yet to arrive at a conclusive explanation as to why.
story_worldofwonders_4_2: On a related note, the Poipole you encountered intrigues me.
story_worldofwonders_4_3: I suspect that it may be ready to evolve into Naganadel.
story_worldofwonders_4_4: Naganadel is a fascinating Ultra Beast whose unique biology allows it to store hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid within its body.
story_worldofwonders_4_5: I digress. The professor and I thank you for your tireless efforts thus far, %PLAYERNAME%.
story_worldofwonders_4_6: We will convene again when Professor Willow and I have more information to relay.
storyquest_global_diancie_0_0: Hello, %PLAYERNAME%! It’s good to see you. I’ve got the loveliest news to share.
storyquest_global_diancie_0_1: One of my research colleagues recently went on an excavation and came across some unusual diamonds.
storyquest_global_diancie_0_2: The team suspects these aren’t just any diamonds, but ones created by the Jewel Pokémon Diancie!
storyquest_global_diancie_0_3: My colleague is sending me samples, and I’m eager to examine them further.
storyquest_global_diancie_0_4: While we wait for them to arrive, I’ll start prepping some dazzling facts about Diancie to share!
storyquest_global_diancie_1_1: I’m afraid the samples from my colleague are still in transit, but I promised you Diancie trivia—and I won’t keep you on the edge of your Dian-seat.
storyquest_global_diancie_1_2: Get this: Diancie can instantly create diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.
storyquest_global_diancie_1_3: Isn’t that just phenomenal? I wonder how their color and luster compare to other diamonds...
storyquest_global_diancie_2_0: Great work out there, %PLAYERNAME%! You’ve earned a brain-teaser: which Pokémon is Diancie a sudden transformation of?
storyquest_global_diancie_2_1: That’s right—Carbink! Some say that deep beneath the surface of the world, a pack of Carbink live with their queen in a kingdom of jewels.
storyquest_global_diancie_2_2: That must be an astonishing sight. Do you think that queen is Diancie?
storyquest_global_diancie_2_3: Well, as long as we’re still waiting for the samples to arrive, why don’t you explore the area and see if you can locate a Carbink for us to observe?
storyquest_global_diancie_3_1: Here’s something you might not know—Carbink has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth!
storyquest_global_diancie_3_2: I sure would love to “gleam” insights from such a long-lived Pokémon.
storyquest_global_diancie_3_3: Anyway, I was just notified that the diamond samples from my colleague should be arriving very soon.
storyquest_global_diancie_3_4: If they’re anything like Diancie itself, prepare yourself for the loveliest sight in the world!
storyquest_global_diancie_4_0: The samples from my colleague are finally here!
storyquest_global_diancie_4_1: After some testing, I’ve determined that these are indeed diamonds made by Diancie. Look at that shimmer!
storyquest_global_diancie_4_2: These diamonds are rare, but catching a glimpse of Diancie is an even more extraordinary event.
storyquest_global_diancie_4_3: Fun fact: Diancie is a Rock- and Fairy-type Pokémon—an unusual combination indeed!
storyquest_global_diancie_4_4: Diancie can also Mega Evolve, making it shine even more brilliantly than ever. It really is one devastatingly dazzling Pokémon.
storyquest_global_diancie_5_0: Thanks for helping me research Carbink and Diancie!
storyquest_global_diancie_5_1: I always treasure our time together.
storyquest_global_diancie_5_2: We may have spent the day discussing the glitz and glamor of a Mythical Pokémon, but you’re no less of a gem yourself.
streaks_widget_description: Use the Daily Streaks widget to keep track of your streaks for catching Pokémon and spinning PokéStops. Earn extra big bonuses on the seventh day!
strong_encounter_tutorial_message:
You can find some by spinning Photo Discs at PokéStops and Gyms.

Also, Pokémon GO Wild Area ticket holders receive premium Timed Research that awards GO Safari Balls each hour.
strong_encounter_tutorial_title: GO Safari Balls are great for catching mighty Pokémon!
subway_grunt_greeting_01: Going somewhere? We’re gonna stop you in your tracks!
subway_grunt_greeting_02: There’s a one-way ticket to loser town with your name on it! All aboard!
subway_grunt_greeting_03: You ever heard of the Unova region?
subway_grunt_greeting_04: This train’s got a strict “no pipsqueaks allowed” policy, and that means you!
subway_grunt_greeting_05: No way you’re keepin’ up with this train! Toot toot!
subway_grunt_greeting_06: This is the end of the line for you!
success_inventory_daily_butterfly_limit: Pin not counted toward your Vivillon medals—limit reached. Try pinning Postcards from friends!
sunsteel_strike_adventure_effects_mapvie: Shines the light of a meteor. Attracts Pokémon found during the day and allows daytime Evolution at night.
suspended_player_lockout_1: Account Suspension Notice Your account has been suspended for violating the Terms of Service. This suspension will last approximately 30 days. Any further transgressions will result in permanent account termination. Visit the Help Center for more information.
suspended_player_lockout_1|a:
Account Suspension Notice

 Your account has been suspended for violating the Terms of Service.

 This suspension will last approximately 30 days. Any further transgressions will result in permanent account termination.
suspension_rate_limit_desc: We have detected unusual activity from your account. As a result, temporary limitations have been placed on your play.
switch_sleep_warning: While connecting to the Nintendo Switch, don’t turn off your smartphone or enter sleep mode.
system_location_prompt: Pokémon GO requires your location to find Pokémon and PokéStops near you.
tabrs_instruction_global: All Trainers must work together as a global community to complete this challenge.
tabrs_instruction_regional: Trainers must work together as a regional community to complete this challenge.
team_blue_intro|1: I am Blanche, leader of Team Mystic.
team_blue_intro|2: The wisdom of Pokémon is immeasurably deep.
team_blue_intro|3: I am researching why it is that they evolve.
team_blue_intro|5: With our calm analysis of every situation, we can't lose!
team_change_item_confirmation_descriptio: You will not be able to purchase another Team Medallion for another 365 days.  Your Pokémon currently defending Gyms won’t earn PokéCoins when they’re defeated.
team_change_item_desc: A unique coin that enables a Trainer to change teams. It can only be purchased once per 365 days.
team_picker_fainted_pokemon_in_team_warn: One or more Pokémon on your team have fainted.
team_picker_fainted_pokemon_warning: Your current party cannot join the battle. Heal your Pokémon first.
team_picker_stationed_pokemon_warning: Your current party cannot join the battle. One or more Pokémon in the party are placed at a Power Spot.
team_red_intro|2: Pokémon are stronger than humans, and they're warmhearted, too!
team_red_intro|3: I'm researching ways to enhance Pokémon's natural power in the pursuit of true strength.
team_red_intro|4: There's no doubt that the Pokémon our team have trained are the strongest in battle!
team_yellow_intro|1: Hey! The name's Spark—the leader of Team Instinct.
team_yellow_intro|2: Pokémon are creatures with excellent intuition.
team_yellow_intro|3: I bet the secret to their intuition is related to how they're hatched.
team_yellow_intro|4: Come on and join my team!
team_yellow_intro|5: You never lose when you trust your instincts!
teammedallion_description: A unique coin that enables a Trainer to change teams. It can only be purchased once per 365 days.

During the event, Pokémon encountered in this Timed Research have the same chance to be Shiny as those encountered via Field Research.

This Timed Research will be available on September 22, 2024, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.
text_rewards_key_sewaddlecd24: Included rewards: • Premium in-game items, such as Rare Candies, Ultra Balls, and more • Extra encounters with Sewaddle and its Evolutions
text_rewards_key_shayminmasterwork2024: Includes: • An encounter with Shiny Shaymin • 10 Dialga Candy, 10 Palkia Candy, 10 Giratina Candy, and 30 Shaymin Candy • 10,548 XP and 9,840 Stardust • 2 Rare Candy XL and 3 Rare Candies for Trainers level 31 and up • 5 Rare Candies for Trainers level 30 and below • 60 Ultra Balls, 3 Rocket Radars, 1 Lure Module, 1 Mossy Lure Module, 1 Glacial Lure Module, 2 Incense, and more!
text_rewards_key_shinycelebi24:
A ticket to access Masterwork Research that leads to an encounter with one of the most elusive Pokémon, Shiny Celebi, and includes the following rewards:
• 3 Super Incubators, 153 Ultra Balls, 1 Poffin, and 1 Incense
• 1 Premium Battle Pass and 3 Charged TMs
• 3 Rare Candies and 3 Rare Candy XL
• 1 Glacial Lure Module and 1 Mossy Lure Module
• 40,411 XP and 17,570 Stardust
text_rewards_key_slumberingsands24: Included rewards: • Komala Backpack avatar item • Encounters with Komala and Slakoth wearing a visor • 10,000 XP, 2,500 Stardust, 25 Poké Balls, 2 Silver Pinap Berries, 2 Golden Razz Berries, and 1 Star Piece
text_rewards_key_spelunkercove24: Included rewards: • Five encounters with Crabrawler • Five Premium Battle Passes • 20 Crabrawler Candy
text_rewards_key_stadiumsights24: Included rewards: • 5 encounters with Emolga • 1 Incubator, 1 Super Incubator, and 20 Emolga Candy
text_rewards_key_takeovermarch24: Included rewards: • An encounter with Pawniard • 6 Mysterious Components, 1 Super Incubator, and 1 Rocket Radar
text_rewards_key_tgrtakejan2024: Includes: • Poké Ball Throw Pose • Incubator, Incense, Silver Pinap Berries • 10,000 XP and 10,000 Stardust • And more!
text_rewards_key_ttfinale24: Included rewards: • Encounters with Ponyta, Lapras, and Elekid wearing team leader–themed accessories • 1 Incubator, 1 Super Incubator, 2 Premium Battle Passes, 1 Incense, 1 Lure Module, and 1 Rocket Radar • 10,000 XP and 5,000 Stardust
text_rewards_key_tynamocd24: Included rewards: • Premium in-game items, such as Rare Candies, Ultra Balls, and more • Extra encounters with Tynamo and its Evolutions
text_rewards_key_ultraspace24: Included rewards: • Seven encounters with Mareanie • Naganadel Wings • 4 Premium Battle Passes, 15 Ultra Balls, 15 Great Balls, 15 Poké Balls, and 1 Lucky Egg
text_rewards_key_valentines2024: Includes: • Five encounters with Spinda with a heart pattern • 2 Incense • 5,000 XP • 2,500 Stardust
text_rewards_key_wonderticket: This ticket includes three Timed Research opportunities, which you will automatically get access to. Rewards include: - Poipole Helmet avatar item - An encounter with Poipole - Encounters with Beedrill, Galarian Slowpoke, Cacnea, Trubbish, and Skrelp - Encounters with Eevee and its Evolutions adorned with cherry blossoms - 3 Premium Battle Passes, 3 Incense, 15 Rare Candies, 3 Lucky Eggs, 3 Star Pieces, 30 Poipole Candies, and more - 60,000 XP and 30,000 Stardust Please note that if you purchase this version of the Wonder Ticket, you will not be able to purchase the version that comes with additional items. Information about these premium bonus items is available on our website.
text_rewards_key_wonderticket_part2: This ticket includes three Timed Research opportunities, which you will automatically get access to as they become available. Purchasing this ticket will grant you access to the first and second Timed Research. Rewards for Part 1 and 2: - Poipole Helmet avatar item - Encounters with Beedrill, Galarian Slowpoke, and Cacnea - Encounters with Eevee and its Evolutions adorned with cherry blossoms - 2 Premium Battle Passes, 2 Incense, 5 Rare Candies, 2 Lucky Eggs, 2 Star Pieces, and more - 40,000 XP and 20,000 Stardust! Details about the third Timed Research opportunity and the premium rewards it includes will be revealed soon! Please note that if you purchase this version of the Wonder Ticket, you will not be able to purchase the version that comes with additional items. Information about these premium bonus items is available on our website.
text_rewards_key_yamasktr24:
These Timed Research opportunities, which challenge you to complete Field Research tasks, lead to encounters with the featured Pokémon: Yamask and Galarian Yamask.

During the event, Pokémon encountered in this Timed Research have the same chance to be Shiny as those encountered via Field Research.

This Timed Research will be available on October 19, 2024, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.
text_rewards_key_zarude: Included rewards: • An encounter with Zarude • Encounters with Galarian Zigzagoon, Seedot, Cacnea, Absol, and Scraggy • 5 Rare Candies, 10 Zarude Candy, 3 Zarude Candy XL • 2 Premium Battle Passes, 1 Incense, 10 Ultra Balls, 6 Silver Pinap Berries, and more!
